GK16andhvc1u:4_1: viṣamasthaladarśinyā divyāñjanākhyaṭippanyoktayā ca śrīmadācāryābhinavaguptaviracitayā locanākhyayā vyākhyayānugataḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6: --- śrīmadācāryābhinavaguptakṛtaṃ locanam śrībhāratyai namaḥ apūrvaṃ yadvastu prathayati vinā kāraṇakalāṃ- jagadbhāvaprakhyaṃ nijarasabharātsārayati ca /
GK16andhvc1u:7: kramātprakhyopākhyāprasarasubhagaṃ bhāsayati ta- tsarasvatyāstattvaṃ kavisahṛdayākhyaṃ vijayate //
GK16andhvc1u:8: śrīsahṛdayatilakarāmaśārakakṛtabālapriy.ā śrīgurave namaḥ śrīgurūnpūrṇavedeśaṃ saṅgameśañca mādhavam /
GK16andhvc1u:16_0: atha tatrabhavantaḥ śrīmadācāryābhinavaguptapādāḥ kāvyālokavyākhyānañcikīrṣavastasya nirvighnaparisamāptaye vihitaṃ samuciteṣṭadevatānamaskārātmakammaṅgalaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:17: yatukamalamanambhasi kamaletyādikāvyātmakaṃ sarasvatītattvam, kāraṇakalāṃ vi- locanam bhaṭṭendurājacaraṇābjakṛtādhivāsa- hṛdyaśruto 'bhinavaguptapadābhidho 'ham /
GK16andhvc1u:19_0: bālapriyā nā-tattatkāryaṃ prati prasiddhaṃ yadyadupādānādikāraṇantasya kalā leśaḥ tāṃ vinā antareṇaiva apūrvaṃulokaprasiddhavastuvijātīyamadbhutañca
GK16andhvc1u:19_1: vastunirupākhyaśaśaśṛṅgādivilakṣaṇamanambho 'dhikaraṇakakamalādikaṃ padārtham prathayati sṛṣṭvā vistārayati, kiñca yad grāvaprakhyaṃupāṣāṇatulyaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:19_2: nisargato nīrasaṃ jagatusarvaṃ vastu nijaḥ svīyaḥ kāvyāsambandhī yo rasaḥ śṛṅgarādiḥ tasya bharādatiśayāt sārayati sāraṃ
GK16andhvc1u:19_3: karoti vibhāvāditvayojanena rasavyañjakaṃ karotīti yāvad, vākyābhyāmābhyāṃ kāvyātmakasarasvatītattvasya viśvakartuḥ prajāpaterutkarṣarūpavyatireko
GK16andhvc1u:20_0: yajjagaditi cānuṣajyate, prakhyākaveḥ pratibhā; upākhyā vacanaṃ prathamaṃ prakhyā paścādupākhyeti tayoryaḥ kramātprasaraḥ
GK16andhvc1u:20_1: tena subhagaṃ hṛdyaṃ sad, bhāsayati nisargeṇāramaṇīyamapi sarvaṃ vastu rasavyañjakatvasampadanena rasaṇīyaṃ satprakāśayatītyarthaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:20_2: cakārasyātra sambandhaḥ, atra prakhyopākhyāprasarasyāpūrvavastunirmāṇe sarasatvakaraṇe ca hetutvamārthikaṃ bodhyam, atrādyena
GK16andhvc1u:20_3: vākyenāpūrvavastuno nirmāṇandvitīyena pūrvaṃ sato vastunassarasatvakaraṇaṃ tṛtīyena dvayorapi hṛdyatayā prakāśanañjoktamityapa
GK16andhvc1u:21_1: yadvā kavisahṛdayairākhyāyataucyate iti tadākhyam, atha vā kavisahṛdayayorākhyā abhīkṣṇyena khyānaṃ sphuraṇaṃ yasya tat kāvyātmakamityarthaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:21_2: tattvamāropitaṃ bodhyam, sarasvatyāḥuśabdaprapañcābhimāninyādevatāyāḥ, tattvaṃupāramārthikaṃ rūpam, vijayate sarvasmādupari
GK16andhvc1u:21_3: vartate, enena tannamaskāro granthakarturgamyate; atha ca sarasvatyāstattvaṃ dhvanikāvyam, vijayate; apūrvamityādyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc1u:22: athauddhatyaṃ paraharannātmano vyākhyānanaipuṇī darśayan kīrttya nuvṛttaye nāmanirdeśaṅkurvaṃśca pratijānīte-bhaṭṭetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:23_0: bhaṭṭendurājasyautannāmakasya guroḥ caraṇābjayoḥupajhatulyayoḥ pādayoḥ tatsannidhāviti yāvad yo 'dhivāsastena caraṇābjaśuśrūṣayeti
GK16andhvc1u:23_1: yāvad; hṛdyāni svahṛdayasthāni; atha ca śrotṛjanahṛdayapriyāṇi śrutāni śāstrāṇi yasya saḥ, yathā padmena surabhīkaraṇe vastuno
GK16andhvc1u:23_2: hṛdyatvaṃ tathetyupamātra dhvanyate, yatkiñcatusvalpam, apirevārthe, yadvānuraṇannapīti yojanā, apiśabdaḥ svalpābhidhānena
GK16andhvc1u:23_4: bālapriyā anuraṇanubruvan ghaṇṭā'dinādasthānīyasya mūlakṛdvacanasyānuraṇanasthānīyaṃ vyākhyānarūpaṃ svavacanamityanena prakāśyate,
GK16andhvc1u:24_0: lojyate dṛśyate 'neneti locanaṃ svasya locanaṃmanaḥ tasya nitarāṃ yojanayā manaḥpraṇidhānenetyarthaḥ, kāvyālokaṃ janasya
GK16andhvc1u:24_1: sphuṭayāmi visadīkaromi, yadvā svasya locanaṃ jñānaṃ tasya niyojanayā vyākhyānarūpānuraṇanadvārā samarpaṇena sphuṭayāmi prakāśayāmi,
GK16andhvc1u:26_0: svayamiti vṛttikārasya nirdeśaḥ, avyucchinnaḥumadhye vicchedena rahitaḥ parameśvarasyautattallīlāvigrahamavalambamānasya
GK16andhvc1u:26_1: paramātmanaḥ; namaskāraḥ tasya sampattiḥuprakarṣaḥ tayā caritaḥulabdhaḥ arthaḥuvighnanivṛttyādirūpasākṣātprayojanaṃ yasya
GK16andhvc1u:26_2: saḥ, tathābhūtasya maṅgalācaraṇa āpātato virodhamapiśabdo dyotayati, vyākhyātṛśrotṝṇāmiti phalasampattaya ityādinā sambandhaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:27: vyākhyātṝṇāṃ vyākhyānaṃ śrotṝṇāṃ śravaṇañcabhīṣṭaṃ divyāñajanākhyā ṭippanī śrīśrīgaurakṛṣṇaḥ śaraṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:30_1: locanākhye vyākhyāne viṣamasthalāni mukhyatvena viśadayitukāmasya divyāñjananāmikeyaṃ ṭippanī; prāsaṅgikī tvaparatrāpīti
GK16andhvc1u:31_3: pūrṇaitatsūtrānuvṛttita ṛtpadānuvṛttyaiva nirvāhe prakṛtasūtre punā ṛdgrahaṇamānaṅvidhyu ddeśyatāvacchedakakoṭipraviṣṭasamasyamānayāvatpadānāmṛdantatvasyāpekṣāṃ
GK16andhvc1u:31_4: darśayad vidyayonyanyataravācitvamapi tadavacchedakakukṣau samāviveśayiṣyatīti vyākyātṛśabdasya kathaṃ cittadanyataravācitve
GK16andhvc1u:35_0: madhuripornakhāḥ vo yuṣmānvyākhyātṛśrotṝṃstrāyantām, teṣāmeva sambodhanayogyatvāt; sambodhanasāro hi yuṣmadarthaḥ, trāṇaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:35_1: cābhīṣṭalābhaṃ prati sāhāyakācaraṇaṃ, tacca tatpratidvandvivighnāpasāraṇādinā bhavatīti, iyadatra trāṇaṃ vivikṣitam, nityodyoginaśca
GK16andhvc1u:35_2: bhagavato 'sammohādyavasāyayogitvenotsāhapratītervīraraso bālapriyā vaṇañcābhīṣṭaṃ phalaṃ tasya sampattaye niṣpattaye, tadubhayasampattau
GK16andhvc1u:35_3: tadubhayahetukagranthapratiṣcaṭārūpaṃ phalaṃ granthakārasya ca siddhyatīti bhāvaḥ, samucitaṃugranthārambhe yogyaṃ yadāśiṣaḥ
GK16andhvc1u:35_4: prakaṭanaṃuvacanantaddvāreṇa, parameśvarasya sāmmukhyaṃuvyākhyātṛśrotṝn pratyābimukhyaṃ trāṇecchārūpam, karoti sampādayati,
GK16andhvc1u:35_5: tatrrāṇasya parameśvarasāmmukhyāyattatvātrrāṇāṅgabhūtaṃ tatsāmmukhyamāśīrvādena sampādayatītyarthaḥ, yadvā samucitāyā āśiṣaḥ
GK16andhvc1u:35_6: prakaṭanaṃugranthato nibandhanaṃ taddvāreṇa, parameśvare viṣaye sāmmukhyaṃuvyākyātṛśrotṝṇāmābhimukhyamanusandhānātmakam karotyutpādayati,
GK16andhvc1u:35_7: vṛttikāra ityanena svecchetyādikaṃ na kārikārūpasūtrādyapadyamiti darśitam, va ityasya vyākhyātṛśrotṝniti vyākhyāne hetumāha-teṣāmiti /
GK16andhvc1u:37: sambodhanaṃ sāraḥuprāṇo yuṣmadarthatvaprayojakoṃ'śo yasya saḥ, na hyasambodhyo yuṣmadā vyapadiśyate, trāyantāmityanenātra vivakṣitaṃ vyācaṣṭe-trāṇañceci /
GK16andhvc1u:38_0: abhīṣṭeti vyākhyānaśravaṇarūpetyarthaḥ, sahāyasya karma sāhāyakaṃ tatpratidvandvīta; abhīṣṭalābhapratibandhaketyarthaḥ, apasaraṇaṃunivartanam,
GK16andhvc1u:39: uktarūpamityarthaḥ, atha dhvaniṃ kāvyātmānaṃ ṭippanī vṛttikāra iti /
GK16andhvc1u:40: svakṛtānāmeva mūlarūpāṇāṃ kārikāṇāṃ vyākhyā'tmakavṛtteḥ karttetyarthaḥ, ata eva viśiṣṭasyevāripsitatvena mūle maṅgalākaroṇe 'pi nācāravirodhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:41_0: ke cittu mūle 'pi 'kāvyasyātme' tiprathamakārikāyāmādyapadasya kāvyetyasyānyaparatve 'pi parārthopanītodakumbhadarśanavat
GK16andhvc1u:41_1: śravaṇamātreṇāpi; 'kāvyālāpāśca ye ke cid gītakāntakhilāni ca /
GK16andhvc1u:42_0: śabdamūrttidharasyaite viṣṇoraṃśā mahātmana'-- ityādipramāṇato bhagavatsphorakatvena vastunirddeśarūpamaṅgalaṃ jātamevetyāpi
GK16andhvc1u:44_0: svajanyabodhāśrayatvena vaktrabhiprāyaviṣayatvāvacchinnasya locanam dhvanyate, nakhānāṃ praharaṇatvena graharaṇena ca rakṣaṇe
GK16andhvc1u:44_1: kartavye nakhānāmavyatiriktatvena karaṇatvātsātiśayaśaktitā kartṛtvena sūcitā, dhvanitaśca parameśvarasya vyātiriktakalaṇāpekṣāvirahaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:44_2: madhuriporityane tasya sadaiva jagatrrāsāpasāraṇodyama uktaḥ, kīddaśasya madhuripoḥ? svecchayā kesariṇaḥ, ma tu karmapāratantryeṇa,
GK16andhvc1u:44_3: bālapriyā pratipādayiṣyatā granthakṛtā kṛtasyāsya prathamapadyasya kāvyarūpatvādasminnapi dhvaniryojanīya iti manvāno rasādibhedena
GK16andhvc1u:45: caśabdaḥ samuccaye dhvanyate ceti sambandhaḥ; na vācyārthamātramanenocyate kintu raso dhvanyate cetyarthaḥ, nityodyogina iti /
GK16andhvc1u:46_0: udyogo nāmaubāhyasaṃnāhātmakodyamanakriyārūpa darśitam, yathoktaṃ bharatena 'uttamaprakṛtirutsāhātmako vīra iti' asaṃmohenausammoharāhityena
GK16andhvc1u:46_1: yo 'dhyavasāyaḥ etadevaṃ kartuṃ śakyamiti vastutattvaniścayaḥ tadyogitveneti utsāhahetukathanam, asaṃmohaścadhyavasāyaśca
GK16andhvc1u:47_0: svecchākesariṇo madhuripoḥ prasannārticchida iti padairhiraṇyakaśipuprabhṛtinivarhaṇādiviṣayakotsāhasya vyañjanayā sahṛdayānāṃ
GK16andhvc1u:48_0: praharaṇatveneti karaṇatve hetuḥ siṃhādīnāmāyudhatvenetyarthaḥ, praharaṇatva iti pāṭhe nimitte saptamī, nanu nakhānāṃ praharaṇatve
GK16andhvc1u:49_0: praharaṇaṃ hi svasyānyasya vā rakṣāṃ kartumupādīyata iti bhāvaḥ, avyatiriktatvena karaṇatvāditi, avyatiriktatvamapṛthagbhūtatvamābhyantaratvamiti
GK16andhvc1u:49_1: yāvat tadviśiṣṭakaraṇatvādityarthaḥ, karaṇaṃ dvividhaṃ bāhyamābhyantarañca, bāhyaṃ khaṅgādi; ābhyantaraṃhastādi, karaṇatvāt
GK16andhvc1u:49_2: kartṛtveneti samabandhaḥ, karaṇatvamanuktvā kartṛtvoktyetyarthaḥ, madhuripurnakhaistrāyatāmiti vaktavyamanuktvā madhuripornakhāstrāyantāmityuktyeti
GK16andhvc1u:49_3: yāvat, sātiśayā ṭippanī svasambodhyasya yuṣmatpadārthatayānyatra vyavasthāpitatvādityāśayaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:51: vibhāvādīnāṃ mitho nāntarīyakatvena 'sadbhāvaśced vibhāvāderdvayorekasya vā bhaved /
GK16andhvc1u:54_1: kīddaśā nakhāḥ? prapannānāmārti ye chindanti; nakhānāṃ hi chedakatvamucitam; ārteḥ punaśchedyatvaṃ nakhānparatyasambhāvanīyamapi
GK16andhvc1u:54_2: tadīyānāṃ nakhānāṃsvecchānirmāṇaucityātsambhāvyata eveti bhāvaḥ, atha vā trijagatkaṇṭako hiraṇyakaśipurviśvasyotkleśakara
GK16andhvc1u:54_3: iti sa eva vastutaḥ prapannānāṃ bhagavadekaśaraṇānāṃ janānāmārtikāritvānmūrtaivārtistaṃ vināśayadbhirārtirevocchinnā bhavatīti
GK16andhvc1u:54_4: parameśvarasya tasyāmapyavasthāyāṃparamakāruṇikatvamuktaṃ, kiṃ ca te nakhāḥ svacchena svacchatāguṇena nairmalyena; svacchamṛdugrabhṛtayo
GK16andhvc1u:54_5: bālapriyā śaktiḥusāmarthyaṃ yeṣāṃ teṣāṃ bhāvastattā, śaktateti ca pāṭhaḥ; vyaṅgyāntaramapyāhadhvanitaśceti, uktavyaṅgakyeneti
GK16andhvc1u:56: tattaddurjanebhyo jagato yastrāsaḥ tadapasāraṇe ya udyamaḥ sa ityarthaḥ, ukta iti /
GK16andhvc1u:57_0: vyañjita ityarthaḥ, imamarthaṃ manasikṛtya pūrvaṃ nityodyogina ityuktamiti bodhyam, na tu karmapāratantryeṇetyādeḥ svīkṛtetyatra
GK16andhvc1u:57_1: sambandhaḥ, ādyamicchāpadena dvitīyaṃ svapadena ca gamyamiti bodhyam, viśiṣṭeti viśiṣṭaṃudānavāntarahananāpekṣayā viśeṣavat,
GK16andhvc1u:57_2: dānavasyauhiraṇyakaśiporhananaṃ yadvā viśiṣṭaḥusuranaratiryagādyavadhyatvarūpaviśeṣavān yo dānavastasya hananaṃ tasminnucito
GK16andhvc1u:57_3: yastathāvidhāyāḥunaraharivigrahāvalambanaviṣayikāyā icchāyāḥ parigrahaḥ, ucitetīcchāviśeṣaṇaṃ vā tasmin yadaucityāmarthāt
GK16andhvc1u:58: siṃharūpasya nararahapamiśratvaṃ prasiddamato noktam, ye cchindantīti /
GK16andhvc1u:60: chedanakriyākartṛtvamityarthaḥ, chadyatvaṃuchedanakarmatvamasya sambhāvyata ityanena sambandhaḥ, asambhāvanīyamiti /
GK16andhvc1u:62_0: svecchayā bhagavata icchayā yannirmāṇaṃunakhānāṃnarmāṇaṃ tena hetunā; aucityādimūrtasyāpi vastunaśchedane sāmarthyāt, yadvā
GK16andhvc1u:62_1: svecchayāsvātantryeṇa nirmāṇenamūrtacchedanādeḥ karaṇe nakānāmaucityādityarthaḥ, sambhāvyata evauniścīyata eva, lokaddaṣṭyanurodenāha-atha
GK16andhvc1u:63: asmin pakṣe ātiṃśabda ātiṅkāraṇaṃlakṣayati tasyāvyabhiṭacāreṇa nikhilārtikāritvañca dhvanatīti bodhyam, vināśayadbhiriti /
GK16andhvc1u:65: tathāvidhasya hiraṇyakaśipoḥ hananamārterevocchedanaṃ na tu kasya citprāṇina iti bhagavadbuddhiriti bhāvaḥ, tasyāmapyavasthāyāṃuhananāvasthāyāmapi, uktamiti /
GK16andhvc1u:66_0: vyañjitamityarthaḥ, ārtimeva chinatti na tu kañjitprāṇinamityarthapratītyeti bhāvaḥ, atra prapannetyādiviśeṣaṇaṃ trāṇāśīravādahetugarbhasvacchetyādipraśaṃsāparaṃpraśasyamānā
GK16andhvc1u:66_1: hi devatā praseduṣī prepsitaṃ prayacchati, tatra svacchasvacchāyetyatra karmadhārayabhramaṃ vārayanvyācaṣṭe-svacchenetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:67: svacchatāguṇenetyāsyaiva vivaraṇaṃ nairmalyeneti, bhāvavṛttayaḥusvacchatā'didharmavācakāḥ, chāyayetyasya vyākhyānaṃ vakretyādi, atra vastudhvanimāhārtheti /
GK16andhvc1u:68_0: locanam hi mukhyātayā bhāvavṛttaya eva; svacchāyayā ca vakrahṛdyarūpayā'kṛtyā'yāsitiḥ-khedita induryaiḥ, atrārthaśaktimūlena
GK16andhvc1u:68_1: dhvaninā bālacandratvaṃ dhvanyate, āyāsanena tatsannidhau candrasya vicchāyatvapratītirahṛdyatvapratītiśca dhvanyate, āyāsakāritvaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:68_2: ca nakhānāṃ suprasiddham; naraharinakhānāṃ tacca lokottareṇa rūpema pratipāditam kiṃ ca tadīyāṃ svacchatāṃ kuṭilimānaṃ cāvalokya
GK16andhvc1u:68_3: bālacandraḥ svātmani khedamanubhavati; tulye 'pi svacchakuṭilākārayoge 'mī prapannārtinivāramakuśalāḥ; na tvahamiti vyatirekālaṅkāro
GK16andhvc1u:68_5: vakrahṛdyarūpākṛtyāyāsitatvasya bālacandra eva sambhavāttadarthasāmarthyamūlenetyarthaḥ, bālacandratvaṃ dhvanyata iti /
GK16andhvc1u:69: indupadārthasya candrasya bālatvaṃ dhvanyata ityarthaḥ, āyāsita ityasāya khedita ityartho lakṣaṇayā; tatphalamāhāyāsanenetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:70: tatsannidhau nakhasannidhau, vicchāyatveti niśśobhatvetyarthaḥ, dhvanyata iti /
GK16andhvc1u:72: praharaṇarūpatvāditi bhāvaḥ, taccauāyāsakāritvañca, lokottareṇeti svacchatvādipūrvoktarūpeṇetyarthaḥ, pratipāditamita /
GK16andhvc1u:73_0: tadhā ca vidāraṇādinā'yākasakāribhyo lokikanakhebhyo naraharinakānāṃ vāyatireko vyajyata iti bhāvaḥ, prapannārticchida iti
GK16andhvc1u:74: tadīyāṃunakhasambandhinīm, kuṭilimānamityatra tadīyamiti vipariṇāmena sambandhaḥ, svātmanīti /
GK16andhvc1u:77_0: itiśabdasyānubhavatītyanena vyatirekālaṅkāra ityanena ca sambandho vodhyaḥ, dhvanita ity uktarthapratītyā sahṛdayānāṃ vyatirekavyaktirityarthaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:77_1: iti vyatirekālaṅkāro 'pi dhvanita iti pāṭhaḥ, apiśabdena pūrvoktavyatirekasya samuccayaḥ, evaṃvidhā iti /
GK16andhvc1u:79: ātmano hi santāpasyaiva cchedane kuśalatvaṃ na sarvāsāmārtīnāmiti bhāvaḥ, bālendubahumāneneti /
GK16andhvc1u:80: ete nakhāḥ na kintu bālendava iti bahumatyetyarthaḥ, āyāsamita /
GK16andhvc1u:82_0: ivaśabdarahitaśca pāṭhaḥ, utprekṣāpahnutidhvaniriti utparekṣārthāpahnutirutprekṣāpahnutiḥ tasyāḥ dhvaniḥ pahnutyutprekṣayoraṅgāṅgitayā
GK16andhvc1u:83_1: mūlaṃ prayojakaṃ yasya tāddaśena svataḥsambhavinā vyañjanāvyāpāreṇa /
GK16andhvc1u:88_0: locanam punarevaṃvidhā nakhā daśa bālacandrākārāḥsantāpārticchedakuśalāśceti tāneva loko bālendubahumānena paśyati, na tu
GK16andhvc1u:89_0: bālapriyā bālenduraviratamāyāsamanubhavatīvetyutprekṣāyāṃ hi pūrvoktaṃ tāneva lokobālenduṃ bahumānena paśyati na tu māmityākalanaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:89_1: nimittaṃ tatra ca spaṣṭāpahnutiḥ; na nakhā ete kintu bālendava iti lokasya pratīteḥ; tathā cātrotprekṣā nakhaviṣayakanakhatvaniṣedhapūrvakabālendutvāroparūpalokapratītiviṣayakabālacandragatapratītinibandhanetyāto
GK16andhvc1u:90_0: atra vīrarasadhvaniraṅgī; utsāhasya prādhānyena pratīyamānatvāditi dhyeyam, nanvatra granthakāragatabhagavadviṣayakaratervyaṅgyatvasya
GK16andhvc1u:90_1: vaktavyatayā bhāvadhvanirevāṅgitvena vācyaḥ, rasastu tadaṅgatayeti cedatrāhuḥ-pratipannabhagavattanmayībhāvasya grandhakarturāśīḥ-kartṛtayā
GK16andhvc1u:90_2: vāsyamidaṃ na bhāvaparaṃ bhaktasya bhedena bhajanīyadevatāviṣayakaratervyaṅgyāyāḥ khalubhāvatvam, granthakarturbhagavattanmayībhāvaśaca
GK16andhvc1u:90_3: svayaṃ sūtrakṛdavasthāyāṃ maṅgalākaramādapūrvaprasthāvakartṛtvācca siddhaḥ, ṭippanī utprekṣāpahnutidhvanirapīti /
GK16andhvc1u:92_1: eva dhvanigate yogyatāstyekavyañjakānupraveśātmanaḥ saṅkarasya, prakṛte coktadiśotprekṣāpanhutyoḥ sāpekṣataivamitho 'sti,
GK16andhvc1u:92_2: na ca nairapekṣye saṃsṛṣṭeḥ prasaṅga iti saṅkyam? padarūpaviṣayabhedaviśiṣṭānapekṣatvasya saṃsṛṣṭau vivakṣitatvād, ekavyañjakānupraveśe
GK16andhvc1u:94_0: yadyapi sarvameva vastu tathāpīha rasālaṅkārabhinnaṃ vastupadena vivakṣitam, alaṅkāratvaṃ ca rasādipratiyogikabhedavadvyaṅgyapratiyogikabhedaviśiṣṭaśabdārthānyataraniṣṭaviṣayitāsambandhāvacchinnacamatkṛtijanakatāvacchedakatāvacchedakatvam
GK16andhvc1u:97: kāvyasyātmā dhvanir iti budhair yaḥ samāmnāta-pūrvas tasyābhāvaṃ jagadur apare bhāktam āhus tam anye /
GK16andhvc1u:98: kecid vācām sthitam aviṣaye tattvam ūcus tadīyaṃ tena brūmaḥ sahṛdaya-manaḥ-prītaye tat-svarūpam // DhvK_1.1 //
GK16andhvc1u:99: kāvyasyātmā dhvaniriti budhairyaḥ samāmnātapūrvastasyābhāvaṃ jagadurapare bhāktamāhustamanye /
GK16andhvc1u:100: ke cidvācāṃ sthitamaviṣaye tattvamūcustadīyaṃ tena brūmaḥ sahṛdayamanaḥprītaye tatsvarūpam  // 1 //
GK16andhvc1u:102: locanam atha prādhānyenābhidheyasvarūpamabhidadhadapradhānatayā prayojanaprayojanaṃ tatsambaddhaṃ prayojanaṃ ca sāmarthyātprakaṭayannādivākyamāha-kāvyasyātmeti /
GK16andhvc1u:109: ābhidheyasvarūpasya tatsvarūpaṃ brūma iti vākyārthatvaṃ; prayojanaprayojanasya prītaya iti padārtatvamatastadabhidhānayoḥ prādhānyāprādānye /
GK16andhvc1u:117: evañja tayorhetuhetumadbhāvena prayojanaprayojanarūpāyāḥ prīterabhidhānāttaddhetubhūtasya dhvanisvarūpajñānasya prakaṭanaṃ siddhyatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:118: nanu budhaśabdasya sāmānyato jñātṛvācitvāt vṛttau 'kāvyatattvavidbhiri'ti kuto vyākhyātamityatastadavatārayati-kāvyeti /
GK16andhvc1u:127: dhvanisvarūpābhidhānasya dhvanisvarūpajñānaṃ prayojanam, asya ca sahṛdayamanaḥprītistaditi bhavati tadabhidhānasya tāddaśaprītistathā prayojanam /
GK16andhvc1u:128_0: prayojanaprayojanatāvacchedakakukṣau manaḥpadopādānaṃ ca bharatadarśanādhvanīnānāṃ prakriyāṃśe bhūmnā vyākaramadarśanānusāritvasphoraṇāya,
GK16andhvc1u:128_1: idamīye hi darśane sukhādiviśeṣaguṇānāṃ manoniṣṭatvamevābhimataṃ nātmaniṣṭatvam /
GK16andhvc1u:131_0: budhaiḥ kāvyatattvavidbhaḥ, kāvyasyātmā dhvaniriti saṃjñitaḥ, paramparayā yaḥ samāmnātapūrvaḥ samyak āsamantād mnātaḥ prakaṭitaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:131_1: tasya sahṛdayajanamanaḥprakāśamānasyāpyabhāvamanye locanam ātmaśabdasya tattvaśabdenārthaṃ vivṛṇvānaḥ sāratvamaparaśābdavailakṣamyakāritvaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:132: itiśabdaḥ svarūpaparatvaṃ dhvalaniśabdasyācaṣṭe, tadarthasya vivādāspadībhītatayā niścayābhāvenārthattvāyogāt /
GK16andhvc1u:134: vastutastu na tatsaṃjñāmātreṇoktam, api tvastyeva dhvaniśabdavācyaṃ pratyuta samastasārabhūtam /
GK16andhvc1u:139: aparebhyaḥśābdebhyaḥlaukikavaidikaśabdapratipādyebhyaḥ svasya yadvailakṣaṇyaṃ sahṛdayaślādhyatvādinā tatkāritvam, darśayati vyañjayati, tadarthasyeti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:140_0: ātmevātmetyātmaśabdo 'tra gauṇaḥ; tena cābādhitasvarūpatvarūpātmasāmyena dhvanirūpārtho lakṣyata iti jñāpanāya tattvaśabdena
GK16andhvc1u:140_1: tadarthaviviraṇaṃ, tena tasya sāratvādikaṃ vyaṅgyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:144: tatretiśabdaprayoge śabdasvarūpaparatvaṃ, prakṛte dhvanipadottaramitiśabdakaraṇāddhvaniśabdo 'yaṃ saṃjñārūpadhvaniśabdasya pratipādaka ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:145: tatsaṃjñāprakāreṇa saṃjñino bhānañjākṣepādinā bhavati yathā jātisaktipakṣe vyakterbhānam /
GK16andhvc1u:146: yadvā dhvanipadasya lakṣaṇayā dhvanisaṃjñita ityartha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:148: tadarthasya dhvaniśabdābhideyasya dhvanyamānatvaviśiṣṭasya, vivādāspadībhūtatayā dhvanirasti nāstīti vipratipattiviṣayatayā /
GK16andhvc1u:156_0: nanvevaṃ dhvaniśabdasya dhvanisaṃjñita ityarthakathane sati tasya 'sahṛdayamanaḥprakāśamānasyāpī'ti samanantaragranthavirodhaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:167: locanam evaṃ tu yuktataram--itiśabdo bhinnakramo vākyārthaparāmarśakaḥ, dhvanilakṣaṇo 'rthaḥ kāvyasyātmeti yaḥ samāmnāta iti /
GK16andhvc1u:168: śabdapadārthakatve hi dhvanisaṃjñito 'rtha iti kā saṅgatiḥ? evaṃ hi dhvaniśabdaḥ kāvyasyātmetyuktaṃ bhaved, gavityayamāheti yathā /
GK16andhvc1u:169: na ca vipratipattisthānamasadeva, pratyuta satyeva dharmiṇi dharmamātrakṛtā vipratipattirityalamaprastutena bhūyasā sahṛdayajanodvejanena /
GK16andhvc1u:170: budhasyaikasya prāmādikamapi tathābhidānaṃ syāt, na tu bhūyasāṃ tadyuktam /
GK16andhvc1u:173: avicchinnena pravāheṇa tairetaduktaṃ vināpi viśiṣṭapustakeṣu viniveśanādityabhiprāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:174: na ca budhā bhūyāṃso 'nādaraṇāyaṃ bālapriyā yādidaṃ saṃjñāprakāreṇa dhvanilakṣaṇaṃ vastu kāvyātmatvenābhihitaṃ tadaśraddhopahanyamānamānasajanabuddhyanurodhenaiva /
GK16andhvc1u:175: dhvanyamānatvaviśiṣṭārthasya sahṛdayapratītisiddhatayā tadbuddhyanurodhena ca samanantaragrantha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:176_0: yadvā nanvevaṃ dhvanipadasya dhvanisaṃjñita ityarthakatve kathamabhāvādivādipratyutthānam, teṣāṃ dhvanyamānatva eva vivādena
GK16andhvc1u:182: evaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ yocajanaṃ vyākyānaṃ veti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:189: samāmnāne kā vyāsyātmeti vākyārthapratipādakatvaṃ bodhayatītyarthaḥ, na tu tadvākyābhedamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:203: yathā śabdādau satyeva dharmiṇi nityatvānityatvādidharmakṛtā vipratipattiḥ, prakṛte ca dhvanisaṃjñite dharmiṇi guṇālaṅkārāntarbhūtatvabhāktatvādidharmakṛtā vipratipattirit bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:215: viśiṣṭapustakeṣu viniveśanaṃ lekhanena sthāpanaṃ, tasmādvināpyuktamiti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:220: pūrvagrahaṇenedamprathamatā nātra sambhāvyata ityāha, vyācaṣṭe ca --samyagāsamantād mnātaḥ prakaṭita ityanena /
GK16andhvc1u:223: ataḥ kiṃ kurmaḥ, apāraṃ maurkhyamabhāvavādināmiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:224: na cāsmābhirabhāvavādināṃ vikalpāḥ śrutāḥ, kuṃ tu sambhāvya dūṣayiṣyante, ataḥ parokṣatvam /
GK16andhvc1u:225: na ca bhaviṣyadvastu dūṣayituṃ yuktam, anutpannatvādeva /
GK16andhvc1u:226: tadapi buddhyāropitaṃ dūṣyata iti cet; buddhyāropitatvādeva bhaviṣyattvahāniḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:229: sambhāvanāpineyamasambhavato yuktā, api tu sambhavata eva, anyathā sambhāvanānāmaparyavasānaṃ bālapriyā ityabhiprāya iti /
GK16andhvc1u:240: jagaduriti liṭaḥ prayogasyopapattiṃ vṛttau vyācakṣīrannityādestadvivaraṇarūpatvādikañca darśayitumāha-na cetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:241: asmābhiḥ dhvanivādibhiḥ, viruddhāḥ kalpā vikalpā vikalpitārthāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:242: yadi na śrutāḥ kathantarhi dūṣayiṣyanta ityata āha-sambhāvyeti /
GK16andhvc1u:259: evaṃ liṭaḥ prayogaṃ prasādhyācakṣīrannityādiliṅprayogān prakṛtasaṅgatān darśayati-tahyākhyānāyaiveti /
GK16andhvc1u:260: liṭo vyākhyānāyaivetyarthaḥ, na tu svatantratayetyevakārārthaḥ. vyākhyānāyetyasya sambhāvyetyanena sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:261: nanvacakṣīrannityādibhireva jagadurityasya vāyakhyāne sambhavati kiṃ madhye tadabhāvavādināñjāmī ityādigranthenetyaśāṅkāvāraṇāyāvatārayati-sambhāvanāpīti /
GK16andhvc1u:270: na ca sambhavasyāpi sambhāvanā, api tu vartamānataiva sphuṭeti vartamānenaiva nirdeśaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:271: nanu cāsambhavadvastumūlayā sambhāvanayā yatsambhāvitaṃ taddūṣayitumaśakyamityāśaṅkyāha--vikalpā iti /
GK16andhvc1u:272: na tu vastu sambhavati tāddak yata iyaṃ sambhāvanā, api tu vikalpā eva /
GK16andhvc1u:273: te ca tattvāvabodhavandhtatayā sphureyurapi, ata eva 'ācakṣīran' ityādayo 'tra sambhāvanāviṣayā liṅprayogā atītaparamārthe paryavasyanti /
GK16andhvc1u:281: nanu sambhavantītyasya sthāne sambhāvyanta ityucyatāṃ tadāpratijñā cādau kṛtā syādityatrāha-sambhāvyanta itīti /
GK16andhvc1u:284: nanu sambhāvanāmūlabhūtassambhavo 'pi kiṃ sambhāvanīyaḥ? netyāha-na ceti /
GK16andhvc1u:289: vikalpā ityuktyā kathaṃ parihāra ityatastatprakāraṃ vyācaṣṭe-na tvityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:295: pramāṇayuktyābhāsābhyāmadhiṣṭānabhūte kāvyātmani dhvanisvarūpe viruddhatayā kalpyanta iti vikalpāḥ pakṣāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:301: yata iṃme pakṣā bhrāntikalpitāḥ, tata evetyārthaḥ. atīteti /
GK16andhvc1u:304: paryavasyantīti mūle jagaduriti liṭyoga iva vṛttāvācakṣīrannityādisambhāvanārthakaliṅprayogo 'pi kriyāyāḥ sambhāvanārūpabuddhyāropitatvanimittkabhūtatve paryavasyatīrtthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:318: yadi na syāttataḥ kiṃ syādityatrāpi, kiṃ vṛttaṃ yadi pūrvavanna bhavanasya sambhāvanetyayamevārtha ityalamaprakṛtena bahunā /
GK16andhvc1u:319_0: tatra samayāpekṣamena śabdo 'rthapratipādaka iti kṛtvā vācyavyātiriktaṃ nāsti vyaṅgyam, sadapi vā tadabhidhāvṛttyākṣiptaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:319_1: śabdāvagatārthabalākṛṣṭatvādbhāktam, tadanākṣiptamapi vā na vaktuṃ śakyaṃ kumārīṣviva bhartṛsukamatadvitsu iti traya evaite
GK16andhvc1u:320: tatrābāvavikalpasya trayaḥ prakārāḥ-śabdarthaguṇālaṅkārāṇāmeva śabdorthaśobhākāritvāllokaśāstrātiriktasundaraśabdārthamayasya bālapriyā kāyasya śarīrasya /
GK16andhvc1u:328: yadi nāmetyādipadyasya śeṣabhūtamidamekapādātmakaṃ vākyam-yadi na syāditi /
GK16andhvc1u:330: kintu yathāyathameva vyāvasthitāntarbahirbhāga evāyaṃ kāyassyāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:332: tadāpi kiṃ phalaṃ syādityarthaḥ. tadāpyatijugupsito 'yaṃ koyo niṣphala eva phalgutaraviṣayopabhogamātropayogitvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:335: yadi na bhavanasya sambhāvanā kiṃ vṛttamiti yojanā /
GK16andhvc1u:336: tataḥ kiṃ syādi tyāsya vivaraṇaṃ-kiṃ vṛttamiti /
GK16andhvc1u:337: tadāpi kiṃ phalaṃ jātaṃ na kiñcidityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:338: yadi na syādityasya vivaraṇaṃ yadi na bhavanasya sambhāvaneti /
GK16andhvc1u:339: pūrvavaditi vaidharmyeṇa dṛṣṭāntakathanaṃ, yadi nāmetyādau yathā bhavanasya sambhāvaneti /
GK16andhvc1u:340: ayamevārtha iti niṣedhasthale 'pi liṅassambhāvanaivārtha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:344: iti kṛtvā ityato hetoḥ, śabdasya saṅketitārthabodhakatvāditi yāvat /
GK16andhvc1u:346: vyaṅgyaṃ tattvenābhimatam, nāsti kāvye nāsti, vyaṅgyatvenābhimataṅkāvyapratipādyaṃ na bhavati kāvyaśabtadasaṅketitatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:350: abhidāvṛttyā abhidhāpucchabhūtayā vṛttyā lakṣaṇayā, ākṣiptaṃ bodhitam /
GK16andhvc1u:368_0: heturayaṃ vakṣyamāṇe sarvatra bodhyaḥ--yatra yatra kāvyaśobhākāritvaṃ tatra kāvyaśobhākāritvaṃ tatra tatraśabdārthaguṇādyanyatamatvamiti
GK16andhvc1u:368_1: locanam kāvyasya na śobhāhetuḥ kaścidanyo 'sti yo 'smābhirna gaṇita ityekaḥ prakāraḥ, yo vā na gaṇitaḥ sa śobhāhetuḥ kaścidanyo
GK16andhvc1u:368_2: 'sti yo 'smābhirna gaṇita ityekaḥ prakāraḥ, yo vā na gaṇitaḥ sa śobhākāryeva na bhavatīti dvitīyaḥ, atha śobhākārī bhavati
GK16andhvc1u:368_3: tarhyasmadukta eva guṇe vālaṅkāre vāntarbhavati, nāmāntarakaraṇe tu kiyadidaṃ pāṇḍityam /
GK16andhvc1u:369: athāpyukteṣu gumeṣvalaṅkāreṣu vā nāntarbhāvaḥ, tathāpi kiñcidviśeṣaleśamāśritya nāmāntarakaraṇamupamāvicchittiprakārāṇāmasaṃkhyatvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:371: tāvanmātreṇa ca kiṃ kṛtam? anyasyāpi vaicitryasya śakyotprekṣatvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:372: cirantanairhi bharatamuniprabhṛtibhiryamakopame eva śabdārthālaṅkāratveneṣṭe, tatprapañcadikpradarśanaṃ tvanyairalaṅkārakāraiḥ kṛtam /
GK16andhvc1u:373: tadyayā-'karmaṇyaṇ' ityatra kumbhakārādyudāharamaṃ śrutvā svayaṃ nagarakārādiśabdā utparekṣyante, tāvatā ka ātmani bahumānaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:378: guṇādyatiriktaḥ kāvyaśobhāhetuḥ kaścinnāstīti pratijñā, pramāṇābhāvāditi heturatra bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:379: nanviyaṃ pratijñā na yuktā, guṇādyatiriktasya śobhāhetossiddhau tanniṣedhāyogādasiddhau niṣedhasyāśakyatvāccetyata āha-yo 'smābhirityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:380: bhavatāmabhimata iti cārthātsiddhyati, tathā ca paramate pratiyogiprasiddhyā tanniṣedha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:385: nanu vyaṅgyasya śobhākāritvaṃ svasaṃvedasākṣikaṃ kathamapahnūyata ityataḥ prakārāntaramāha- athetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:391: nanu na kevalaṃ nāmāntarakaraṇameva, tannimittañcāstyato na guṇādyantarbhāva ityāśaṅkagamabhyupagacchati-athāpītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:396: asmaduktānāṃ gumādīnāṃ kāvyajīvitatvādiviśeṣamāśritya dhvanyādināmāntaraṃ bhavadbhiḥ kriyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:413: tatra ca śabdagatāścārutvahetavo 'nuprāsādayaḥ locanam tṛtīyaḥ prakāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:414: evamekastridhā vikalpaḥ, anyau ca dvauviti pañca vikalpā iti tātparyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:417: tatra śabdārthau na tāvaddhvaniḥ, yataḥ saṃjñāmātreṇa hi ko guṇaḥ? atha śabdārthayoścārutvaṃ sa dhvaniḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:419: tatra śabdānāṃ svarūpamātrakṛtaṃ cārutvaṃ śabdālaṅkārebhyaḥ, saṃghaṭanāśritaṃ tu śabdaguṇebhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:421: saṃghaṭanāparyavasitaṃ tvarthaguṇebhya iti na guṇālaṅkāravyatirikto dhvaniḥ kaścit /
GK16andhvc1u:424: yadguṇālaṅkāravyatiriktaṃ taccārutvakāri na bhavati, nityānityādoṣā asādhuduḥśravādaya iva /
GK16andhvc1u:425: cārutvahetuśca dhvaniḥ, tanna tadvyatiriktaiti vyatirekī hetuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:426: nanu vṛttayorītayaśca yathā guṇālaṅkāravyatiriktāścārutvahetavaśca, prasiddhā eva /
GK16andhvc1u:429: tadanatiriktavṛttayo vṛttayo 'pi locanam tathā dhvanirapi tadvyatiriktaśca cārutvahetuśca bhaviṣyatītyasiddho vyatireka ityanenābhiprāyeṇāha--tadanatiriktavṛttaya iti /
GK16andhvc1u:434: 'śabdārthaśarīram' ityādeḥ 'pratīyanta' ityantasya vṛttigranthasya sārārthaṃ vyākhyāyottaragranthaṃ prakṛtopayogaṃ darsayannavatārayati-nanvityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:436: yat guṇālaṅkāravyātiriktaṃ, taccārutvakāri neti vyatirekavyāpterguṇālaṅkāravyatiriktāsu cārutvahetutyā sampratipannāsu vṛttirītiṣu vyabhicārādasiddhirityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:446_0: dīptaṃ raudrādaurase, masṛṇaṃ madhuraṃ śṛṅgarādau, madhyamaṃ hāsyādau, tathāvidhaṃ yadvarṇanīyaṃ vibhāvādi, tadupayogityā
GK16andhvc1u:449: vivariṣyate cedamupari. vṛttaya ityuktāḥ vṛttaya iti vyavahṛtāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:466: tatra tṛtīyaḥ komalānuprāsa iti vṛttayo 'nuprāsajātaya eva /
GK16andhvc1u:467: na ceha vaiśoṣikavadvṛttirvivakṣitā, yena bālapriyā tisṛṣu vṛttiṣu paruṣādiṣu /
GK16andhvc1u:468: pṛthakpṛthak sarūpāṇāṃ sajātīyānāṃ vyañjanānāṃ nyāsaḥ upanibandhaḥ tam /
GK16andhvc1u:478: paruṣānuprāsaḥ masṛṇānuprāsa iti pāṭhastu anuprāsavṛtyoraikyābhiprāyeṇa yojyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:485: vaidagdhyavihīnā svabhāvataḥ asukumārā amadhurā, aparuṣā anudbaṇasvabhāvā ca yā grāmyavanitā, tatsādṛśyādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:488: anena grāmyāyā vṛtteḥ rūḍhā komalasaṃjñā ca bhaṭṭodbhaṭoktā darśitā /
GK16andhvc1u:490: yāḥ kaiścidupanāgarikādyāḥ prakāśitāḥ, tā api gatāḥ śravaṇagocaram /
GK16andhvc1u:491: locanam jātau jātimato vartamānatvaṃ na syāt, tadanugraha eva hi tatra vartamānatvam /
GK16andhvc1u:492: yathāha kaścit-- lokottare hi gāmbhīrye vartante pṛthivībhujaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:495: ata eva vyāpārabhedābhāvānna pṛthaganumeyasvarūpā apīti vṛttiśabdasya vyāpāravācino 'bhiprāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:497: udbhaṭādibhiḥ prayukte 'pi tasminnārthaḥ kaścodadhiko hṛdayapathamavatīrṇa ityabhiprāyeṇāha--gatāḥ avaṇagocaramiti /
GK16andhvc1u:498: bālapriyā śaṣāditattadvarṇaracanārūpāḥ paruṣādyā vṛttayo vastuto 'nuprāseṣu vartante /
GK16andhvc1u:500: yathā--gotvādijātayā gavādibiḥ. ataśca svāśrayābhivyaṅgyatvasāmyādvṛttīnāṃ jātitvopacāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:501: nanuvṛttirūpajātau tajjātimato 'nuprāsasya vartanamuktamayuktaṃ, vaiśeṣikamataviruddhatvādityata āha--na cetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:506: tarhi tatra vartanaṃ kinnāmetyata āha--tadanugraha eveti /
GK16andhvc1u:507: vṛttirūpajātikartṛkānugraha evetyartha. sa ca tatkartṛkaṃ bhedakadharmasamarpaṇaṃ rasābhivyañjanasāmarthyādhānaṃ vā /
GK16andhvc1u:513: nāstyatiriktā vṛttirvyāpāro yāsāṃ tā ityārthakatayā vyācaṣṭe-nābhyadhiketi /
GK16andhvc1u:514: anuprāsānāṃ yo vyāpāro rasavyañjanaviṣayaḥ, sa eva vṛttīnāmapīti bhāvaḥ. tadanatiriktā ityanuktvā evamukteḥ phalandaśayati-ata evetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:517: pṛthaganuprāsāvagamaṃ vinā nānumeyasvarūpāḥ, kintu vṛttivyāñjakavarṇaviśeṣarūpānuprāsaliṅgagamyā iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:519: anuprāsābhyadhikavyāpārasattve tu vṛttīnāṃ svarūpaṃ pṛthagabhidheyaṃ syāditi tadbhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:531_0: tacchabdenātra mādhuryādayo guṇāḥ, teṣāṃ ca samucitavṛttyarpaṇe yadanyonyamelanakṣamatvena pānaka iva guḍamaricādirasānāṃ
GK16andhvc1u:541: samucitādīptādivarṇanīyaucityavatī yā vṛttiḥ viśiṣṭā varṇaracanā, tasyāṃ yadguṇānāmarpaṇaṃ tasminnityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:542: samucitā tattadrasavyañjanocitā yā vṛttiḥ vyāpāraḥ, tadarpaṇe nimitte iti kecit /
GK16andhvc1u:550: tathā ca mādhuryādiguṇānāṃ pratyekaṃ prātisvalikarūpeṇa rītiśabdavācyatvaṃ nāsti, parantu viśiṣṭasaṅghātadharmavattayeti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:552: gauḍavidarbhapāñcālasambāndhano gauḍīyādayo ye desāsteṣāṃ tatratyākavīnāmiti yāvat /
GK16andhvc1u:553: viśiṣṭavarṇanaviṣaye yohevākaḥ svabhāvaḥ svācchandyaṃ vā, taṃ prācuryeṇa paśyatīti tena /
GK16andhvc1u:557: trividhamityanena rītigatamapi gauḍīyā vaidarbhī pāñjālīti trevidhyaṃ sūcitam /
GK16andhvc1u:569: prasiddhaprasthānavyatirekiṇaḥ kāvyaprakārasya kāvyatvahāneḥ locanam samudāyino nānya iti vṛttirītayo na gumālaṅkāravyatiriktā iti sthita evāsau vyatirekī hetuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:573: tenākhaṇḍabuddhisamāsvādyamapi kāvyamapoddārabuddhyā yadi vibhajyate, tathāpyatra dhvaniśabdavācyo na kaścidatirikto 'rtho labhyata iti nāmaśabdenāha /
GK16andhvc1u:574: nanu mā bhūdasau śabdārthasvābhāvaḥ, mā ca bhūttaccārutvahetuḥ, tena guṇālaṅkāravyatirikto 'sau syādityāśaṅkya dvitīyamabhāvavādaprakāramāha--anya iti /
GK16andhvc1u:584: 'ko 'yami' tyatra kiśabdaḥ kimeṣa cārutvasthānamuta cārutvaheturiti vikalpaniṣedhaparaścetyāśayena vivṛṇoti-naiṣa ityādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:589: kiṃśabde naivoktārthe labdhe ki nāmaśabdenetyata āha--tenetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:594_0: etāvatā śabdārthatadgumālaṅkāravyatiriktasya kāvyaśobhāhetutvaviśiṣṭasya dhvanerabhāva eva siddhaḥ, na tu svarūpeṇa dhvanerabhāva
GK16andhvc1u:598: cārutvahetutvāddhi guṇādyantarbhāva āpāditaḥ, tadanahgīkāre tu tadvyatiriktadhvanisadbhāvassambhāvanārha evetyārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:610: na ca tatsamayāntaḥpātinaḥ locanam cāsau nṛttagītavādyādisthānīyaḥ kāvyasya kaścit /
GK16andhvc1u:614: prasiddhaṃ prasthānaṃ śabdārthau tadguṇālaṅkārāśceti, pratiṣṭante paramparayā vyavaharanti yena mārgeṇa tatprasthānam /
GK16andhvc1u:622: nanu ye tāddaśamapūrvaṃ kāvayarūpatayā jānanti, ta eva sahṛdayāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:623: bālapriyā kāvyasya samudāyitayā sambandhitvena hyasau vaktavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:624: na ca guṇādibhyo vyatireke sati kāvyasambandhitvamasya śacakyopapādaṃ, nṛttgītādivat /
GK16andhvc1u:625: tadayaṃ prayogaḥ--vivādādhyāsito dhvaniḥ, na kāvyaṃ, śabdārthātiriktatvāt; na ca kāvyasambandhī, tadguṇālaṅkārātiriktatvāt, nṛttagītādivaditi /
GK16andhvc1u:626: na ca sādhyavikalo dṛṣṭāntaḥ, teṣāmakavanīyatvena kāvyatvābhāvasya tatsambanditvābhāvasya ca prasiddhatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:651: jānantītyanena 'tatsamayāntaḥ pātinaḥ sahṛdayān kāṃścidi'ti sahṛdayān kāṃścitparikalpya tatprasidyā dhvanau kāvyavyapadeśaḥ pravartito 'pi sakalavidvanmanogrāhitāmavalambate /
GK16andhvc1u:652: locanam tadabhimatatvaṃ ca nāma kāvyalakṣaṇamuktaprasthānātirekiṇa eva bhaviṣyatītyāśaṅkyāha--na ceti /
GK16andhvc1u:653_0: yathā hi khaṅgalakṣaṇaṃ karomītyukatvā ātānavitānātmā prāvriyamāṇaḥ sakaladehācchādakaḥ sukumāraścitratantuviracitaḥ saṃvartanavivartanasahiṣṇuracchedakaḥ
GK16andhvc1u:653_1: succhedya utkṛṣṭaḥ khaṅga iti bruvāṇāḥ, paraiḥ paṭaḥ khalvevaṃvidho bhavati na khaṅga ityayuktatāya paryanuyujyamāna evaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:663: ata eva iti bruvāṇa iti vakṣyate /
GK16andhvc1u:678: iddaśaḥ padārtha eva mama khaṅgatvenābhipreta ityartaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:681: nanvamuyā sopahāsoktyā kiṃ jātam? na naḥ kiñcicchinnamityata āha--prasiddhamiti /
GK16andhvc1u:686: vidvanmanasāmucita viṣaya eva pravṛttisambhavādvidvatpadena uktābiprāyassūcita iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:689: nanu mābhūtsakalavidvanmanogrāhitā, pūnarapare tasyābhāvamanyathā kathayeyuḥ--na sambhavatyeva dhvanirnāmāpūrvaḥ kaścit /
GK16andhvc1u:691: locanam evaṃ hi kṛte 'pi na kiñcitkṛtaṃ syādunmattatā paraṃ prakaṭiteti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:692: yastvatrābhiprāyaṃ vyācaṣṭe--jīvitabhūto dhvanistāvattavābhimataḥ, jīvitaṃ ca nāma prasiddhaprasthānātiriktamalaṅkārakārairanuktatvāttacca na kāvyamiti loke prasiddhamita /
GK16andhvc1u:694: yadi hi tatkāvyasyanuprāṇakaṃ tenāṅgīkṛtaṃ pūrvapakṣavādinā taccirantanairanuktamiti pratyuta lakṣaṇārhameva bhavati /
GK16andhvc1u:696_0: nanu bhavatvasau cārutvahetuḥ śabdārthaguṇālaṅkārāntarbhūtaśca, tathāpi dhvanirityamuyā bhāṣayā jīvitamityasau na kenacidukta
GK16andhvc1u:699: bālapriyā ko doṣa ityata āha--evaṃ hītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:700: abhinavaparikalpitasahṛdayahṛdayāhlādakāritvātmakalakṣaṇe kṛte, kiñcillakṣaṇaṃ kṛtanna syāt, parantu unmattataiva prakāśitā syānna tu vidvattetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:721: evamapyasau dhvanirityamuyā bhāṣayā jīvitamiti na kenaciduktaḥ dhvaniḥ kāvyātmeti kenāpi lakṣaṇakāreṇa noktamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:725: vuño bhāvarthatve cārutvahetvantarbhāvoktiranupapannā syādato vyacaṣṭe-kamanīyasya karmeti /
GK16andhvc1u:730: teṣāmanyatamasyaiva vā apūrvasamākhyāmātrakaraṇe yatkiñcana kathanaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:731_0: kiñca vāgvikalpānāmānantyātsambhavatyapi vā kasmiṃścitkāvyalakṣamavidhāyibhiḥ prasiddhairapradarśate prakāraleśe dhvanirdhviniriti
GK16andhvc1u:740: yadāhuḥ--'kāvyasobhāyāḥ kartāro dharmā guṇāḥ, tadatiśayahetavastvalaṅkārāḥ' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:742: dhvanirdhvanirit vīpsayā sambhramaṃ sūcayannādaraṃ darśayati--nṛtyata iti /
GK16andhvc1u:743: tallakṣaṇakṛdbhistadyuktakāvyavidhāyibhistacchravaṇodbhūtacamatkāraiśca bālapriyā 'kiñca vāgvikalpānām' ityādigranthaṃ vyākhyāsyamānaṃ manasikṛtyāvatārayati locanenanviti /
GK16andhvc1u:745: vividhaṃ chidyanta iti vicchittayaḥ vaicitryāṇi, tāsām /
GK16andhvc1u:751: 'vāgvikalpānām' ityatra vākpadaṃ nānārthakaṃ vikalpapadaṃ vecitryārthakamiti vyācaṣṭe-vaktītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:772: keciddhvanilakṣaṇakṛtaḥ, kecittadyuktakāvyavidhāyinaḥ, kecittatkāvyaśravaṇodbhūtacamatkārāḥ tatra hetuṃ na vidmaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:773: sahastraśo hi mahātmabhiranyairalaṅkāraprakārāḥ prakāśitāḥ prakāśyante ca /
GK16andhvc1u:776: na tvasya kṣodakṣamaṃ tattvaṃ kiñcidapi prakāśayituṃ śakyam /
GK16andhvc1u:777: tathā cānyena kṛta evātra ślokaḥ--- yasminnasti na vastu kiñcina manaḥprahlādi sālaṅkṛti locanam pratipattṛbhiriti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:780: svayaṃ darpaḥ paraiśca stūyamānatetyarthaḥ. vāgvikalpāḥ vākpravṛttihetupratibhāvyāpāraprakārā iti vā /
GK16andhvc1u:783_0: yataḥ śobhāhetutve guṇālaṅkārebhyo na vyatirikta, yataśca vyatiriktatve na śobhāhetuḥ, yataśca śobāhetutve 'pi nādarāspadaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:783_1: tasmādityarthaḥ. na ceyamabhāvasambhāvanā nirmūlaiva dūṣitetyāha--tathā cānyeneti /
GK16andhvc1u:798: nirmūlaiva satī na dūpitā, kintu samūlaiveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:802_0: na cāsya 'yasminni'tyādiślokasya śrutatvena 'jagadu'riti liṅbodhyasya pārokṣyasya samarthanāya 'na cāsmābhirabhāvavādināṃ
GK16andhvc1u:802_1: vikalpāḥ śrutāḥ' iti prāguktaṃ kathaṃ saṅgacchata iti vācyam /
GK16andhvc1u:803: yathāśrutārthakasyāsya ślokasya śrutatve 'pi pūrvopadarśitānāṃ bahūnāmabhāvavādaprakārāṇāṃ viśiṣyāśrutatvena tadvacanasya tatparatvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:804: granthakṛdityādinā matsaraṃ tadukterhetutvena vyutpannai racitaṃ ca naiva vacanairvakroktiśūnyaṃ ca yat /
GK16andhvc1u:805: kāvyaṃ taddhvaninā samanvitamiti prītyā praśaṃsañjaḍo no vidmo 'bhidadhāti kiṃ sumatinā pṛṣṭaḥ svarūpaṃ dhvaneḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:807: yato na sālaṅkṛti, ato na manaḥprahlādi /
GK16andhvc1u:809: vyutpannai racitaṃ ca naiva vacanairiti śabdālaṅkārāṇām /
GK16andhvc1u:816: jaḍena pṛṣṭo bhrūbhaṅgakaṭākṣādibhirevottaraṃ dadattatsvarūpaṃ kāmamācakṣīteti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:818: tathā hi tṛtīyābhāvaprakāranirūpaṇopakrame punaḥśabdasyāyamevābiprāyaḥ, upasaṃhāraikyaṃ ca saṅgacchate /
GK16andhvc1u:829_0: 'naiva racitañca', tathā yat 'vakroktiśūnyañja' bhavati, tat tathāvidhamarthālaṅkārādiśūnyaṃ 'kāvyaṃ dhvaninā samanvitamiti
GK16andhvc1u:829_1: prītyā praśaṃsan jaḍaḥ dhvalanessvarūpaṃ sumatinā pṛṣṭassan kimabhidadhāti /
GK16andhvc1u:836: abhāva ukta ityasya śabdālaṅkārāṇāṃ śabdārthaguṇānāmityanayorapi sambandho bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:847: yadvā-gate anyagamane gatamanugamanaṃ gatānugataṃ tadeṣāmastīti gatānukatikāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:851: kimityete vikalpāḥ prarasparasambaddhā vyākhyātā iti śaṅkāyāṃ vṛttigranthānuguṇyādityāha--evamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:858: bhajyate sevyate tadārthena prasiddhatayotprekṣyata iti bhaktirdharmo 'bhidheyena sāmīpyādiḥ, tata āgato bhākto lākṣaṇiko 'rthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:863: yadi punaśaśabdasya viśeṣārthakatvaṃ, tadā apare punariti vaktavyaṃ, tadapahāya punaśśabdasyādau pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:877: gaṅgādipadalakṣyatīrādyarthenetyarthaḥ. nanvatra padārthakartṛkaṃ sevanannāma kimityata āha-utprekṣyata iti /
GK16andhvc1u:883: tena ca vaktuḥ pratipatturvā tīrādergaṅgadipadena pratipādane sāmīpyādernimittatvena paryālocanarūpaṃ yadutprekṣaṇantadatra vivakṣitamityāha-prasiddhatayotprekṣyata iti /
GK16andhvc1u:891: locanam guṇasamudāyavṛtteḥ śabdasyārthabhāgastaikṣṇyādirbhaktiḥ, tata āgato gauṇo 'rtho bhāktaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:892_0: bhaktiḥ pratipādye sāmīpyataikṣṇyādau śraddhātisayaḥ, tāṃ prayojanatvenoddiśya tata bālapriyā gauṇārthasyāpyuktarītyaiva
GK16andhvc1u:893: guṇasamudāye vṛttiryasya, tasya guṇasamudāyaṃ pratipādayata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:896: siṃhādiśabdā hi siṃhatvādijātiṃ tadviśiṣṭavyakti vā abhidadhānā api svārthāvinābhūtān śauryādiguṇānapyākṣepātpratipādayantīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:900: kecittu-guṇasamudāyavṛtterityāsya guṇādvārā samudāye guṇini māmavakādau vṛttiryasya tasyetyarthamāhuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:907: nanu gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādistale lakṣyatīrādau gaṅgāgatapāvanatvādikameva pratipādyaṃ, na tu sāmīpyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:908: evaṃ siṃho māṇavaka ityādau māṇavakādau siṃhāditādrūpyaṃ parākramātiśayādikaṃ vā /
GK16andhvc1u:911: tathā ca sāmīpyataikṣaṇyādāvityuktiḥ kathaṃ saṅgacchata iti cet; atra kecit-pāṭho 'yaṃ lekhakapramādāgataḥ pāvanatvādāvityeva paṭhanīyamiti /
GK16andhvc1u:912: pare tu-sāmīpyādeḥ paramparayā prayojanasādhanatvatsāmīpyapadena pāvanatvādikaṃ taikṣṇyapadena siṃhatādrūpyādikañca lakṣaṇayāvivakṣitamato nāsaṅgatirityāhuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:914: śraddhā vakturmanasā bhajanamanusandhānātmakaṃ, tasyā atiśaya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:929: locanam āgato bhākta iti gauṇo lākṣaṇikaśca /
GK16andhvc1u:930: mukhyasya cārthasya bhaṅgo bhaktirityevaṃ mukhyārthabādhā, nimittaṃ, prayojanamiti trayasadbhāva upacārabījamityuktaṃ bhavati /
GK16andhvc1u:932_0: sāmānādhikaraṇyasyāyaṃ bhāvaḥ--yadyapyavivakṣitavācye dhvanibhede 'niḥśvāsāndha ivādarśaḥ'ityādāvupacāro 'sti, tathāpi na
GK16andhvc1u:932_1: tātmaiva dhvaniḥ, tahyatirekeṇāpi bhāvat, vivakṣitānyaparavācyaprabhedādau avivakṣitavācye 'pyupacāra eva, na dhvaniriti
GK16andhvc1u:942: bālapriyā bhaṅgarthavyākhyānasya mukhyārthabādhārūpabījasiddhiḥ, sevanarūpārthavyākhyānasya nimittasiddhiḥ, śraddhātiśayārthavyākhyānasya prayojanasiddhiśca phalamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:948: nanu dhvanirnāma guṇavṛttivyātirekī nāstīti vaktavye sāmānādhikaraṇyena nirdeśasya ko 'bhiprāya ityata āha-sāmānādhikaraṇyasyeti /
GK16andhvc1u:949: 'taṃ bhāktam' iti mūle 'dhvanisaṃjñitam' ityādinā vṛttau ca sāmānādhikaraṇyena nirdeśasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:953_1: siddhāntaviruddhatādātmyapakṣopakṣepārtho 'yaṃ sāmānādikaraṇyena nirdeśa iti bhāva ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:966: mūlakāra iti śeṣaḥ. vṛttau 'gumavṛttiri'ti bhāktaśabdasya vyākhyānaṃ tatpadena prakṛte vivakṣitānarthānvivṛṇoti--guṇā ityādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:968_0: yadyapi ca dhvaniśabdasaṃkīrtanena kāvyalakṣaṇavidhāyibhirguṇavṛttiranyo vā na kaścitprakāraḥ prakāśitaḥ, tathāpi amukhyavṛttyā
GK16andhvc1u:968_1: kāvyeṣu vyāvahāraṃ locanam guṇāḥ sāmīpyādayo dharmāstaikṣṇyādayaśca /
GK16andhvc1u:969: tairupāyairvṛttirarthontare yasya, tairupāyervṛttirvā śabdasya yatra sa guṇavṛtti- śabdo 'rtho vā /
GK16andhvc1u:971: etaduktaṃ bhavati--dhvanatīti vā, dhvanyata iti vā, dhvananamiti vā yadi dhvaniḥ, tathāpyupacaritaśabdārthavyāpārātirikto nāsau kaścit /
GK16andhvc1u:972: mukhyārthe hyabhidhaiveti pāriśeṣyādamukhya eva dhvanaḥ, tṛtīyarāśyabhāvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:987: nanu yadi dhvanyabhāvābhiprāyeṇa dhvanerguṇavṛtyabhedaḥ sādhyate, tarhyabhidhāyā abhedo 'pi sādhyatāmityātrāha-mukhyārtha iti /
GK16andhvc1u:991: śiṣyamāṇe saṃpratyayaḥ pariśeṣaḥ, sa eva pāriśeṣyam, tasmādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:994: vācakavācyābhidhārūpaḥ prathamo rāśiḥ, lakṣakalakṣyalakṣaṇārūpo dvitīyaḥ, vyañjakavyaṅgyavyañjānarūpastṛtīyo bhavadabhimataḥ, tasyābhāvādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:995: tathā ca dhvanirnāma guṇavṛttireva, amukhyatvāditi phalitam /
GK16andhvc1u:1000: vṛttau 'anyo ve'tyātra guṇavṛtternyo mukhya ityarthabhramaḥ syādato vyācaṣṭa-guṇoti /
GK16andhvc1u:1002: yathā abhāvavādibhirdhvanirguṇālaṅkāraprakāra iti noktaṃ, tathā bhāktavādibhiripi dhvanirguṇavṛttiriti kaṇṭhato noktamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1003: darśayatā dhvanimārgau manākspṛṣṭo 'pi na lakṣita iti pariklpyaivamuktam-'bhāktamāhustamanye' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:1007: bhāmahenoktaṃ--'śabdāśchandobhidānārthāḥ' iti abhidhānasya śabdādbhedaṃ vyākhyātuṃ bhaṭṭodbhaṭo babhāṣe--'śabdānābhidhānamabhidhāvyāpāro mukhyo guṇavṛtiśca' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:1010: taistāvaddhvanidigunmīlitā, yathāliśitapāṭhakaistu bālapriyā darśayate'ti manāk sparśe hetuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1012: anena kāvyalakṣaṇavidhāyina eva vivakṣitā ityāśayena pūrayati-bhaṭṭetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1014: lokoyuktiḥ kalāśceti mantavyāḥ kāvyahetavaḥ' iti śiṣṭaṃ pādatrayam /
GK16andhvc1u:1021: tathā cā'bhidhānam' iti vacanena bhāmaho 'guṇavṛtti'riti vacanena bhaṭṭoṭbhaṭo 'lakṣaṇe'ti vacanena vāmanaśca kāvyeṣu guṇavṛtyā vyavahāraṃ darśitavanta iti phalitārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1022: 'dhvanimārgo manāk spṛṣṭo 'pi na lakṣitaḥ 'ityamuṃ bhāgaṃ pūrvaṃpakṣopakṣepānuguṇyena vyācaṣṭe-taistāvadityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1025_0: guṇavṛtteḥ prayojanāvinābhāvātprayojanasya ca vakṣyamāṇavidhayā vyañjanavyāpāraikagocaratvacca guṇavṛtyā vyacavahāraṃ darśayadbhireva
GK16andhvc1u:1026_0: tairdhvanimārgasya sparśe 'pi lakṣaṇakaraṇena pṛthak tatsvarūpasyānirūpaṇādguṇavṛttireva dhvaniḥ, na tadatirikta iti taduktimarthasiddhāmupajīvyedaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:1027: tu śabdaḥ parantvityarthe . na lakṣita ityāsya vyākhyānam--tatsvarūpaviveko na kṛta iti /
GK16andhvc1u:1029_0: tenevaṃvidhāsu vimatiṣu sthitāsu sahṛdayamanaḥprītaye locanam svarūpavivekaṃ kartumaśaknuvadbhistatsvarūpaviveko na kṛtaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:1031: yadyevaṃ na yojyate tadā dhvanimārgaḥ spṛṣṭa iti pūrvapakṣābhidhānaṃ virudhyate /
GK16andhvc1u:1050: yathāśrutaṃ vicāraṃ vinā yattadgranthānāṃ lakṣyabhūtānāṃ dhniyuktakāvyagranthānāmudgrahaṇaṃ dhāraṇaṃ tanmātreṇetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1055_0: 'iti parikalpye'tyāderayamarthaḥ--yato bhaṭṭoṭbhaṭādibhirdhvanimārgasparśamātraṃ kṛtaṃ, na tu dhvanisvarūpavivecanaṃ, pratyuta
GK16andhvc1u:1055_1: tadupālambhaśca, tato hetorbhaktireva dhvanirna tadatirikta iti tadabhiprāyamuktiparyantaṃ kalpayitvā 'bhāktamāhustamanye'
GK16andhvc1u:1056_0: nanu 'dhvanamārga' ityādigranthaḥ kimarthamevaṃ vyākhyātaḥ? dhvanermārgaḥ-mṛgyate 'nviṣyate vicāryate iti mārgaḥ avivakṣitavācyalakṣaṇo
GK16andhvc1u:1056_1: bhedaḥ spṛṣṭaḥ jñāta iti kuto na vyākhyāta ityata āha--yadyevamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1058: dhvanyavāntarabhedasya jñāne sati guṇavṛttireva dhvanirna tadatirikta iti vacanamasaṅgataṃ bhavedityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1059: yadvā-nanu 'na lakṣita' iti grantho na dṛṣṭa iti yathāśrutārthaparatayā kuto na vyākhyāta ityata āha--yadyevamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1062: dhvaneḥ spṛṣṭatvasyāddaṣṭatvasya ca vacanaṃ viruddhaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1070: locanam prācyā hi viparyastā eva sarvathā /
GK16andhvc1u:1072: antyāstvanapahnuvānā api lakṣayituṃ na jānata iti krameṇa viṣaryāsasandehājñānāprādhānyameteṣām /
GK16andhvc1u:1074: ekaiko 'pyayaṃ vipratipattirūpo vākyārtho nirūpaṇe hetutvaṃ pratipadyata ityekavacanam /
GK16andhvc1u:1076_0: āsu madhye eko 'pi yo vimatiprakārastenaiva hetunātatsvarūpaṃbrūma iti, dhvanisvarūpamabhidheyam, abhidānābhidheyalakṣaṇo
GK16andhvc1u:1078: tuśabdaḥ pūrvebhyo viśeṣaṃ dyotayati, tamāha--tadrūpaṃ jānānā apīti /
GK16andhvc1u:1088: viparyāsasyā dhvanisvarūpajijñāsāṃ prati pratibandhakatvaṃ, sandehasya tvanukūlatvalamatastadvatoḥ pūrvāpekṣayottarasyotkarṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1096: ekavacanena tu teṣāṃ pratyekaṃ hetutvamastīti bodhyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1103_0: 'tasyābhāvaṃ jagaduḥ' 'tena tatsvarūpaṃ brūmaḥ 'bhāktamāhuḥ' tasyahi dhvaneḥ svarūpaṃ sakalasatkavikāvyopaniṣadbhūtamatiramaṇīyamaṇīyasībhirapi
GK16andhvc1u:1103_2: sambandhaḥ, vimitinivṛttyā tatsvarūpajñānaṃ prayojanam, śāstraprayojanayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvassambandha ityuktam /
GK16andhvc1u:1104: atha śrotṛgataprayojanaprayojanapratipādakaṃ 'sahṛdayamanaḥprītaye' iti bhāgaṃ vyākhyātumāha-tasya hīti /
GK16andhvc1u:1106: dhvaneḥ svarūpaṃ lakṣayatāṃ sambandhini bālapriyā 'tena brūmaḥ' 'kecidūcuḥ' tena brūmaḥ' iti pṛthak pṛtak yojanā labhyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1107: avatārikoktarītyā 'tena tatsvarūpaṃ brūma' ityanena pradarśitamabhidheyādikaṃ śrotṛpravṛttyaṅgaṃ prasaṅgāddarśayati-dhvanisvarūpamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1118: vipratipattyupanyāsapūrvakaṃ 'tena brūma' ityuktyā vimatinivṛtteḥ prayojanatvaṃ labhyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1127: śrotṛgataṃ prayojanaṃ pūrvektaṃ vimatinivṛttyā saha dhvanisvarūpajñānaṃ. tasya yatprayojanaṃ prītirūpaṃ tatpratipādakamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1128: 'lakṣayatā'mityādibhāgasyaiva 'sahṛdaye'tyādyaṃśavyākhyārūpatvādavaśiṣṭasya taccheṣatvācca vyākhyātumāhe tyuktaṃ, na tu vyācaṣṭa iti /
GK16andhvc1u:1132_0: locanam manasi ānando nirvṛtyātmā camatkārāparaparyāyaḥ, pratiṣṭāṃ parairviparyāsādyupahatairanunmūlyamānatvena sthemānaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:1132_1: labhatāmiti prayojanaṃ sampādayituṃ tatsvarūpaṃ prakāśyata iti bālapriyā tenātra vivakṣitamāha--nirvṛttyātmeti /
GK16andhvc1u:1133: nanu hetvantaraprāpitāpratiṣṭatva eva 'pratiṣṭāṃ labhatām' ityukteḥ prasaktirityata āha-parairityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1141: kārikāyāṃ 'prītaye' ityatraprītiṃ sampādayitumityarthe 'kriyārthe' tyādisūtreṇa caturthīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1145: atra 'tena tattvarūpaṃ brūma' ityuktyā vimitinivṛttestatsvarūpavacanaprayojanatvaṃ yadyapi labhyate, tathāpi tasyāḥ na mukhyaprayojanatvam, kintu prītereva /
GK16andhvc1u:1147: prayojanaṃ ca nāma tatsampādakavastuprayoktṛtāpārāṇatayaiva tathā bhavatītyāśayena 'prītaye tatsvarūpaṃ brūma' ityekavākyatayā vyākhyeyam /
GK16andhvc1u:1149: sakalaśabdena satkaviśabdena ca prakāralese kasmiṃściditi nirākaroti /
GK16andhvc1u:1151: na hi 'siṃho baṭuḥ' 'gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ' ityatra ramyatā kācit /
GK16andhvc1u:1154: atha cetyādinā 'tatsamayāntaḥpātina' bālapriyā ityamumartha prayojanapadārthanirvacanapūrvakaṃ pradarśayati-prayojanañcetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1156: tasya prayojanasya sampādakaṃ yadvastu tasya, tatpratīti yāvat /
GK16andhvc1u:1157: yā prayoktṛtā prayojakatā, sā prāṇo yasya tadbhāvenaiva tatprerakatvasvabhāvaśālitayaiveti yāvat /
GK16andhvc1u:1164: atra vimatinivṛtteḥ na dhvanisvarūpavacanaprayojakatā, tajjñānavattasyāḥ svayamapuruṣārthatvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:1165: kintu prītereveti saiva tasya mukhyaṃ prayojanam /
GK16andhvc1u:1171_0: atastathā tanmūlaṃ vṛttikṛtā vyākhyātamiti vimatinivṛtterapi mukhyaprayojanatvasambhave 'tena tatsvarūpaṃ brūmaḥ' 'sahṛdayamanaḥprītaye
GK16andhvc1u:1171_1: tatatsvarūpaṃ mūḥ' iti ca vyākhyeyatayā vākyabhedaḥ syāditi ca bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1180_0: yataḥ sakalaśabdena nikhilaviṣayavyāptatvaṃ satkaviśabdena pramāṇasiddhatvātprādhānyaṃ coktaṃ, tasmādakhilakāvyaviṣayavyāptyamāvakṛtamaprādhānyakṛtaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:1191: atha ca rāmāyaṇamahābhārataprabhṛtini lakṣye sarvatra prasiddhavyavahāraṃ lakṣayatāṃ sahṛdayānāmānando manasi labhatāṃ pratiṣṭhāmiti prakāśyate // DhvA_1.1 //
GK16andhvc1u:1193: rāmāyaṇamahābhārataśabdenādikaveḥ prabhṛti sarvaireva sūribhirasyādaraḥ kṛta iti darśayati /
GK16andhvc1u:1196: lakṣema virūpayanti lakṣayanti, teṣāṃ lakṣaṇadvāreṇa nirūpayatāmitayarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1198: yeṣāṃ kāvyānuśīlanābhyāsavaśādviśadībhūte manomukure varṇanīyatanmayībhavanayogyatā te svahṛdayasaṃvādabhājaḥ bālapriyā anenādyābhāvavādo nirākṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1200: 'tatsvarūpaṃ brūma' ityasya lakṣaṇapradarśanena dhvanisvarūpaṃ prakāśayāma iti svalvarthaḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:1213: manasau mukurarūpaṇena svato vaiśadye 'pi saṃskāravaśādatirekaḥ prakāśyate /
GK16andhvc1u:1221: svahṛdayameva saṃvādaḥ saṃvādakapramāṇaṃ, tadbhājaḥ vimalatareṇa hṛdayena sahavartanta ityavayavārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1223: asman pakṣe samānaṃ hṛdayaṃ yeṣāmiti bahuvrīhiriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1225: yathoktam-- yo 'rtho hṛdayasaṃvādī tasya bhāvo rasodbhavaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1229: rasacarvaṇātmanaḥ prādhānyaṃ darsayan rasadhvanereva sarvatra mukhyabhūtamātmatvamiti darśayati /
GK16andhvc1u:1230: tena yaduktam--- dhanirnāmāparo yo 'pi vyāpāro vyañjanātmakaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1231: tasya siddhe 'pi bhede syātkarvye 'śatevaṃ na rūpatā  //
GK16andhvc1u:1233: tathā hyabhidhābhāvanārasacarvaṇātmake 'pi tryaṃśe kāvye rasacarvaṇā tāvajjīvitabhūteti bhavato 'pyavivādo 'sti /
GK16andhvc1u:1234: yathoktaṃ tvayaiva-- kāvye rasayitā sarvo na boddhā na niyogabhākt /
GK16andhvc1u:1238: yaḥ hṛdayasaṃvādī svahṛdayena tanmayībhavanalakṣaṇasaṃvādaśīlaḥ, tadviṣayaḥ sahṛdayaślādhyo vibhāvādilakṣaṇo 'rthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1249: rasacarvaṇaivātmā svarūpaṃ yasya sa ānandaḥ tasya /
GK16andhvc1u:1252: vastvalaṅkāraraseṣu rasadhvanereva prādhānyamitarayostu tatparyavasāyitayā gaiṃṇamiti darśayitumetaduktamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1265: vastuto nirūpyamāṇe bhedo na sidhyatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1267: tasya kāvye aṃśatvaṃ syāt rūpatā ātmatvarūpamaṃśitvam /
GK16andhvc1u:1280: na boddhā itihāsādāviva boddhā sarvo na, tathā na niyogabhāk vedādāviva niyojyaḥ locanam tadvastvalaṅkāradhvanyabhiprāyeṇāṃśamātratvamiti siddhasādhanam /
GK16andhvc1u:1284: śrotṝṇāṃ ca vyutpattiprītī yadyapi staḥ,yathoktam-- dharmārthakāmamokṣeṣu vaicakṣaṇyaṃ kalāsu ca /
GK16andhvc1u:1288_0: anyathā prabhusaṃmitebhyo vedādibhyo mittrasaṃmitebhyaścetihāsādibhyo vyutpattihetubhya- ko 'sya kāvyarūpasya vyutpattihetorjāyāsaṃmititvalakṣaṇo
GK16andhvc1u:1290: anena rasacarvaṇāyā adhikārasampādakatvavacanena tasyāḥ prādhānyema jīvitatvamuktameveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1294: na niyogabhāk prabhuriva na niyogakartetyartha iti vyācakṣate /
GK16andhvc1u:1304: nanu kīrtyādiphalāntarāṇāmapi sattvāt 'sahṛdayamanaḥprītaye' ityasyopalakṣaṇatvamabhyupetya tānyapi kuto noktānītyatrāha--tetretyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1305: tatra iti prādhānyenānanda evokta iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1317: asya kāvyarūpasya vedādibhyaḥ itihāsādibhyaśca ko viśeṣaḥ? vyutpattihetutvasya samānatvena viśeṣo va syādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1320: caturvargavyutpatterapi cānanda eva pāryantikaṃ mukhyaṃ phalam /
GK16andhvc1u:1322: tena sa ānandavardhanācārya etacchāstradvārema sahṛdayahṛdayeṣu pratiṣṭāṃ devatāyatanādivadanaśvarīṃ sthitiṃ gacchatviti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1324: āsta eva nirātaṅkaṃ kāntaṃ kāvyamayaṃ vapuḥ  //
GK16andhvc1u:1326: yathā manasi pratiṣṭā evaṃvidhamasya manaḥ, sahṛdayacakravartī khatvayaṃ granthakṛditi yāvat /
GK16andhvc1u:1328: svanāmaprakajīkaraṇaṃ śrotṝṇāṃ pravṛttyaṅgameva bālapriyā vadādiprabhṛtīnāṃ prabhvadisammitatvaṃ kāvyapradīpādau vivṛtam /
GK16andhvc1u:1331: bhāmahavanacanaṃ tu dharmādivyutpatteḥ kīrteścāṅgatayā phalatvābhiprāyakaṃ, na tu mukhyatayetyāha-caturvargeti /
GK16andhvc1u:1332: caturvargavyutpatterapi ca pāryantikaṃ phalamānanda eveti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1343: pratiṣṭāśabdo hi devatānāṃ tatsamucitāyatane sthitau prasiddha ityato devatetyādiddaṣṭāntakathanam /
GK16andhvc1u:1347: śāstradvāreṇa vartanaṃ nāma śāstrasyaiva vartanamityabhiprāyeṇa bhāmahavacanaṃ saṃvādayati-yathoktamiti /
GK16andhvc1u:1349: yathā manasi sahṛdayamanasi pratiṣṭā bhavati, evaṃvidhaṃ tathāvidham /
GK16andhvc1u:1355: anena granthakṛto 'pi kīrtidvārā prītirūpaṃ phalaṃ bhavatīti darśatam /
GK16andhvc1u:1363: evaṃ granthakṛtaḥ kaveḥ śrotuśca mukhyaṃ prayojanamuktam // 1 //
GK16andhvc1u:1364: nanu 'dhvanisvarūpaṃ brūma' iti pratijñāya vācyapratīyamānākhyau dvau bhedāvarthasyeti vācyābhidhāne kā saṅgatiḥ kārakāyā ityāśaṅkya saṅgatiṃ kartumavataraṇikāṃ karoti--tatreti /
GK16andhvc1u:1367: yathā apūrvanirmāṇe cikīrṣite pūrvaṃ bhūmirviracyate, tathā dhvanisvarūpe pratīyamānākhye nirūpayitavye nirvivādasiddhavācyābhidhānaṃ bhūmiḥ /

GK16andhvc1u:1932: viparītalakṣaṇayātra niṣedhapratītirna sambhavati, tasyā anavakāsādityāśayena matametatpratyācaṣṭe--naitadityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1954: tathā ca sarvasmin viśeṣe samayaḥ kartuṃ na śakyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1958: gopadena yasya govyaktiviśeṣasya bodho jāyate, tasminnitaragovyaktigatasamayo nāstīti rītyā vyabhicāro bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1963: agṛhītasaṅketakasyāpi gavādivyaktiviśeṣasya gavādivyaktiviśeṣasya gavādipadena bodhodayāttatra saṅketagrahasya vyabhicārāccetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1964: atha dvitīyaṃ vyāpāraṃ saviṣayaṃ darśayati--tata ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1969: tātparyaśāktiḥ sa vākyārthaḥ paraḥpradhānatayā pratipādyaḥ yeṣāṃ tāni tatparāṇi teṣāṃ bhāvastātparya tadrūpā śaktiḥ, padānāmiti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1971: sāmānyāni padairabhihitāḥ sāmānyarūpā arthāḥ anyathā viśeṣāṇāmanavagamane /
GK16andhvc1u:1975: 'sāmānyānanyathe'ti pāṭhe tu locanam tatra ca dvitīyakakṣyāyāṃ 'bhrame'ti vidhyatiriktaṃ na kiñcitpratīyate, anvayamātrasyaiva pratipannatvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:1976: na hi 'gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ' 'siṃho baṭuḥ' ityatra yathānvaya eva bubhūṣan pratihanyate, yogyatāvirahāt; tathā tava bhramamaniṣeddhā sa śvā siṃhena hataḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1978: ata eva mukhyārthabādhā nātra śaṅkyeti na viparītalakṣaṇāyā avasaraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1984: parasparaṃ virodha iti cet--so 'yaṃ tarhyanvaye virodhaḥ pratyeyaḥ /

GK16andhvc1u:2029_0: samādhatte-to 'yamityādi locanam na cāpratipanne 'nvaye virodhapratītiḥ, pratipattiścānvayasya nābhidhāśaktyā, tasyāḥ padārthapratipattyupakṣīṇāyā
GK16andhvc1u:2030: nanvevaṃ 'aṅgulyagre karivaraśatam' kintu pramāṇāntareṇa so 'nvayaḥ pratyakṣādinā bādhitaḥ pratipanne 'pi śuktikāyāṃ rajatamiveti tadavagamakāriṇo vākyasyāprāmāṇyam /

GK16andhvc1u:2065: na caivaṃ bhaktireva dhvaniḥ, bhaktirhi lakṣaṇāvyāpārastṛtīyakakṣyāniveśī /

GK16andhvc1u:2098_1: parākramātiśayaśālitvaṃ, tatra śabdasya na tāvanna vyāpāraḥ /

GK16andhvc1u:2103: idaṃ cātipavitratvādeḥ tīre pratyāyānadvārā ghoṣa'pi tatpratyāyanamasti tasyaiva paramatātparyaviṣayatvādityāśayenoktam /

GK16andhvc1u:2133: sāmānyamukhavyāptyadhīnānamitisthale prakṛtasādhyahetvoḥ tatsajātīyayorvā pratyakṣādinā vyāptigrahaṇaṃ vācyam /
GK16andhvc1u:2136: iyaṃ pāvanatvādiprayojanajñānaṃ locanam niyamāpratipattervakturetadvivakṣitamityadhyavasāyābhāvaprasaṅgāccatyasti tāvadatra śabdasyaiva vyāpāraḥ /

GK16andhvc1u:2162_0: gaṅgādiśabdānāṃ hi mukhyārthabādhādivasāttīrādavavagamayitavye svārthātsrotoviśeṣāderyathā bhraṃśaḥ, tathā prayojane pāvanatvādāvavagamayitavye

GK16andhvc1u:2189: vyapadeśaśca vyapadeśyaṃ vinā na tiṣṭatīti tacchravaṇānyathānupapattinirūpaṇīyo 'yamiti yāvat /

GK16andhvc1u:2197: tasyā abhidhāyāḥ, anyathā ātmānaṃ vinā anupapattirasambhavaḥ prayojanābhāvādinā sahāyo yasyāḥ sā /

GK16andhvc1u:2204_1: mūlājjātā, tatpratibhāsena abhidheyādyarthānāṃ nirantarapratītyā pavitritasya saṃskāralakṣaṇātiśayavattayā locanam sa ca

GK16andhvc1u:2205: abhyupagamamātreṇa caitaduktam; na tvatra lakṣaṇā, atyantatiraskārānyasaṃkramaṇayorabhāvāt /

GK16andhvc1u:2371: sajātīyāḥ vākyārthapratītyaṅgatvena sajātīyāḥ ye tadvikalpāḥ padārthaviṣayakapratyayāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2374: ye 'pyavibhaktaṃsphoṭaṃ vākyaṃ tadarthaṃ cāhuḥ, tairapyavidyāpadapatitaiḥ sarveyamanusaraṇīyā prakriyā /
GK16andhvc1u:2375: taduttīrṇatve tu sarvaṃ parameśvarādvayaṃ brahyotyasmacchāstrakāreṇa na na viditaṃ tatvālokagranthaṃ viracayatetyāstām /
GK16andhvc1u:2377: kramo hi hetuhetumadbhāvenāvasthitayordharmaḥ, tasya jñāne tayorjñānamapekṣitamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2381: abhyastaḥ bhūyo bhūyaḥ paryālocito viṣayo yayoste /
GK16andhvc1u:2382: yadvā-abhyaste viṣaye dhūmādihetau gavādyarthe ca yo vyāptisamayayoḥ vahnyādisādhyavyāptigavādipadasaṅketayoḥ smṛtī, tayoranumitiśābdabodhayoryaḥ kramastadvadityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2390: gauṇalākṣaṇikārthapratītau hi mukhyārthabādhānimittaṃ, tataśca mukhyārthe maulikaṃ nimittamityāpatati /
GK16andhvc1u:2393: śrutyādipadārthāstadudāharaṇāni cāpodevīyādau kāvyapradīpādau ca grante prapañcitāni /
GK16andhvc1u:2398: etannimittatāvaicitryañca abhidhāyā dīrghadīrghatvāṅgīkāre nopapadya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2399: nanu tarhi nimittanaimittikabhāvo 'stu vicitro, yenāyaṃ prakriyāvighāto na syādityatrāha--nimittateti /
GK16andhvc1u:2408_0: locanam yattu bhaṭṭanāyakenoktam--iha dṛptasiṃhādipadaprayoge ca dhārmikapadaprayoge ca bhayānakarasāveśakṛtaiva niṣedāvagatiḥ
GK16andhvc1u:2413: rasaśca vyaṅgya eva, tasya ca śabdavācyatvaṃ tenāpi nopagatamiti bālapriyā yatvityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2419: śvamāraṇanimittabhramaṇavidhisiddhaṃ dhārmikabhīrutvaṃ vinā niṣedhārtho na sidhyatīti dhārmiketyādyuktam /
GK16andhvc1u:2420: tāvanmātreṇāpi gṛhabhramaṇavidhirevānugṛhīto bhavati, na prakṛtaniṣedha ityato dṛptasiṃhādītica /
GK16andhvc1u:2437: etasya vākyasya sambandhinau etau vā yau vaktṛpratipattṛviśeṣau saṅketasthānaparirakṣaṇotsukakāminībhīrudhārmikau, tayoravagamasya viraheṇa abhāvena /
GK16andhvc1u:2442: tasyāstitvamātraṃ na niṣedhāvagatiṃ prati hetutvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2443: kathaṃ boddhavye dhārmike bhayānakarasāveśa ityata āha--tasyetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2453: boddhavyasya bhayamiva,sahṛdayasya raso 'pyutpadyatāṃ kiṃ tadabhivyaktikalpanayetyata āha--rasaścetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2455: pratipatturapi rasāveśo na niyataḥ, na hyasau niyamena bhīrudhārmisabrahmacārī sahṛdayaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2456: atha tadviśeṣo 'pi sahakārī kalpyate, tarhi vaktṛpratipattṛpratibhāprāṇito dhvananavyāpāraḥ kiṃ na sahyate /
GK16andhvc1u:2457: kiṃ ca vastudhvaniṃ dūṣayatā rasadhvanistadanugrāhakaḥ samarthyata iti suṣṭhutarāṃ dhvanidhvaṃso 'yam /
GK16andhvc1u:2459: atha rasasyaiveyatā prādhānyamuktam; tatko na sahate /
GK16andhvc1u:2460: atha vastumātradhvaneretadudāharaṇaṃ na yuktamityucyate tathāpi kāvyodāharaṇatvāddvāvapyatra dhvanī staḥ, ko doṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2461_0: yadi tu rasānuvedhena vinā na tuṣyati, tat bhayānakarasānuvedho nātra sahṛdayahṛyayadarpaṇamadhyāste; api tu uktanītyā sambhogābhilāṣavibhāvasaṅketasthānocitāviśiṣṭakākvādyanubhāvaśabalanoditaśṛṅgararasānuvedhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2468: kasyacidbhayānakarasāsvādasambhave 'pi vīrādiprakṛteḥ pratipattustadasambhavāt, bhayānakarasābhivyaktyā niṣeṣapratītirna bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2475: uktanayenāpasiddhāntāpātādapi rasāveśakṛtā niṣedhāvagatiriti vaktuṃ na śakyamityupahāsamukhenāha--kiñcetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2477: bhayānakavibhāvādīnabhidadhatyā tadrasāveśaśaktisahakāriṇyā abhidhayā arthādabhihita evāyaṃ niṣedha ityabhiprāyeṇa dūṣayatetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2483: rasasya prādhānyameva darśitaṃ na tu vastudhvanerdūṣaṇamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2493: nanu kāmacārabhyanujñānaṃ na yuktaṃ, rasasyaiva sahṛdayāhlādakāritvādityata āha--yadi tvityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2502: tathā tasyaivābhilāṣasya ucitāḥ sambhogānuguṇyādviśiṣṭāśca ye kākvādayaḥ anubhāvāḥ, ādipadena tātkālikyo 'nyāśceṣṭā grāhyāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2503_0: teṣāñca śabalanātsaṃvalanādudito 'bhivyakto yaḥ śṛṅgārarasaḥ, tasyānuvedha locanam rasasyālaukikatvāttāvanmātrādeva cānavagamātprathamaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:2504: yastu dhvanivyākyānodyatastātparyaśaktimeva vivakṣāsūcakatvameva vā dhvananamavocat, sa nāsmākaṃ hṛdayamāvarjayati /
GK16andhvc1u:2514: yaḥ pūrvaṃ karṇopakarṇikayā tvayāpyākarṇito godāvarīkacchagahane prativasatīti /
GK16andhvc1u:2515: pūrvameva hi tadrakṣāyai tattayopaśrāvito 'sau; sa cādhunā tu bālapriyā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2517: vivecanadaśāyāmatra bhayānakavibhāvādayo na pratīyante, api tu śṛṅgarasambandhina eveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2518: nanu yadi śṛṅgāradhvaniratrāṅgī, tarhi kutastadudāharaṇatveneyaṃ gāthā noktā? vastudhvanyudāharamatayoktā cetyata āha--rasasyetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2526: sa ca pramāṇena kenāpi na siddho loke, nādyāpi kāvyavyāpāraviṣayatayā ca /
GK16andhvc1u:2527_0: atastatpratipādanārthamārabhamāṇena tadupoddhātatayā prathamaṃ vastudhvanyādikamanyadeva vācyādbhinnatvena pradarśanīyaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:2536: 'adye'ti padaṃ pūrvaṃ bidhiḥ pratikūlo 'bhūdidānīṃ tu bhavadbhāgyamahimnānukūlo jāta ityarthaṃ dyotayatītyaha--diṣṭyati /
GK16andhvc1u:2546: saṅketasthānarakṣaṇārtamanyāpadeśena vavacidvācye pratiṣedharūpe vidhirūpo yathā-- attā ettha ṇimajjai etya ahaṃ diasaaṃ paloehi /
GK16andhvc1u:2547: mā pahia rattiandhaa sejjāe maha ṇimajjahisi //
GK16andhvc1u:2548: locana.m dṛptatvāttato gahanānnissaratīti prasiddhagodāvarītīraparisarānusaraṇamapi tāvatkathāśeṣībhūtaṃ kā kathā tallatāgahanapraveśaśaṅkayeti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2550: śvaśrūratra śete athavā nimajjati atrāhaṃ divasakaṃ pralokaya /
GK16andhvc1u:2552: maha iti nipāto 'nekārtavṛttiratrāvayorityarthe na tu mameti /
GK16andhvc1u:2553: evaṃ hi viśeṣavacanameva śaṅkākāri bhavediti pracchannābhyupagamo na syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:2554_0: kāñcitproṣitapatikāṃ taruṇīmavalokya pravṛddhamadanāṅkuraḥ saṃpannaḥ pāntho 'nena niṣedhadvāreṇa tayābhyupagata iti niṣedhābhāvo
GK16andhvc1u:2554_1: 'tra bālapriyā pūrvaṃ svairiṇyai vṛttānto 'yaṃ sakhyādidvārā dharmikasya karṇagocarīkṛta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2555: nanvevaṃ kimiti svayamuktamityata āha--sa cādhunā tviti /
GK16andhvc1u:2559: dharmikasya śaṅgā mā bhūditi 'gaude'tyādyanuvādapūrvakaṃsiṃhasya dṛptatvādiviśeṣo bodhyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2568: evaṃ hi pracchannābhyupagamo na syāditi sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2587: tatrāhamiti śabdasya tāvannāyaṃ sākṣādarthaḥ; kākvādisahāyasya ca tāvati dhvananameva vyāpāra iti dhvanerbhūṣaṇametat /
GK16andhvc1u:2589: atha yadyapi bhavānmadanaśarāsāradīryamāṇahṛdaya upekṣituṃ na yuktaḥ, tathāpi kiṃ karomi pāpo divasako 'yamanucitatvātkutsito 'yamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2591: na ca sarvathā tvāmupekṣe, yato 'traivāhaṃ tatpralokaya nānyato 'haṃ gacchami, tadanyonyavadanāvalokanavinodenodena bālapriyā abhyupagataḥ śayanābhyupagamaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2600: samucite sambhogayogye samaye rātrau bhaviṣyatītyātmanā sambhāvyamāno yo 'rthaḥ tannimittakā ye vikarāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2620: anurāgātirekeṇa sambhāvito ya āvayoranibhṛtaḥ sambhogaḥ tasya parihāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2622: upekṣituṃ na yukta ityanena svasyābhilāṣo 'pi pradarśitaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2625: 'diasaam' ityasya kathaṃ prathamāntatayā vyākhyānamityata āha---prakṛta iti /
GK16andhvc1u:2626: na copekṣe kvacidvācye vidhirūpe 'nubhayarūpo yathā--- vacca maha vvia ekkei hontu ṇīsāsaroiavvāiṃ /
GK16andhvc1u:2627: mā tujja vi tīa viṇā dakkhiṇṇahaassa jāantu //
GK16andhvc1u:2629: pratipannamātrāyāṃ ca rātrāvandhībhūto madīyāyāṃ śayyāyāṃ māṃ śliṣaḥ, api tu nibhṛtanibhṛtamevāttābhidhānanikaṭakaṃṇṭakanidrānveṣaṇapūrvakamitīyadatra dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc1u:2631: mā tavāpi tayā vinā dākṣiṇyahatasya janiṣata //
GK16andhvc1u:2633_0: na pramādādena vāyikāntarasaṃgamanaṃ tava, api tu gāḍhānurāgāt, yenānyāddaṅmukharāgaḥ gotraskhalanādi ca, kevalaṃ pūrvakṛtānupālanātmanā
GK16andhvc1u:2637: andhībhūtatvena śleṣaṇaṃ niṣidhyate, na tu śleṣaṇamātram /
GK16andhvc1u:2652: 'sthita iti yat tat kevalaṃ dākṣiṇyenaive'ti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2655: pūrvakṛtena pūrvakarmaṇā addaṣṭena hetunā yadanupālanaṃ matpālanam /
GK16andhvc1u:2656: yadvā-pūrvakṛtaṃ yaddākṣiṇyaṃ tasyānupālanamavicchedena pālanaṃ tadātmanā dākṣiṇyena /
GK16andhvc1u:2660: ahisāriāṇaṃ vigdhaṃ karosi aṇaṇāṇaṃ vi haāse //
GK16andhvc1u:2661: locana.m tvamatra sthitaḥ, tatsarvathā śaṭho 'sīti gāḍhamanyurūpo 'yaṃ khaṇḍitanāyikābhiprāyo 'tra pratīyate /
GK16andhvc1u:2662: na cāsau vrajyābhāvarūpo niṣedhaḥ, nāpi vidhyantaramevānyaniṣedhābhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2678: nivartasvetyanena māgama ityarthasyoktatayā gamananiṣedho vācya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2681: locanam nāyake sata tataḥ pratigantuṃ pravṛttā, nāyakena cāṭūpakramapūrvakaṃ nivartyate /
GK16andhvc1u:2682_0: na kevalaṃ svātmano mama ca nirvṛtividhnaṃ karoṣi, yāvadanyāsāmapi; tatastava na kadācana sukhalavalābho 'pi bhaviṣyatītyata
GK16andhvc1u:2683_0: yadi vā sakhyopadiśyamānāpi tadavadhīraṇayā gacchantī sakhyocyate-na kevalamātmano vidhnaṃ karoṣi, lāghavādabahumānāspadamātmānaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:2683_1: kurvatī, ata eva hatāśā, yāvadvadanacandrikāprakāśitamārgatayānyāsāmapyabhisārikāṇāṃ vidhnaṃ karoṣīti sakhyabhiprāyarūpaścāduviśeṣo
GK16andhvc1u:2684_0: atra tu vyākhyānadvaye 'pi vyavasitātpratīpagamanātpriyatamagṛhagamanācca nivartasveti punarapi vācya eva viśrānterguṇībhūtavyaṅgyabhedasya
GK16andhvc1u:2696: tvatsaddaśī nānya kācidityevaṃrūpo yo vallabhābhiprāyaḥ, tadrūpa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2721: kassa vaṇa hoi roso daṭṭhūṇa piāeṃ savvaṇaṃ aharam /
GK16andhvc1u:2723: anyāsāñca vidhnaṃ karoṣi tava cepsitalābho bhaviṣyatīti kā pratyāśā /
GK16andhvc1u:2724: ata eva madīyaṃ vā gṛhamāgaccha, tvadīyaṃ vā gacchāvetyubhayatrāpi tātparyādanubhayarūpo vallabhābipārāyascāṭvātmā vyaṅgya ityateyeva vyavatiṣṭate /
GK16andhvc1u:2726: tatra hatāśe ityāmantraṇādi yuktamayuktaṃ veti sahṛdayā eva pramāṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:2728: adhunā tu viṣayabhedādapi vyaṅgyasya vācyādbheda ityāha--kvacidvācyāditi /
GK16andhvc1u:2730: viṣayabhedo 'pi vicitrarūpo vyavatiṣṭamānaḥ sahṛdayairvyavasthāpayituṃ śakyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2731: kasya vā na bhavati roṣo dṛṣṭvā priyāyāḥ savraṇamadharam /
GK16andhvc1u:2734: anīrṣyālorapi bhavati roṣo dṛṣṭvaiva; akṛtvāpi kutaścidevāpūrvatayā bālapriyā tadviṣayakapratyabhijñānābhāvaḥ, tasya chalena tadapratyabhijñānaṃ svasminnāropyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2741: anyāsāṃ ca tvadgṛhagamanotsukasya mama ceti cakārārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2743: ata eva yata evaṃrūpo vācyārthaḥ, tata eva /
GK16andhvc1u:2744: 'madīyaṃ gṛhamāgaccha tvadīyaṃ vā gṛhaṅgacchāveti cāṭavātmā vallabhābhiprāyo vyaṅgya' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2746: uktarūpavyaṅgyaḥ vyavatiṣṭata eva, na tu paścādvācyopaskārāya dhāvatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2747: atra pakṣe 'nivartasve' tyasya tavādhvavasāyānnivartasveti vācyārthe bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2749: pakṣe 'smin taṭasthānāṃ nāyikāpremābāvātteṣāṃ vacanaṃ na pravartakaṃ , na vā nivartakamataḥ pūrvoktavyaṅgyasya vācyāṅgatvaṃ neti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc1u:2751: nanu vṛttau 'vyavasthāpita' ityuktiḥ kathaṃ saṅgacchate vyavasthāpanasyāniṣpannatvādityato vyācaṣṭe--viṣayabhedo 'pītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2754: 'kasya ve'ti vākāro 'vadhāraṇārthaṅko dṛṣṭvetyuttaraṃ thojya ityāśayena vyācaṣṭe---dṛṣṭvaivetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2757: anye caivaṃprakārā vācyādvibhedinaḥ pratīyamānabhedāḥ pratīyamānabhedāḥ sambhavanti /
GK16andhvc1u:2761: sabhramarapajhāghrāmaśīle śīlaṃ hi kathañcidapi vārayituṃ na śakyam /
GK16andhvc1u:2764: atrāyaṃ bhāvaḥ---kācidavinītā kutaścitkhaṇḍitādharā niścitatatsavidhasaṃnidhāne tadbhartari tamanavalokamānayeva kayācidvidagdhasakhyā tadvācyatāparihārāyaivamucyate /
GK16andhvc1u:2768: tasyāṃ ca priyatamena gāḍhamupārabyamānāyāṃ tahyalīkaśaṅkitaprātiveśakalokaviṣayaṃ saubhāgyātiśayakhyāpanaṃ priyāyā iti śabdabalāditi sapatnīviṣayaṃ vyaṅgyam /
GK16andhvc1u:2771: kenāpi kāraṇena pragaddaṣṭaviśeṣavattayā pramukhataḥ savraṇatayā vilokyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2772: kṛtvāpīti pāṭhe kṛtaścillākṣārasādinā kenacideva kṛtvāpi svayaṃ kṛtvāpītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2773: kṛtvāpīti pāṭhe kutaścillākṣārasādinā kenacideva kṛtvāpi svayaṃ kṛtvāpītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2776: ukte vācyārthe sthite vakṣyamāṇo vyaṅgyārtha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2795: tasya bharturvyalīkamapriyamanayā kṛtamiti śaṅkito yaḥ prātiveśikalokastadviṣayamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2814_0: tṛtīyastu rasādilakṣaṇaḥ prabhedo vācyasāmarthyākṣiptaḥ locanam lāghavamātmani grahītuṃ na yuktaṃ; pratyutāyaṃ bahumānaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:2815: adyeyaṃ tava pracchannānurāgiṇī hṛdayavallabhetthaṃ rakṣitā, punaḥ prakaṭaradanadaṃśanavidhirna vidheya iti taccauryakāmukaviṣayasambodhanaṃ vyaṅgyam /
GK16andhvc1u:2819: dvitīyoddyote 'asaṃlakṣyakramavyaṅgyaḥ krameṇoddyotitaḥ paraḥ' iti vivakṣitānyaparavācyasya dvitīyaprabhedavarṇanāvasare /
GK16andhvc1u:2820: yathā hi vidhiniṣedhatadanubhayātmanā rūpeṇa saṃkalayya vastudhvaniḥ saṃkṣepeṇa suvacaḥ, tathā nālaṅkāradhvaniḥ, alaṅkārāṇāṃ bhūyastvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:2825: rasabhāvatadābhāsatatpraśamāḥ punarna kadācidabhidhiyante, atha cāsvādyamānatāprāṇatayā bhānti /
GK16andhvc1u:2828: aucityena pravṛttau cittavṛtterāsvādyatve sthāyinyā raso, vyabhicāriṇyā bhāvaḥ, anaucityena tadābhāsaḥ, rāvaṇasyeva sītāyāṃ rateḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2829: yadyapi tatra hāsyarasarūpataiva, 'śṛṅgārāddhi bhaveddhāsyaḥ' iti vacanāt /
GK16andhvc1u:2834: na hyetatsarvaṃ svotprekṣāmātreṇoktamapi tu vidhidhamavasthāpito 'vyavasthāpita' iti vṛttigranthānurodhenetyāha---tadetadityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2835: nanu vastudhvanivadalaṅkāradhvanerapyatraiva pradarśanīyatve kimityagre darśayiṣyata ityuktamityatastātparyamāha-yathā hītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2848: sthāthinyāścittavṛtterāsvādyatve rasaḥ, vyabhicāriṇyāścittavṛtterāsvadyatve bhāva iti yojanā /
GK16andhvc1u:2858_0: pūrvāparavivekadaśāyāṃ locanam sthitiḥ, tanmayībhavanadaśāyāṃ tu raterevāsvādyateti śṛṅgārataiva bhāti paurvāparyavivekāvadhāraṇena
GK16andhvc1u:2858_1: 'dūrākarṣaṇamohamantra iva me tannāmni yāte śutim' ityādau /

GK16andhvc1u:2861: yathā-- ekasmin śayane parāṅmukhatayā vītottaraṃ tāmyato- ranyonyasya hṛdi sthite 'pyanunaye saṃrakṣatorgauravam /
GK16andhvc1u:2864: na cāyaṃ rasādirarthaḥ 'putraste jātaḥ' ityato yathā harṣo jāyate tathā /

GK16andhvc1u:2876: bhāvaśabdenaiva bhāvapraśamasyāpi grahaṇasambhavāt kimiti pṛthak tadgrahaṇamityata āha-cittavṛtterityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2891: hāsena rabhasena vegena, yadvyāvṛttaṃ vyāvartanaṃ tena ca sahitaḥ kaṇṭhagraho yatra, tattathā /
GK16andhvc1u:2897: 'vācyasāmarthyakṣiptaḥ prakāśata' ityanena darśitaṃ vibhāvādivyaṅgyatvaṃ rasādeḥ sādhayiṣyan ādau tasya tātparyaśaktigamyatvaṃ niṣedhati---na cetyādi tathetyantena /
GK16andhvc1u:2899: yathā 'putraste jāta' ityādivākyaṃ priyarūpārthapratipādanamukhena śroturharṣamutpādayati, prakāśate, na tu sākṣācchabdavyāpāraviṣaya iti vācyādvibhinna eva /
GK16andhvc1u:2900: tathā hi vācyatvaṃ tasya svaśabdaniveditatvena vā syāt vibhāvādipratipādanamukhena vā /

GK16andhvc1u:2905: vibhāvādyarthe 'pi na putrajanmaharṣanyāyena tāṃ cittavṛttiṃ janayatīti jananātirikto 'rthasyāpi vyāpāro dhvananamevocyate /
GK16andhvc1u:2910_0: tatra svaśabdasyānvayavyatirekau rasyamānatāsāraṃ rasaṃ prati nirākurvandhvananasyaiva tāviti bālapriyā tathā kāvyaṃ vibhāvādyarthapratipādanadvārā
GK16andhvc1u:2915: hṛdayasya saṃvādaḥ sampratipattiḥ, sa eva balaṃ sahakāri tasmāt /
GK16andhvc1u:2923: siddhasvabhāvā ye sukhādayo bhāvāḥ sukhapadena ratirvivakṣitā /
GK16andhvc1u:2930: athārthasyāpi dhvananameva vyāpāra iti janakatvaniṣedhapūrvakaṃ darśayati-vibhāvādyartho 'pītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2935: yatra yatra rasādipratītiḥ, tatra tatra neti vyatirekaḥ, tāvityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2940: svaśabdena sā kevalamanūdyate, na tu tatkṛtā /

GK16andhvc1u:2944: dūrvākāṇḍaviḍambakaśca nibiḍo yatpāṇḍimā gaṇḍayoḥ kṛṣṇe yūni sayauvanāsu vanitāsveṣaiva veṣasthitiḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:2951: tathā hiyāte dvāravatīṃ tadā madhuripau taddattajhampānatāṃ bālapriyā vyabhicāraviṣayamudāharati---yaditi /
GK16andhvc1u:2968_0: teṣāṃ rasādīnāṃ ta eva vā ye vibhāvānubhāvāḥ,teṣāmucitā yāścittavṛttayaḥ sthāyivyabhicārirūpāstāsāṃ vāsanābhiranurañjitāyā
GK16andhvc1u:2968_1: rūṣitāyāssvasaṃvido yā ānandamayī carvaṇā tasyāḥ, gocaro viṣaya ityarthaḥ /

GK16andhvc1u:2984_0: sotkaṇṭhāśabdaḥ kevalaṃ siddhaṃ sādhayati, utkamityanena tūktānubhāvānukarṣaṇaṃ katuṃ sotkaṇṭhāśabdaḥ prayukta ityanuvādo
GK16andhvc1u:2984_1: 'pi nānarthakaḥ, punaranubhāvapratipādane hi punaruktiratanmayībhāvo vā na tu tatkṛtetyatra hetumāha---viṣāyāntara iti /

GK16andhvc1u:2988: 'sampannate'ti pāṭhe tena dattā sampāditā sampannatā puṣpapallavādisamṛddhiryasyāstāmityarthaḥ /

GK16andhvc1u:2993: guruṇā prabhūtena bāṣpeṇa ruddhakaṇṭhatayā gadgadaṃ yathā tathā galan prasaran tāra uccaistaśca svaro yatra tattathā /
GK16andhvc1u:3000: madhuripuviraho, viyukto madhuripurvā ālambanavibhāvaḥ, kālindītaṭādaya uddīpanavibhāvāḥ, latāliṅganādayo 'nubhāvāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3005: carvaṇāyā gocaraṃ viṣayatvaṃ pratipadyata eva, nātra svaśabdāpekṣāmūlakassaṃśayaḥ kārya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3010: kevalaśabdanātra vibhāvānubhāvau prati sahakāritvamapi neti darśayati /
GK16andhvc1u:3012: ayamarthaḥ---jalacāriṇāṃ kūjite 'pi gurubāṣpetyādyuktānubhāvānāṃ saṃyojana eva tanmayībhavanayukatyā tadutkaṇṭhāyāścarvaṇāgocaratvaṃ bhavati /
GK16andhvc1u:3014: na ca kevalenotkaśabdena tatpratipādanaṃ bhavati, tasya tāvatyaparyāptatvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:3015: sati ca pūrvavākye sotkaṇṭhāśabde tatsaṃgṛhītānāmanubhāvānāṃ sotkaṇṭhāsamānārthakotkaśabdena pratipādanaṃ bhavatīti sotkaṇṭhāśabdassaprayojana ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3017: na kevalaṃ punaruktireva, tathāvidhasyānubhavajātasya tanmayībhavanopayogitāpi na syādanaucityapratipattigrastasaubhāgyatvādityāha--atanmayīti /
GK16andhvc1u:3019: yataśca svābhidhānamantareṇa kevalebhyo 'pi vibhāvādibhyo viśiṣṭebhyo rasādīnāṃ pratītiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3023: na hi yadabhāve 'pi yadbhavati tatkṛtaṃ taditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3032: evaṃ svaśabdena saha rasādervyatirekānvayābhāvamupapatyā pradarśya tathaivopasaṃharati-yataścetyādinā kathañcidityantena /
GK16andhvc1u:3033_0: abhidheyameva sāmarthyaṃ sahakāriśaktirūpaṃ vibhāvādikaṃ rasadhvanane śabdasya kartavye, abhidheyasya ca putrajanmaharṣabhinnayogakṣematayā
GK16andhvc1u:3033_2: śaktiḥ viśiṣṭasamucito vācakasākalyamiti bālapriyā ityasya vivaraṇam yadviśramyetyādāviti /

GK16andhvc1u:3037: svaśabdakṛtā rasādipratītiḥ na vibhāvādikṛtetyasmin mate kāvyatvenānabhimatamapi kāvyamāpadyetetyarthaḥ /

GK16andhvc1u:3048: putrajanma khalu harṣa janayati, na tathā vibhāvādyartho rasaṃ janayatīti tadvilakṣṇatvamarthagatadhvananasya /
GK16andhvc1u:3052: guṇālaṅkārādiviśiṣṭena samucitena rasānuguṇena ca vācakena iti tṛtīyo 'pi prabhedo vācyādbhinna eveti sthitam /
GK16andhvc1u:3054: kāvyasyātmā sa evārthas tathā cādikaveḥ purā /
GK16andhvc1u:3058: evaṃ dvau pakṣāvupakramyādyo dūṣitaḥ, dvitīyastu kathañciddūṣitaḥ kathañcidaṅgīkṛtaḥ, jananānumānavyāpārābhiprāyeṇa dūṣitaḥ; dhvananābhiprāyeṇāṅgīkṛtaḥ /

GK16andhvc1u:3075_0: rasādīnāmabhidheyasāmarthyākṣiptatvameveti vadato vṛttikṛtastātparyaśāktireva dhvananavyāpāro 'bhimataḥ, na tu tadvyatiriktaścaturthakakṣyāniveśī
GK16andhvc1u:3077: gāmānayetyādau karmāntarebhyaḥ kriyāntarebhyaśca bhedo vākyārthaḥ, saṃsargastvārtha iti kecit /
GK16andhvc1u:3078: karmaviśeṣādeḥ kriyāviśeṣeṇa sambandharūpasaṃsargo vākyārthaḥ, bhedastvārtha ityapare // .4  // // .//
GK16andhvc1u:3079: nanu dhvanisvarūpe vācyādbhedena samarthite, lakṣaṇanuktvā tasyātmatvapratipādikāyāḥ kārikāyāḥ kā saṅgatirityato vṛttānuvādapurassaraṃ tāṃ darśayati--evamityādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:3083: vyājaśabdena dhvanerātmatvapratipādana eva tātparyaṃ, netihāsopakṣepa iti darśitam /
GK16andhvc1u:3085: sa evetītyasyānantaraṃ, krauñca-dvandva-viyogotthaḥ śokaḥ ślokatvam āgataḥ // DhvK_1.5 //
GK16andhvc1u:3087: locanam tena rasa eva vastuta ātmā, vastvalaṅkāradhvanī tu sarvathā rasaṃ pratiparyavasyete iti vācyādutkṛṣṭau tāvityabhiprāyeṇa 'dhvaniḥ kāvyasyātme'ti sāmānyenoktam /
GK16andhvc1u:3089_0: krauñcasya dvandvaviyogena sahacarīhananodbhūtena sāhacaryadhvaṃsanenotthito yaḥ śokaḥ sthāyibhāvo nirapekṣabhāvatvādvipralambhaśṛṅgārocitaratisthāyibhāvādanya
GK16andhvc1u:3089_2: tacchabdeneti, rasadhvanirityasyānantaraṃ parāmṛṣṭa iti ca śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3112: krauñcetyādikaṃ vyākhyāya śokasya ślokatāprāptiṃ vivṛṇoti---sa evetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3113: krauñce tātasya śokasya vāsanārūpeṇādikavau sthitasya śokasya cābhedabuddhikṛtamaikyaṃ vivakṣitvā sa evetyuktam /
GK16andhvc1u:3122_0: locanam pratipannaḥ karuṇarasarūpatāṃ laukikaśokavyatiriktāṃ svacittadgutisamāsvādyasārāṃ pratipanno rasaparipūrṇakumbhoccalanavaccittavṛttiniḥṣyandasvabhāvavāgvilāpādivacya
GK16andhvc1u:3122_2: prāptaḥ-- mā niṣāda pratiṣṭāṃ tvaṃmagamaḥ śāśvatīḥ samāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3125: na tu muneḥ śoka iti mantavyam /
GK16andhvc1u:3126: evaṃ hi sati tadduḥkhena so 'pi duḥkhita iti kṛtvā rasasyātmateti niravakāśaṃ bhavet /
GK16andhvc1u:3132: svasya carvayituścittasya yā dgutistanmayībhāvajanitā pulakādibhirlakṣyamāṇā tayā samāsvādyo manasānubhāvyaḥ sāraḥ prāṇo yasyāstām /
GK16andhvc1u:3133: kathamātmabhūtasya rasasya bahiḥślokatayā pariṇāma iti śaṅkāyāṃ dṛṣṭāntenottaramāha---rasetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3134: yathā jalaparipūrṇamaulisthakumbhoccalane tadgatajalaṃ bahiḥ prasravati, tathetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3136: yathā duḥkhādi cittavṛttipariṇāmarūpā vāṅmayā vilāpādayaḥ, ādipadena praśaṃsādayo grāhyāḥ, tathetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3139: na ca samayasavyapekṣapravṛttikasya śabdasya tadviṣayatvaṃ sambhavatītyāśaṅkāmanuvadan vyaṅgyatvena tadviṣayatvaṃ darśayati--samayānapekṣatve 'pītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3141: loke hi vilāpapraśaṃsādayo vacanaprakārāḥ śokabahumānarūpāṃ cittavṛttiṃ vyañjayantītyuktarītyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3147: samucitā eva śabdādayo rasādīn vyañjayantīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3148: ādikaveḥ ślokatvamāgata ityevaṃ vyākhyāyādikaveḥ śoka ityanvayabhramaṃ nirasyati---na tvityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3160: evamuktaprakāreṇa carvaṇocitaḥ śokasthāyibhāva evātmā yasya tathā bhūto yaḥ karuṇarasastasya vividhavācyavācakaracanāprapañjacāruṇaḥ kāvyasya sa evārthaḥ sārabhūtaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3161: locanam eva kāvyasyātmā sārabhūtasvabhāvo 'paraśāvdavailakṣaṇyakārakaḥ etadevoktaṃ hṛdayadarpaṇe--'yāvatpūrṇo na caitena tāvannaiva vamatyamum' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:3164: tena yadāha bhaṭṭanāyakaḥ-- śabdaprādhānyamāśritya tatra śāstraṃ pṛthagviduḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3171: vividhaṃ tattadabhivyañjanīyarasānuguṇyena vicitraṃ kṛtvā bālapriyā samuccalanaṃ bahiḥ prasaraṇaṃ svabhāvaḥ svarūpaṃ yasya 'mā niṣāde'tyādiślokasya tasya bhāvastatvaṃ tasmāt /
GK16andhvc1u:3174: yato 'mā niṣāde'tyādikāvyaṃ karuṇarasasamuccalanasvarūpamataḥ kāvyasya rasa evātmeti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3180: yāvanna pūrṇāḥ vibhāvāditanmayībhavanakrameṇa, tāvat amuṃ rasam /
GK16andhvc1u:3181: naiva vamati bahirbhāvamāpādya parāsvādanīyaṃ naiva karoti /
GK16andhvc1u:3182: rasena pūrṇa eva kaviḥ, kāvyarūpeṇa rasamudgiratīti rasavamanarūpasya kāvyasya rasarūpatvameveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3183: svena vilikhite 'mā niṣāde'tyādau 'agama' ityaḍāgamasya 'namāṅyoga' iti niṣedhaśaṅkāyāmupapattimāha--agama ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3200: vividhaṃ vācyavācakaracanāsu prapañjena cāru iti vigrahamabhipretya vyācaṣṭe---tattadityādi /
