GK16andhvc1u:3204: locanam vācye vācake racanāyāṃ ca prapañcena yaccāru śabdārthālaṅkāraguṇayuktamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3205: tena sarvatrāpi dhvananasadbhāve 'pi na tathā vyavahāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3207: tenaitanniravakāśam; yaduktaṃ hṛdayadarpaṇe---'sarvatra tarhi kāvyavyavahāraḥ syāt' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:3211: kṛtvetyasya prapañcenetyanena, vācya ityāditrayasya cārvityanena ca sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3222: nanu nihatetyādiyathāśrutagranthena tadākrandajanito muneśśoka ityartha iva pagratīyate /
GK16andhvc1u:3226: nanu śokacarvaṇāto yadi śloka udbhūtastatpratīyamānaṃ vastu kāvyasyātmeti kuta ityāśaṅkyāha---śoko hīti /
GK16andhvc1u:3228: śoke hi sthāyibhāve ye vibhāvānubhāvāstatsamucitā cittavṛttiścarvyamāṇātmā rasa ityaucityātsthāyino rasatāpattirityucyate /
GK16andhvc1u:3229: prāksvasaṃviditaṃ paratrānumitaṃ ca cittavṛttijātaṃ bālapriyā pūrvaṃ tanniṣedha ityato vyācaṣṭe---carvaṇetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3231: śoka ityasya vāsanārūpeṇa sthito muneḥ śoka ityarthaśceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3241: 'śokaḥ śloktvamāgataḥ' iti śokacarvaṇātaḥ ślokotpattivacanenaiva rasasyātmavaṃ prakāśitameva śokacarvaṇāgocarātmatvātkaruṇarasasyeti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3242: nanu kathamanyacarvaṇāyā anyo viṣayaḥ syādityata upapādayatiśoke hītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3247: śokādernimittabhūtā ye vibhāvāḥ kāryabhūtā ye anubhavāścetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3265: svānubhavasaṃskāraṃ svānumānasaṃskāraṃ cādhāya tābhyāṃ hṛdayasaṃvādamādadhānaṃ sadityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3268: locanam saṃskārakrameṇa hṛdayasaṃvādamāda dhānaṃ carvaṇāyāmupayujyate yataḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3269_0: nanu pratīyamānarūpamātmā tatra tribhedaṃ pratipāditaṃ na tu rasaikarūpam, anena citihāsena rasasyaivātmabhūtatvamuktaṃ bhavatītyāśaṅkyābhyupagamenaivottaramāha-pratīyamānasya
GK16andhvc1u:3271: bhāvagrahaṇena vyabhicāriṇo 'pi carvyamāṇasya tāvanmātrāviśrāntāvapi sthāyicarvaṇāparyavasānocitarasapratiṣṭāmanavāpyāpi prāṇatvaṃ bhavatītyuktam /
GK16andhvc1u:3272: yathā--- nakhaṃ nakhāgrema vighaṭṭayantī vivartayantī valayaṃ vilolam /
GK16andhvc1u:3275: rasabhāvaśabdena ca tadābhāsatatpraśamāvapi saṃgṛhītāveva; avāntaravaicitrye 'pi tadekarūpatvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:3285: kenāpi sambandhenānyonyasambandhiṣu pradhānasya yadanyajñāpanaṃ tadupalakṣaṇaṃ; yathā rājāsau gacchatītyatra rājā parivārasyopalakṣakaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3293: stāyicarvaṇāyāṃ yatparyavasānaṃ tatpūrṇatākaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ tadeva ucitarasapratiṣṭā tāmaprāpyāpītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3310: sarasvatī svādu tad-artha-vastu niḥṣyandamānā mahatāṃ kavīnām /
GK16andhvc1u:3312: sarasvatī svādu tadarthavastu niḥṣyandamānā mahatāṃ kavīnām /
GK16andhvc1u:3314_0: tat vastutattvaṃ niḥṣyandamānā mahatāṃ kavīnāṃ bhāratī alokasāmānyaṃ locanam evamitihāsamukhena pratīyamānasya kāvyatmatāṃ
GK16andhvc1u:3318: yadāha bhaṭṭanāyakaḥ-- vāgdhenurdugdha etaṃ hi rasaṃ yadbālatṛṣṇāyā /
GK16andhvc1u:3319_0: bālapriyā athedamālocanīyaṃ sahṛdayaiḥ---śrīvālmīkinā 'mā niṣāde'tyādiślokena ślokāntaraiśca sahacarasya puṃsa eva krauñcasya
GK16andhvc1u:3319_1: nihananaṃ nirdiṣṭam, atra tu 'nihate'tyādiyathāśratagranthena vṛttikṛtā, sahacarīhananodbhūtene'ti 'nihatasahacarīti vibhāva
GK16andhvc1u:3319_2: ukta' iti ca vyākhyānena locanakṛtā, 'niṣādanihatasahacarīkaṃ krauñcayuvānam' ityādivacanena kāvyamīmāṃsākāreṇa ca sahacarīhananaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:3320: atra kecit--'nihate'tyādivṛttigranthasya 'nihataḥ sahacarīvirahakātaraḥ svata eva sahacarīvirahāsahiṣṇuśca yaḥ krauñca
GK16andhvc1u:3323: 'nihatasahacarīti vibhāva ukta' ityasya 'nihatasahacarī'tyādigranthena vibhāvaḥ pradarśita ityarthaśceti na rāmāyaṇavacanavirodhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3330: pūrvakārikayetihāsaḥ pratīyamānasya kāvyātmatve pramāṇāmityuktam, anayā tu tatsthirīkaraṇāya svasaṃvedanalakṣaṇaṃ pramāṇamucyate /
GK16andhvc1u:3347: bālatṛṣṇayā locanam tena nāsya ramaḥ sa syādduhyate yogibhirhi yaḥ  // .//
GK16andhvc1u:3349: ata eva--- yaṃ sarvaśaulāḥ parikalpya vatsaṃ merau sthite dogdhari dohadakṣe /
GK16andhvc1u:3353: pratipattṝn prati sā pratibhā nānumīyamānā, api tu tadāveśena bhāsamānetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3357: hi dugdhe prasnauti yat, tena tasmāddhetoḥ saḥ asya bālatṛṣṇayā prasnatasya rasasya, ramaḥ na syāta, yaḥ ānandarasaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3365: ata eva yato rasaparipūrṇāyāstadāveśaparavaśāyā dhenoḥ prasnavanaṃ prati svayaṃ kartṛtvaṃ, tata eva /
GK16andhvc1u:3366: hibhavataḥ vatsarūpasyeti yāvat. 'ata eva ityanena himavataḥ sārāgṣapātratvamuktam' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3377_1: pratipattṝṇāṃ pratyakṣaviṣayaṃ karotīti kārikārtha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3385: yenāsminnativicitrakaviparamparāvāhini saṃsāre kālidāsaprabhṛtayo dvitrāḥ pañcaṣā vā mahākavaya iti gaṇyante /
GK16andhvc1u:3388: vedyate sa tu kāvyārtha-tattvajñair eva kevalam // DhvK_1.7 //
GK16andhvc1u:3392: yadi ca vācyarūpa locanam yadāha muniḥ---'kaverantargataṃ bhāvaṃ' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:3394: abhivyaktena sphuratā pratibhāviśeṣeṇa nimittena mahākavitvagaṇaneti yāvat // .6  // // .//
GK16andhvc1u:3396: na kevalaṃ 'pratīyamānaṃ punaranyadeva' ityetatkārikāsūcitau svarūpaviṣayabhedāveva; yāvadbhinnasāmagrīvedyatvamapi vācyātiriktatve pramāṇamiti yāvat /
GK16andhvc1u:3397_0: vedyata bālapriyā rasāveśasya kāraṇabhūtaṃ yadvaiśadyaṃ rasāveśānabhimukhatvarāhityaṃ tena yatsaundaryaṃ rasaparatvādilakṣaṇam.
GK16andhvc1u:3397_1: yadvā---rasāveśena yadvaiśadyaṃ 'vivakṣātatparatvena'tyādisūcipadoṣarāhityaṃ, tena saundaryaṃ tatsūcitaguṇasāhityaṃ tadrūpaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:3400: abivyaktena ata eva sphuratā pratipattṝṇāṃ pratyakṣaviṣayeṇa /
GK16andhvc1u:3406: tathā ca kārikā evāsāvarthaḥ syāttadvācyavāṭacakarūpaparijñānādeva tatpratītiḥ syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:3407: atha ca vācyavācakalakṣaṇamātrakṛtaśramāṇāṃ kāvyatattvārthabhāvanāvimukhānāṃ svaraśrutyādilakṣaṇamivāpragītānāṃ gāndharvalakṣaṇavidāmagocara evāsāvarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3409: na tu na vedyate, yena na syādasāviti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3410: kāvyasya tattvabhūto yo 'rthastasya bhāvanā vācyātirekeṇānavaratacarvaṇā tatra vimukhānām /
GK16andhvc1u:3412: śrutirnāma śabdasya vailakṣaṇyamātrakāri yadrūpāntaraṃ tatparimāṇā svaratadantarālobhayabhedakalpitā dvāviśatividhā /
GK16andhvc1u:3414: vācyārthabodhe 'nuśiṣṭaśabdārthajñānarūpā, nyaṅgyārthabodhe tu sahṛdayatvādirūpā ca sāmagrī pūrvottarārdhābhyāṃ darśitā ceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3415: vedane siddhe tatsāmagrīcintāvakāśa ityāśyena punarapi vedyata ityuktam, tadvyācaṣṭe---na tvityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3427: kārikāyāṃ 'sa hī'tyatra sa tviti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3434: gītādiśabdaśravaṇe sati tasya śabdasya yadrūpāntaraṃ lavādikālāṃśaṃ nimittīkṛtya jāyate tadityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3436: tat parimāmaṃ kālapramāṇaṃ yasyāḥ setyarthaḥ. tanmātrakāleti yāvat /
GK16andhvc1u:3438: svaraḥ tasya svarasyāntarālamubhayamarthātpārśvadvayaṃ ca teṣāṃ yo bhedastatkalpitetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3445: śravaṇārthasya dhātoḥ ktin pratyaye śrūyanta iti vyutpattyā śrūtiśabdo niṣpannaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3446_0: atra nādāparaparyāyaśrutivibhāgaviṣaye bahavaḥ prakārā varttante---kecana dvāviṃśatiṃ śrutīrmanyante, apare ca ṣaṭṣaṣṭibhedabhinnāḥ
GK16andhvc1u:3446_1: śrutaya ityācakṣate, anye punarānantayaṃ kathayanti śrutīnām /
GK16andhvc1u:3447: ata evoktaṃ kohalena--- dvāviṃśatiṃ kecidudāharanti śrutīḥ śrutijñānavicāradakṣāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3451_0: etāsāṃ śrutīnāṃ mitho bhedaḥ--viṇādaṇḍe pūrvottarabāvena dvāviṃśatiṃ tantrīḥ parikalpya prathamāpekṣayā dvitīyāditantrīṣu
GK16andhvc1u:3453: svataḥ sahakārikāraṇanirapekṣaṃ rañjayati śrotṛcittamanuraktaṃ karotīti svaraḥ, iti tadvyutpattiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3454: saptānāmapyamīṣāṃ svarāṇāṃ vyastānāṃ satāṃ dṛṣṭāddaṣṭaphalaupayikatvaṃ na bhavatīti tatsiddhaye grāmasyāvaśyakatā jāyate /
GK16andhvc1u:3459_0: tatraikasman vīṇādaṇḍe dvāviṃśatiṃ tantrīḥ parikalpaya āditasturīyāyāṃ tantryāṃ ṣaṅjasvaraḥ, saptamyāṃ ṛṣabhaḥ, navamyāṃ
GK16andhvc1u:3459_1: gāndhāraḥ, trayodaśyāṃ madhyamaḥ, saptadaśyāṃ pañcamaḥ, viṃśyāṃ dhaivataḥ, dvāviṃśyāṃ niṣādaśceti svareṣu vinyasteṣu ṣaṅjagrāmo
GK16andhvc1u:3461_0: evamaparasmin vīṇādaṇḍe āditasturīyāyāṃ tantryāṃ madhyamaḥ, saptamyāṃ pañcamaḥ, ekādaśyāṃ dhaivataḥ, trayodaśyāṃ niṣādaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:3461_1: saptadaśyāṃ ṣaṅjaḥ, viṃśyāmṛṣabhaḥ, dvāviśyāṃ gāndhāraśceti vinyasteṣu svareṣu madhyamagrāmo bhavati /
GK16andhvc1u:3463_0: evañca ṣaṅjagrāme---ṣaṅjamadhyamapañcamāḥ catasṛbhyaḥ śrutibhya utpannāḥ, ṛṣabhadhaivatau tisṛbhya utpannau, gāndhāraniṣādau
GK16andhvc1u:3463_1: dvābhyāmutpannau; madhyamagrāme ca madhyamadhaivataṣaṅjāḥ catasṛbhya utpannāḥ, pañcamarṣabhau tisṛbhya utpannau, niṣādagandhārau
GK16andhvc1u:3463_2: dvābhyāmutpannāvita dvaigrāmikyo dvāviṃśyaḥ śrutayaḥ svaratadantarālobhayabhedakalpitāḥ siddhāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3464: tatra ṣaṅjagrāmamadhyamagrāmayormilitvā santyaṣṭādaśa jātayaḥ--ṣāṅjī, ārṣabhī, gāndharī, madhyamā, patrvamī, dhaivatī, naiṣādī, paṅjakaiśikī, ṣaṅjodīcyavā, ṣaṅjagātuṃ veti /
GK16andhvc1u:3465: evaṃ vācyavyatirekiṇo vyaṅgyasya sadbhāvaṃ pratipādya prādhānyaṃ tasyaiveti darśayati--- locanam mārgā gṛhyante /
GK16andhvc1u:3466: prakṛṣṭaṃ gītaṃ gānaṃ yeṣāṃ te pragītāḥ, gātuṃ vā prārabdhā ityādikarmaṇiktaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3477: yatnataḥ pratyabhijñeyau tau śabdārthau mahākaveḥ // DhvK_1.8 //, so 'rthastadyvaktisāmarthyayogī śabdaśca kaścana /
GK16andhvc1u:3481: vyahgyavyañjakābhyāmeva suprayuktābhyāṃ locanam tyarhārthe kṛtyaḥ, sarvo hi tathā yatate itīyatā prādhānye lokasiddhatvaṃ pramāṇamuktam /
GK16andhvc1u:3483_0: pratyabhijñeyaśabdenedamāha--- 'kāvyaṃ tu jātu jāyeta kasthacitpratibhāvataḥ' iti nayena yadyapi svayamasyaitatparisphurati,
GK16andhvc1u:3496: 'sahṛdayaiḥ so 'rthaḥ tathāvidhaḥ śabdasca mahākavestau śabdārtho yatnataḥ pratyabhijñeyāvi'ti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3498: etau mahākaveḥ tau tāddaśau śabdārthāvityākārakasahṛdayapratyabhijñānārhāvityartha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3499: atha tau śabdārthau mahākaveḥ mahākavinā pratyabhijñeyāvityarthāntaraṃ ca grāhyamityāha---niyogetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3523: locanam yathoktamasmatparamagurubhiḥ śrīmadutpalapādaiḥ-- taistairapyupayācitairupanatastanvyāḥ sthito 'pyantike kānto lokasamāna evamaparijñāto na rantuṃ yathā /
GK16andhvc1u:3524: lokasyaiṣa tathānavekṣitaguṇaḥ svātmāpi viśveśvaro naivālaṃ nijavaibhavāya tadiyaṃ tatpratyabhijñoditā  ḥ
GK16andhvc1u:3526: tena jñātasyāpi viśeṣato nirūpaṇamanusandhānātmakamatra pratyabhijñānaṃ, na tu tadevadamityetāvanmātram /
GK16andhvc1u:3529: evaṃ vyaṅgyasyārthasya vyañjakasya śabdasya ca prādhānyaṃ vadatā vyaṅkyavyañjakabhāvasyāpi bālapriyā taistairiti /
GK16andhvc1u:3530: sāmānyato 'vagatasyāpīśvarasya viśeṣato 'vagamamantareṇa na phalaparyantībhāvalābha ityartapradarśanaparo 'yaṃ ślokaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3534: evamaparijñātaḥ yo mayā lokottarasaundaryādiguṇaviśiṣṭatvena śrutastata eva rāgātiśayena prarthitasca sa kānto 'yamiti viśeṣeṇājñātaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3543: yasmātsāmānyato jñāte 'pi viśeṣājñānasambhavaḥ, tasmāt svataḥ sphuritayorapi śabdārthayoḥ mahākavinā yuktameva pratyabhijñānakaraṇamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3544: tarhi ko 'tra pratyabhijñāpadārtha ityata uktaphalatayā tatsvrūpamāha---tenetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3547: vṛttau 'mahākavestau śabdārthau sahṛdayaiḥ pratyabhijñeyāvi'viti 'tāveva śabdārthau mahākaveḥ pratyabhijñeyāvi'ti ca yojanā bodhyā /
GK16andhvc1u:3548: mahākavinā pratyabhijñeyāvi'viti 'tāveva śabdārthau mahākaveḥ pratyabhijñetyāvi'ti ca yojanā bodhyā /
GK16andhvc1u:3554: dhvaniriti idānīṃ vyaṅgyavyañjakayoḥ prādhānye 'pi yadvācyavācakāveva prathamamupādadate kavayastadapi yuktamevetyāha--
GK16andhvc1u:3556: tad-upāyatayā tadvad arthe vācye tad-ādṛtaḥ // DhvK_1.9 //
GK16andhvc1u:3559: yathā hyālokārthī sannapi dīpaśikhāyāṃ yatnavāñjano bhavati tadupāyatayā /
GK16andhvc1u:3561: tadvadyvaṅgyamarthaṃ pratyāddato jano vācye 'rthe yatnavān bhavati /
GK16andhvc1u:3562: locanam prādhānyamuktamiti dhvanati dhvanyate dhvananamiti tritayamapyupapannamityuktam // .8  // // .//
GK16andhvc1u:3567: vyaṅgyavyañjakaprādhānyānuvādena vācyavācakayoḥ prathamopādānayuktatvavacanaṃ vṛttāvayuktaṃ, prādhānyānuvādasyānupayogādityataḥ śaṅkottaratvena ghaṭayati---nanvityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3570: prathamopādīyamānatvahetoḥ ko doṣa ityataḥ so 'pi darśita ityāha---upāyānāmevetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3579: anena pratipādakasya kavervyaṅgyamarthaṃ prati vyāpāro darśitaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3585: yathā hi padārthadvāreṇa vākyārthāvagamastathā vācyārthapratītipūrvikā vyaṅgyasyārthasya pratipattiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3588: anena ślokenātyantasahṛdayo yo na bhavati tasyaiṣa sphuṭasaṃvedya eva kramaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3589: yathātyantaśabdavṛttajño yo na bhavati tasya padārthavākyārthakramaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3590: kāṣṭāprāptasahṛdayabhāvasta tu vākyavṛttakuśalasyeva sannapi kramo 'bhyastānumānāvinābhāvasmṛtyādivadasaṃvedya iti darśitam  // .10  // // .//
GK16andhvc1u:3617: abhyaste viṣaye anumānamanumitiḥ avinābhāvasmṛtiḥ vyāptismṛtiḥ tayoḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3620: idānīṃ vācyārthapratītipūrvakatve 'pi tatpratītervyaṅgyasyārthasya prādhānyaṃ yathā na vyālupyate tathā darśayati---
GK16andhvc1u:3622: yathā vyāpāra-niṣpattau padārtho na vibhāvyate // DhvK_1.11 //
GK16andhvc1u:3626: prādhānyādeva tatparyantānusaraṇaraṇaraṇakatvaritā madhye viśrānti na kurvata iti kramasya sāto 'pyalakṣaṇaṃ prādhānye hetuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3629: viśabdena vibhaktatoktā; vibhaktatayā bālapriyā 'svasāmarthyai'tyādikārikādvayamavatārayati vṛttau--'idānīm' ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3632: nanu kārikāyāṃ sato 'pi kramasyālakṣaṇaṃ darśitaṃ, tasya kathaṃ prādhānyopapādakatvamityata āha--prādhānyādevetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3635: tatparyantaṃ prayojanabhūtapratīyamānārthaparyantaṃ yadanusaraṇaṃ budhyānudhāvanaṃ, 'tattātparye'ti pāṭhe pratīyamānarūpatātparyārthaṃ prati yadanusaraṇamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3636: tatra raṇaraṇakena autsukyena tvaritāḥ santa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3640: tathā ca kā kathā kramaparyālocanāyāmiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3643: 'svasāmarthye'tyasya svasya padārthasya yat sāmarthyaṃ sahakārītyarthābhiprāyeṇa vivṛṇoti--ākāṅkṣetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3644: kārikāyāṃ 'vyāpāraniṣpattā'viti svavyāpārasya vākyārthapratipādanarūpasya niṣpattau satyāṃ vākyārthabuddhāvityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3648: vibhāvanamātraniṣedhena yathā svasāmarthyavaśenaiva vākyārthaṃ prakāśayannapi padārtho vyāpāraniṣpattau na bhāvyate vibhaktatayā /
GK16andhvc1u:3654: anena vidyamāna eva kramo na saṃvedyata ityuktam /
GK16andhvc1u:3655: tena yatsphoṭābhiprāyeṇāsanneva krama iti vyācakṣate tatpratyuta viruddhameva /
GK16andhvc1u:3656: vācye 'rthe vimukho viśrāntinibandhanaṃ paritoṣamalabhamāna ātmā hṛdayaṃ yeṣāmityanena sacetasāmityasyaivārtho 'bhivyaktaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3657: sahṛdayānāmeva tarhyayaṃ mahimāstu, na tu kāvyasyāsau kaścidatiśaya ityāśaṅkyāha-avabhāsata iti /
GK16andhvc1u:3658: tenātra vibhaktatayā na bhāsate, na tu vācyasya sarvathaivānavabhāsaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3659: ata eva tṛtīyoddyote ghaṭapradīpaddaṣṭāntabalādvyaṅgyapratītikāle 'pi vācyapratītirna vighaṭata iti yadvakṣyati tena sahāsya granthasya na virodhaḥ // 11//
GK16andhvc1u:3677_0: yadyuktalakṣaṇasahṛdayabudhyupādhikamasya jhāṭityena sphuraṇaṃ, tarhyanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ tadbuddhereva taddhetutvātsahṛdayānāmeva
GK16andhvc1u:3690: na bhāsata iti vyaṅgyo 'rtha iti śeṣaḥ ; yena kramo lakṣyeta iti vyācakṣate /
GK16andhvc1u:3694: evaṃ vācyavyatirekiṇo vyaṅgyasyārthasya sadbhāvaṃ pratipādya prakṛta upayojayannāha---
GK16andhvc1u:3695: yatrārthaḥ śabdo vā tam artham upasarjanīkṛta-svārthau /
GK16andhvc1u:3696: vyaṅktaḥ kāvya-viśeṣaḥ sa dhvanir iti sūribhiḥ kathitaḥ // DhvK_1.13 //
GK16andhvc1u:3698: vyaṅktaḥ kāvyaviśeṣaḥ sa dhvaniriti sūribhiḥ kathitaḥ // 13 //
GK16andhvc1u:3706: svaścārthaśca tau svārthau; tau guṇīkṛttau yābhyām; yathāsaṃkhyena tenārtho guṇīkṛtātmā,śabdo guṇīkṛtābhidheyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3708: 'sarasvatī svādu tadarthavastu' bālapriyā na virodha iti /
GK16andhvc1u:3719: vyaṅgyasya sadbhāve siddhavi siddha eva tamarithamiti tatpadena parāmarśo yujyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3724: yatrārtho vācyaviśeṣaḥ vācakaviśeṣaḥ śabdo vā tamarthaṃ vyaṅktaḥ, sa kāvyaviśeṣo dhvaniriti /
GK16andhvc1u:3725: anena vācyavācakacārutvahetubhya upamādibhyo 'nuprāsādibhyaśca locanam iti yaduktam /
GK16andhvc1u:3727: vyaṅkta iti dvivacanenadamāha--yadyapyavivakṣitavācye śabda eva vyañjakastathāpyarthasyāpi sahakāritā na truṭyati, anyathā ajñātārtho 'pi śabdastahyañjakaḥ syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:3728: vivakṣitānyaparavācye ca śabdasyāpi sahakāritvaṃ bhavatyeva, viśiṣṭaśabdābhidheyatayā vinā tasyārthasyāvyañjakatvāditi sarvatra śabdārthayorubhayorapi dhvananaṃ vyāpāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3730: arthaḥ śabdo veti tu vikalpābhidhānaṃ prādhānyābhiprāyema /
GK16andhvc1u:3731: kāvyaṃ ca tadviśeṣaścāsau kāvyasya vā viśeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3733: bālapriyā nanvekaikatra śabdārthayorekaikasyaiva vyañjakatvāt vyaṅkta iti dvivacanamanupapannamityata āha--dvivacanenetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3740: yathā gajasyākṣinimīlanaṃ na buddhipūrvakamapi tu svabhāvata evetyavicāro gajanimīlikāśabdena lakṣyate /
GK16andhvc1u:3741: nanu yadi samuccayastarhi 'arthaśabdāvi'ti bhāvyamityata āha--artha ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3744_0: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ---vākāro 'tra śabdārthayoḥ vyañjanakriyākarttṛtve vikalpasya na bodhakaḥ, yena 'śiraśśvā kāko vā dgupadatanayo
GK16andhvc1u:3744_1: vā parimṛśe'dityādāvivaikavacanaṃ bhavet, āpi tu vyañjanakriyāyāṃ kartṛtvenānvitayoḥ śabdārthayoḥ vyañjanaprādhānye vikalpamavagamayati /
GK16andhvc1u:3745: tathā ca vikalpitavyañjanaprādhānyau śabdārthau vyaṅkta iti vākyārtha iti /
GK16andhvc1u:3749: 'yo dhvanilakṣaṇa ātmā sa tathāvidhaśabdārthapṛṣṭapātīti kāvyagrahaṇāduktam' iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3752: yaccoktam--'cārutvapratītistarhi kāvyasyātmā syāt' iti tadaṅgīkurma eva /
GK16andhvc1u:3754: yaccoktam---'cāruṇaḥ pratītiryadi kāvyātmā pratyakṣādipramāṇādapi sā bhavantī tathā syāt' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:3755: tatra śabdārthamayakāvyātmābhidhānaprastāve ka eṣa prasaṅga iti na kiñcidetat /
GK16andhvc1u:3757: artho vā śabdo vā, vyāpāro vā /
GK16andhvc1u:3759: vyaṅgyo vā dhvanyata iti vyāpāro vā bālapriyā teneti /
GK16andhvc1u:3762: 'pono devadatto divā na bhuṅkta' ityādau rātribhojanādergamyatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3764_0: yadi cārutvahetutayā prāsiddhebhyo guṇādibhyo 'nyaḥ kāvyātmā syāttarhi cārutvapratītireva tadātmāstu, tasyāḥ dṛṣṭatvenāddaṣṭavastvantarakalpane
GK16andhvc1u:3767: cārutvapratītirityasya cārutvapratīterviṣayo heturvā kaścidguṇādibhyo 'nya ityarthasya vaktavyatayā dhvanināmnyena vivāda ityartaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3774: prakaraṇānabhijño 'sau pūrvaṃpakṣī, ata upekṣya iti pariharati---tatretyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3787: yato lakṣaṇakṛtāmeva sa kevalaṃ na prasiddhaḥ, lakṣye tu parīkṣyamāṇe sa eva sahṛdayahṛdayāhlādakāri kāvyatattvam /
GK16andhvc1u:3789: kārikayā tu prādhānyena samudāya eva kāvyarūpo mukhyatayā dhvaniriti pratipāditam /
GK16andhvc1u:3795: lakṣaṇakārāprasiddhatāviruddho hetuḥ; tata eva hi yatnena lakṣaṇīyatā /
GK16andhvc1u:3801: tathāca saḥ tathāvidhaḥ śabdavācyavyaṅgyavyañjanasamudāyātmakaḥ kāvyaviśeṣo dhvaniriti kathitaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3812: uktārthopapādanāya 'viśeṣeṇa sinoti badhnāti svasambandhinaṃ padārtham' iti vyutpattimabhipretya viṣayaśabdasyārthamāha--ananyatra bhāva iti /
GK16andhvc1u:3815: 'dhvanerviṣaya' ityasya yasamādanyatra dhvanivyavahārasya sadbhāvo nāsti, sa ityartha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3816: lakṣaṇapratipādanenaiva prathamābhāvavādimataṃ nirākṛtamityabhiprāyeṇa vṛttikṛto 'yadapyuktam' ityādinā dvitīyābhāvavādimatadūṣaṇābhidhānamiti pradarśayitumāha--evamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3820_0: ghnanirnāma kāvyaprakāro na kāvyaśabdavācyaḥ prasiddhaprasthānātikrāmitvāditi paramatasya prasiddhaprasthānātikrāmitvādityanena
GK16andhvc1u:3820_1: lakṣaṇakārāprasiddhatvaṃ lakṣyāprasiddhatvaṃ vā vivakṣitamiti vikalpamabhipretya yata ityādinā dūṣaṇamabhihitamiti vyācaṣṭe---lakṣaṇetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3825_1: prasthāne vyaṅgyavyañjakasamāśrayema vyavasthitasya dhvaneḥ kathamantarbhāvaḥ, vācyavācakacārutvahetavo hi tasyāṅgabhūtāḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:3828: locana.m yacca nuttagītādikalpaṃ, tatkāvyasya na kiñjit /
GK16andhvc1u:3837: bālapriyā guṇādivyatiriktasya tasya nṛttādiprāyatvameveti yaduktaṃ tadapi nirākaroti--yaccetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3844: gauṇo vā kāvyasya citrapadena vyavahāra ityāha--kāvyetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3847: viṣṇavādyanukāritvamālekhyamātratvaṃ kalārūpatvaṃ ca lokaprasiddhacitrāṇāmastīti tadyogātkāvye citraśabdapravṛttirityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3858: nanu yatra pratiyamānasyārthasya vaiśadyenāpratītiḥ sa nāma mā bhūddhvanerviṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3859_0: yatra tu pratītirasti, yathā-samāsoktyākṣepānuktanimittaviśeṣoktiparyāyoktāpahnutidī pakasaṅka- rālaṅkārādau, tatra dhvanerantarbhāvo
GK16andhvc1u:3860: artho guṇīkṛtātmā, guṇīkṛtātmā, guṇīkṛtābhidheyaḥ śabdo vā yatrārthāntaramabhivyanakti sa dhvaniriti /
GK16andhvc1u:3865: abhihitamiti bhūtaprayoga ādau vyaṅkta ityasya vyākhyātatvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:3870_0: prādhānyaṃ ca yadyapi jñaptau na cakāsti; 'buddhau tattvāvabhāsinyāṃ' iti nayenākhaṇḍacarvamāviśrānteḥ, tathāpi vivecakairjīvitānveṣaṇe
GK16andhvc1u:3870_1: kriyamāṇe yadā vyaṅgyo 'rthaḥ punarapi vācyamevānuprāṇayannāste tadā tadupakaraṇatvādeva tasyālaṅkāratā /
GK16andhvc1u:3872: yadyapi paryante rasadhvanirasti, tathāpi madhyakakṣāniviṣṭo 'sau vyahgyo 'rtho bālapriyā kārikāyāmanuktasyādhikasyāpekṣitasyārthasyāvāpaḥ prakṣepaḥ taṃ kartumityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3877: dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyayordvayorapi pratītidaśāyāṃ prādhānyapratītyabhāvasya tulyatvāt, prādhānyaṃ tulyamityāśaṅkyābhiprāyaprakaṭanena pariharati--prādhānyaṃ cetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3880: khaṇḍo gumaprādhānyādilakṣaṇo bhedaḥ, tadrahito 'khaṇḍastāddaśasya vākyārthībhūtasya rasādivyaṅgyasya carvaṇāyāṃ viśrānteḥ sahṛdayamanasāṃ viśrānterityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3885: yaḥ pūrvaṃ vācyāduttīrmastadvyaṅgyatvātsakakṣyāntarahgato 'pi punaḥ pūrvabhāvirnī vācyakakṣyāṃ praviśya vācyamevānuprāṇayanyadā āste ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3898: yadā punarvyaṅgyo 'rtho vācyenopaskṛtaḥ kāvyamanuprāṇaṭayannāste tadā tasmāccamatkāralābha ityanenārthāt sidhyati /
GK16andhvc1u:3902: samāsoktau tāvat---- upoḍharāgema vilolatārakaṃ tathā gṛhītaṃ śaśinā niśāmukham /
GK16andhvc1u:3903: yathā samastaṃ timiśaṃśukaṃ tayā puro 'pi rāgādgalitaṃ na lakṣitam //
GK16andhvc1u:3904: ityāda.u vyaṅgyenānugataṃ vācyameva prādhānyena pratīyate locanam na rasonmukhībhavati; svātantryeṇāpi tu vācyamevārtha saṃskartuṃ dhāvatīti guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatokta /
GK16andhvc1u:3908: ityatra samāsokterlakṣaṇasvarūpaṃ hetirnāma tannirvacanamiti pādacatuṣṭayena kramāduktam /
GK16andhvc1u:3917: timiraṃ cāṃśukāśca sūkṣmāṃśavastimiśaṃśukaṃ raśmiśabalīkṛtaṃ tamaḥpaṭalaṃ, timiśaṃśukaṃ nīlajālikā navoḍhāprauḍhavadhūcitā /
GK16andhvc1u:3918: rāgādraktatvāt sandhyākṛtādanantaraṃ premarūpācca bālapriyā prathamāvācyasya dvitīyā vastuvyaṅgyasya tṛtīyā rasadhvaneśca kakṣeti sthitiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3924: atra niśāśaśivṛttāntaḥ prākāraṇikatvādvācyo nāyakavṛttāntastvaprākaraṇikatvādvyaṅgya ityabhipretya samānaviśeṣaṇatvaṃ vivṛṇoti--upoḍha ityādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:3947: rātryā karaṇabhūtayā samastaṃ miśritam; upalakṣaṇatvena vā /
GK16andhvc1u:3948: na lakṣitaṃ rākṣiprārambho 'sāviti na jñātaṃ, timirasaṃvalitāṃśudarśane hi rātrimukhamiti lokena lakṣyate na tu sphuṭa āloke /
GK16andhvc1u:3951: atra ca nāyakena paścādgatena cumbanopakrame puro nīlāṃśukasya galanaṃ patanam /
GK16andhvc1u:3952: yadi vā 'puro 'gre nāyakena tathā gṛhītaṃ mukham' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3954: tathāhi nāyakavyavahāro niśāśaśināveva śṛṅgāravibhāvarūpau saṃskurvāṇo 'laṅkāratāṃ bhajate, tatastu vācyādvibhāvībhūtādrasaniḥṣyandaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3955: yastu vyācaṣṭe---'teyāniśayeti kartṛpadaṃ, na cācetanāyāḥ kartṛtvamupapannamiti śabdenaivātra nāyakavyavahāra unnīto 'bhidhadheya eva, na vyaṅgya ityata eva samāsoktiḥ' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:3957: ekadeśavivarti cetthaṃ rūpakaṃ syāt, 'rājahaṃsairavījyanta śaradaiva saronṛpāḥ' itivat, na tu samāsoktiḥ; tulyaviśeṣaṇābhavāt /
GK16andhvc1u:3958: bālapriyā timirasya sūkṣmāṃśūnāṃ ca sammiśraṇaṃ prati rātryāḥ karamatvasambhavāttayeti karaṇe tṛtīyetyāha---karaṇabhūtayeti /
GK16andhvc1u:3959: tanmiśraṇaṃ prati rātryāḥ jñāpakatvarūpopalakṣaṇatvasambhavāt tayetyupalakṣaṇe tṛtīyā vetyāha-upalakṣaṇatvena veti /
GK16andhvc1u:3967: ata eva na labhitamiti hetuhetumadbhāvaṃ bodhayitumāha---timiretyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3981: evaṃ vyaṅgyasya guṇībhūtatvaṃ pradarśya rasāpekṣyā dhvanitvamapyastīti darśayintumāha--tata ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3998: ākṣepe 'pi vyaṅgyaviseṣākṣepiṇo 'pi vācyasyaiva cārutvaṃ prādhānyena vākyārtha ākṣepoktisāmarthyādeva jñāyate /
GK16andhvc1u:3999: tathāhi-tatra śabdopārūḍho viśeṣābhidhānecchayā pratiṣeṣa locanam gamyata iti cānenābhidhāvyāpāranirāsādityalamavāntareṇa bahunā /
GK16andhvc1u:4000: nāyikāyā nāyake yo vyavahāraḥ sa niśāyāṃ samāropitaḥ; nāyikāyāṃ nāyakasya yo vyavahāraḥ sa śaśini samāropita iti vyākhyāne naikaśeṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4004: tatrādya.u yathā--- ahaṃ tvāṃ yadi nekṣeya kṣaṇamapyutsukā tataḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4006_0: bālapriyā ityuktyanuguṇatayā rājahaṃsānāṃ cāmaratvaṃ śaradaścāmaragrāhiṇītvaṃ cārthāt sidhyati, tathā prakṛte timirāṃśukapadānuguṇatayā
GK16andhvc1u:4013: nāyikāyā vyavahāre nīlāmbaragalanānavalokanādirūpo vyāpāraḥ, nāyakasya tu vadanacumbanārambhādilakṣaṇaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4018: evaṃ samāsoktau vyaṅgyopaskṛtaṃ vācyameva pradhānamatastatra dhvanilakṣaṇasya nātivyāptiriti pradarśyākṣepe 'pi sa eva prakāra ityāha vṛtto-'ākṣepe 'pī' tyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4019: ākṣepe 'pi 'vācyasyaiva cārutvaṃ, prādhānyena jñāyata' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4021: vākyārthe viṣaye yā ākṣepoktiḥ, tasyāḥ sāmarthyādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4029: pratiṣedha iva locanam iti vakṣyamāṇamaraṇaviṣayo niṣedhātmākṣepaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4031: uktaviṣayastu yathā mamaiva--- bho bhoḥ kiṃ kimakāṇḍa eva patitastvaṃ pāntha kānyā gatiḥ tattāddaktṛṣitasya me khalamatiḥ so 'yaṃ jalaṃ gūhate /
GK16andhvc1u:4032: asthānopanatāmakālasulabhāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ prati krudhya bhoḥ trailokyaprathitaprabhāvamihimā mārgaḥ punarmāravaḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:4040: utsukāhaṃ tvāṃ kṣaṇamapi na tar ikṣeya yadi, tataḥ tarhi iyadetāvat yadiparyantaṃ vacanameva astu /
GK16andhvc1u:4057: bho bho iti vīpsayā bodhanīyaṃ pratyādarātiśayo dyotyate /
GK16andhvc1u:4060: kiṃ kiṃ patitaḥ atrāgamanena etatsevanena cābhimataṃ phalaṃ na sidhyatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4062: cirasevinā kenacidevamukte pānthaḥ kiñcit kupita āha---kānyetyādi khaletyantena /
GK16andhvc1u:4064: tattādṛgatiśayena tṛṣitasya tṛṣā jalapipāsā dhanalipsā ca /
GK16andhvc1u:4072: 'khalamatisso 'yam' iti pāṭhe tu so 'yamiti māravamārgaṃ prabhuṃ coddiśyoktiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4075: akālasulabhāṃ yadā viṣayasya sulabhatvaṃ tadā tṛṣṇā na bhavati, yadā punarasulabhatvaṃ tadā bhavatītyakālasulabhatvam /
GK16andhvc1u:4076: tṛṣṇāṃ prati tava tṛṣṇāyai krudhya na māṃ pratīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4079: māravaḥ marusambandhī mārgaḥ, atha ca duṣprabhuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4080: locanam atra kaścitsevakaḥ prāptaḥ prāptavyamasmātkimiti na labha iti pratyāśāviśasyamānahṛdayaḥ kenacidamunākṣepeṇa pratibodhyate /
GK16andhvc1u:4083: upamānasya candrāderākṣepaḥ; asminsati kiṃ tvayā kṛtyamiti /
GK16andhvc1u:4084: yathā--- tasyāstanmukhamasti saumyasubhagaṃ kiṃ pārvaṇenenḍhunā saundaryasya padaṃ dṛśau yadi ca taiḥ kiṃ nāma nīlotpalaiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4093: na labhe iti vitarkānantarajātayā pratyāśayā pratikṣaṇotpannayā āśayā viśasyamānaṃ hṛdayaṃ yasya sa iti pratibodhane hetuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4095: amunā ākṣepeṇa asatpuruṣasevātadvaiphalyādirūpavyaṅgyaviśeṣapratipipādayiṣayā kṛtena kiṃ kimakāṇḍa eva patita iti niṣedharūpeṇa /
GK16andhvc1u:4111: kiṃ kimakāṇḍa eva patita itīṣṭapatanaphalaniṣedharūpākṣepemākṣepyaṃ yadasatpuruṣasevāvaiphalyādi tenālaṅkṛtamākṣepakaṃ tadvācyameva pradhānamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4112: 'prāṇā yena samarpitā' ityādivadatrāprastutapraśaṃsāpyastīti tatsaṅkīrṇo 'yamākṣepa ityapi bodhyam /
GK16andhvc1u:4129: rūpo ya ākṣepaḥ sa eva vyaṅgyaviśeṣamākṣipanmukhyaṃ kāvyaśarīram /
GK16andhvc1u:4132: locanam kiṃ vā komalakāntibhiḥ kisalayaiḥ satyeva tatrādhare hī dhātuḥ punaruktavasturacanārambheṣvapūrvā grahaḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:4134: kiṃ tena kṛtyamiti tvapahastanārūpa ākṣepo vācya eva camatkārakāraṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:4143: punaruktānāmanupādeyānāṃ niṣphalānāṃ vastūnāṃ pārvaṇacandrādīnāṃ racanāyāṃ sṛṣṭau viṣaye ye ārambhā vyāpārāḥ teṣu /
GK16andhvc1u:4150: 'iti vācya ākṣepa eva camatkārakāraṇam' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4158: śaratkāle hi candrasya prasādātiśayo ravitāpādhikyaṃ ca /
GK16andhvc1u:4165: nāyikāpakṣe nakhakṣatasthatayā śrutamapyupamānatvamaindre dhanuṣiyojanīyamindracāpābhaṃ nakakṣataṃ dadhānetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4175: tatpurassaraḥ tasyāḥsa purassaraḥ pūrvakāle sammukhaṃ ca saranniti dvayorarthayoradhyavasāyenaikyaṃ bodhyamata evāho ityādeparupapattiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4178: ddaṣṭāntoktitayā aho daivagatiḥ kīddaktathāpi na samāgamaḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:4179: atra satyāmapi vyaṅgyapratītau vācyasyaiva cārutvamutkarṣavaditi tasyaiva prādhānyavivakṣā /
GK16andhvc1u:4180: yathā ca dīpakāpahnutyādau vyaṅgyatvenopamāyāḥ pratītāvapi prādhānyenāvivikṣitatvānna tayā vyapadeśastadvadatrāpi draṣṭavyam /
GK16andhvc1u:4186: vāmanābhiprāyemāyamākṣepaḥ, bhāmahābhiprāyeṇa tu samāsoktirityamumāśayaṃ hṛdaye gṛhītvā samāsoktyakṣepayoḥ yuktyedamekamevodāharaṇaṃ vyataradgranthakṛt /
GK16andhvc1u:4188: sarvathālaṅkāreṣu vyaṅgyaṃ vācye guṇībhavatīti naḥ sādhyamityatrāśayo 'tra granthe 'smadgurubhirnirūpitaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4189: evaṃ prādhānyavivakṣāyāṃ dṛṣṭāntamuktvā vyapadeśo 'pi prādhānyakṛta eva bhavatītyatra dṛṣṭāntaṃ svaparaprasiddhamāha---yathā ceti /
GK16andhvc1u:4193: dīpake hi 'ādimadhyāntaviṣayaṃ tridhā dīpakamiṣyate' iti lakṣaṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:4194: maṇiḥ śāṇollīḍhaḥ samaravijayī hetidalitaḥ kalāśeṣaścandra suratamṛditā bālalanā /
GK16andhvc1u:4195: madakṣīṇo nāgaḥ śaradi saridāśyānapulinā tanimnā śobhante galitavibhavāścārthiṣu janāḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:4216: yathā--- neyaṃ virauti bhṛṅgālī madena mukharā muhuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4222: yathā--- sa ekastrīṇi jayati jaganti kusumāyudhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4223: haratāpi tanuṃ yasya śambhunā na hṛtaṃ balam //
GK16andhvc1u:4225: uktanimittāyāmapi vastusvabhāvamātratve paryavasānamiti tatrāpi na vyaṅgyasadbhāvaśaṅkā /
GK16andhvc1u:4226: yathā--- karpūra iva dagdho 'pi śaktimānyo jane jane /
GK16andhvc1u:4258: tatra ca yatkiñcinnimittaṃ bhavet, parantu tadacintyamityāha---iyañceti /
GK16andhvc1u:4264: yasmādukte prakāradvaye vyaṅyasadbhāvo anuktanimittāyāmapi viśeṣoktau---- āhūto 'pi sahāyaiḥ omityuktvā vimuktanidro 'pi /
GK16andhvc1u:4265: gantumanā api pathikaḥ saṅkocaṃ naiva śithilayati //
GK16andhvc1u:4267: na tu tatpratītinimittā locanam tena prakāradvayamavadhīrya tṛtīyaṃ prakāramāśaṅkate--anuktanimittāyāmapīti /
GK16andhvc1u:4269: śītakṛtā khalvārtiratra nimittamiti bhaṭṭodbhaṭaḥ, tadabhiprāyeṇāha-na tvatra kāciccārutvaniṣpattiriti /
GK16andhvc1u:4270_0: yattu rasikairapi nimittaṃ kalpitam-'kāntāsamāgame gamanādapi laghutaramupāyaṃ svapnaṃ manyamāno nidrāgamabuddhyā saṅkocaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:4270_1: nātyajat' iti tadapi nimittaṃ cārutvahetutayā nālaṅkāravidbhiḥ kalpitam, api tu viśeṣoktibhāga eva na śithilayatītyevambhūto
GK16andhvc1u:4272: evamabhiprāyadvayamapi sādhāraṇoktyā granthakṛnnyarūpayanna tvaudbhaṭenaivābhiprāyeṇa grantho vyavasthita iti mantavyam /
GK16andhvc1u:4301: muneśśatrusadbhāvo nocitaḥ, tatra taducchedecchā tato 'pyanucitā, tasyā draḍhimā atyantānucitaḥ; ata evāha-utpateti /
GK16andhvc1u:4308: paryāyokte 'pi yadi prādhānyena vyaṅgyatvaṃ tadbhavatu nāma tasya dhvanāvantarbhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4311: locanam atra bhīṣmasya bhārgavaprabhāvabhibhāvī prabhāva iti yadyapi pratīyate, tathāpi tatsahāyena deśitā dharmadeśanetyabhidhīyamānenaiva kāvyārtho 'laṅkṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4312_0: ata eva paryāyeṇa prakārāntareṇāvagamātmanā vyaṅgyenopalakṣitaṃ sadyadabhidhīyate tadabhidhīyamānamuktameva satparyāyoktamityabhidhīyata
GK16andhvc1u:4312_1: itilakṣaṇapadam, paryāyoktamiti lakṣyapadam, arthālaṅkāratvaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ ceti sarvaṃ yujyate /
GK16andhvc1u:4313: yadi tvabhidhīyata ityasya balādyvakhyānamabhidhīyate pratīyate pradānatayeti, udāharamaṃ ca 'bhama dhammia' ityādi, tadālaṅgāratvameva dūre sampannamātmatāyāṃ paryavasānāt /
GK16andhvc1u:4327: 'ata eva iti sarvaṃ yujyata' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4328: vyaṅgyasya prādhānye sarvametadanupapannaṃ bhavedato vācyasyaiva prādhānyamabhyupeyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4329: 'paryāyoktaṃ yadanyena prakāreṇābhidhīyata' ityetāvanmātraṃ bhāmahoktaṃ lakṣaṇam; tatrānyena prakāreṇetyasya vivaraṇaṃ 'paryāyeṇetyādyupalakṣita'mityantam /
GK16andhvc1u:4339: anena lakṣaṇavākyenaiva vyaṅgyānugatasya vācyasya prādhānyaṃ gamyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4355: prādhānavyaṅgyānāṃ na punaḥ paryāyokte bhāmahodāhṛtasaddaśe vyaṅgyasyaiva prādhānyam /
GK16andhvc1u:4357: apahnutidīpakayoḥ punarvācyasya locanam yāddaśo 'laṅkāratvena vivakṣitastāddaśe dhvanirnāntarbhavati, na tāddagasmābhirdhvaniruktaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4361: atha vyāpakatvāṅgitve tasyopagamyete, tyajyate cālaṅkāratā,tarhyasmannaya evāyamavalambyate kevalaṃ mātsaryagrahātparyāyoktavāceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4362: na ceyadapi prāktanairddaṣṭamapi tvasmābhirevonmīlitamiti darśayati-na punariti /
GK16andhvc1u:4363: bhāmahasya yāddaktadīyaṃ rūpabhimataṃ tāddagudāharaṇena darśatam. tatrāpi naiva vyaṅgyasya prādhānyaṃ cārutvāhetutvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:4364: tena tadanusāritayā tatsaddaśaṃ yadudāharaṇāntaramapi kalpyate tatra naiva vyaṅgyasya prādhānyamiti saṅgatiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4365: yadi tu taduktamudāharaṇamanāddataya 'bhama dhamm' ityādyudāhniyate, tadasmacchiṣyataiva /
GK16andhvc1u:4366: kevalaṃ tu nayamanavalambyāpaśravamenātmasaṃskāra ityanāryaceṣṭitam. yadāhuraitihā sikāḥ---'avajñayāpyavacchādya śṛṇvannarakamṛcchati' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:4367: bhāmahena hyudāhṛtam--- 'guheṣvadhvasu vā nānnaṃ bhuñjmahe yadadhītinaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4381: mātsaryagrahaṇātkevalaṃ paryāyoktavācā ayamasmannaya evāvalambyata iti yojanā /
GK16andhvc1u:4397: 'adhītinaḥ viprāḥ yadannaṃ na bhuñjate vayaṃ gṛheṣvadhvasu vā tadannaṃ na prādhānyaṃ vyaṅgyasya cānuyāyitvaṃ prasiddhameva /
GK16andhvc1u:4398: saṅkarālaṅkāre 'pi yadālaṅkāro 'laṅkārāntaracchāyāmanugṛhṇāti, locanam etaddhi bhagavadvāsudevavacanaṃ paryāyema rasadānaṃ niṣedhati /
GK16andhvc1u:4400: na cāsya rasadānaniṣedhasya vyaṅgyasya kiñciccārutvamasti yena prādhānyaṃ śaṅgyeta /
GK16andhvc1u:4401: api tu tadyvaṅgyopodbalitaṃ viprabhojanena vinā yannabhojanaṃ tadevoktaprakāreṇa paryāyoktaṃ satprākaraṇikaṃ bhojanārthamalaṅkurute /
GK16andhvc1u:4402: na hyasya nirviṣaṃ bhojanaṃ bhavatviti vivakṣitamiti paryāyoktamalaṅkāra eveti cirantanānāmabhimata iti tātparyam /
GK16andhvc1u:4407_0: pūrvaṃ caitadupamādivyapadeśabhājanameva tadyathā na bhavatītyamuyā chāyayā dṛṣṭāntatayoktamapyuddeśakramapūraṇāya granthaśayyāṃ
GK16andhvc1u:4408: chāyāntarema vastu punarekamevopamāyā eva vyaṅgyatvena dhvanitvāśaṅkanāt /
GK16andhvc1u:4409: yattu vivaraṇakṛt---dīpakasya sarvatropamānvayo nāstīti bahunodāharaṇaprapañcenavicāritavāṃstadanupayogi nissāraṃ supratikṣepaṃ ca /
GK16andhvc1u:4418: caidyasaṅkalpatamannayojitaviṣadānaṃ me mā bhavatviti, bhojanaṃ nirviṣaṃ bhavatviti vā bhagavato 'bhiprāyassahṛdayānāṃ vyaṅgyo bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4430: na vivakṣitaṃ caidyaṃ prata na bubodhayiṣitam /
GK16andhvc1u:4433: tīpakāpahnutyādāviti pūrvoktasyaivādyakathanena paunarukatyamityāśaṅkāyāṃ svarūpaikye 'pi prakārabhedānna paunaruktyamityāha---pūrvamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4443: locanam sa priyāsaṅgamotkaṇṭhāṃ sāsahyāṃ manasaḥ śucam  //
GK16andhvc1u:4447: tathā hi--- rāma iva daśaratho 'bhūddaśaratha iva radhurajo 'pi radhusaddaśaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4450: tasmātkramikatvaṃ samaṃ vā prākaraṇikatvamupamāṃ niruṃṇaddhīti ko 'yaṃ trāsa itlaṃ gardabhīdohānuvartanena /
GK16andhvc1u:4453: ekasya ca grahe nyāyadoṣābhāve ca saṅkaraḥ  //
GK16andhvc1u:4458_0: atra śaśī vadanamasyāḥ tadvadvā vadanamasyā iti rūpakopamollekhādyugapaddvayāsambhavādekatarapakṣatyāgagrahaṇe pramāṇābhāvātsaṅkara
GK16andhvc1u:4459: yo 'pi dvitīyaḥ prakāraḥ---śabdārthālaṅkārāmāmekatrabhāva iti tatrāpi pratīyamānasya kā śaṅkā /
GK16andhvc1u:4460: yathā--smara smaramiva priyaṃ ramayase yamāliṅganāt iti /
GK16andhvc1u:4484: ko vyaṅgyaḥ ko vācya ityaniścayādvyaṅgyaprādānyakṛtadhvanitvasambhāvanāpi locanam atraiva yamakamupamā ca /
GK16andhvc1u:4485: tṛtīyaḥ prakāraḥ-- yatraikatra vākyāṃśe 'neko 'rthālaṅkārastatrāpi dvayoḥ sāmyātkasya vyaṅgyatā /
GK16andhvc1u:4497: tayā gṛhītaṃ nu mṛgāṅganābhyastato gahītaṃ nu mṛgāṅganābhiḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:4498_0: atra mṛgāṅganāvalokanena tadavalokanasyopamā yadyapi vyaṅgyā, tathāpi vāyyasya sā sandehālaṅkārasyābhyutthānakārimītvenānugrahakatvādguṇībhūtā,
GK16andhvc1u:4502: ekavākyavartanarūpaṃ saṅkaraṃ darśayitvā, ekavākyāṃśasamāveśarūpaṃ saṅkaraṃ darśayati--yatretyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4506: svāmino vipattau satyāṃ samucitaṃ yadvratagrahaṇa tatra hevākī udyuktaḥ yaḥ kulaputrakaḥ tadrūpaṇaṃ vāsaraviṣayakaṃ karma /
GK16andhvc1u:4508: bhāsvatassvāmitvamatastadgamanasya vipattitvaṃ guhānivāsasya vratagrahamatvaṃ tatpraveśasya tadarthavyāpāratvañca tamoguhāmiti śābdena rūpakeṇa gamyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4520: atha vācyopasarjanībhāvena vyaṅgyasya tatrāvasthānaṃ tadā locanam tadāha-yadālaṅkāra ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4523: ādye tu prakāre 'śaśivadane'tyādyudāhṛte kathañcidasti sambhāvanetyāśacaṅkya nirākaroti---alaṅkāradvayeti /
GK16andhvc1u:4526: nanu yatra vyaṅgyameva prādhānyena bhāti tatra kiṃ kartavyam /
GK16andhvc1u:4527: yathā--- hīi ṇa guṇāṇurāo khalāṇaṃ ṇavaraṃ pasiddhisaraṇāṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:4528: kira pahiṇusai sasimaṇaṃ cande piāmuhe diṭṭhe  //
GK16andhvc1u:4531: saṅkarālaṅkāra bālapriyā asmiṃścaturthe bhede dhvanyabhāvaparatayā vṛttigranthamavatārayati---tadāheti /
GK16andhvc1u:4538: bhavati na guṇānurāgaḥ khalānāṃ kevalaṃ prasiddhiśaraṇānām /
GK16andhvc1u:4539: kila prasnaiti śaśimaṇiḥ candre na priyāmukhe dṛṣṭe //
GK16andhvc1u:4545: 'śaśimaṇiḥ candre dṛṣṭe prasnauti kila; priyāmukhe dṛṣṭe na prasnautī'tyānvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4546: yadi śasimaṇergumānurāgassyāttadā priyāmukhadarśane kathaṃ na niḥṣyandeteti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4548: candraḥ priyāmukhameva candra ityarthasya khyāpanādapahnutiśceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4551: saṅkaroktereva dhvanitvabuddhinivartakatvaṃ vṛttāvuktaṃ, so 'pi dhvaniviṣayo 'stu, na tu sa eva dhvaniriti vaktuṃ śakyam /
GK16andhvc1u:4553: api ca saṅkarālaṅkāre 'pi ca kvacit saṅkaroktireva locanam evāyaṃ na bhavati, api tvalaṅkāradhvanināmāyaṃ dhvanerdvitīyo bhedaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4555: atha sarveṣu saṅkaraprabhedeṣu vyaṅgyasambhāvanānirāsaprakāraṃ sādhāraṇamāha---api ceti /
GK16andhvc1u:4557: saṅkīrmatā hi miśratvaṃ lolībhāvaḥ, tatra kathamekasya prādhānyaṃ kṣīrajalavat /
GK16andhvc1u:4562: tatra prathame prakāradvaye prastutāprastutayostulyameva prādhānyamiti pratijñāṃ karoti-aprastutetyādinā prādhānyamityantena /
GK16andhvc1u:4563: tatra sāmānyaviśeṣabhāve 'pi dvayī gatiḥ--sāmānyamaprākaraṇikaṃ śabdenocyate, gamyate tu prākaraṇiko viśeṣaḥ sa ekaḥ prakāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4566: atra hi daivaprādhānyaṃ sarvatra sāmānyarūpamaprastutaṃ varṇitaṃ satprakṛte vastuni kvāpi vinaṣṭe viśeṣātmani paryavasyati /
GK16andhvc1u:4567: tatrāpi viśeṣāṃśasya sāmānyena vyāptatvādyvaṅgyaviśeṣavadvācyasāmānyasyāpi prādhānyam, na hi sāmānyaviśeṣayoryugapatprādhānyaṃ virudhyate /
GK16andhvc1u:4568: yadā tu viseṣo 'prākaramikaḥ prākaraṇikaṃ sāmānyamākṣipati tadā dvitīyaḥ bālapriyā tatkathamityatrāha--saṅkīrṇateti /
GK16andhvc1u:4587: nanu vyaṅgyasya viśeṣasyāstu prādhānyaṃ, vācyasya sāmānyasya tatkathaṃ syādityatrāha--viśeṣāṃśasyeti /
GK16andhvc1u:4590_0: aprastutapraśaṃsāyāmapi yadā sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvānnimittanimittibhāvādvā abhidhīyamānasyāprastutsaya pratīyamānena prastutenābhisambandhaḥ
GK16andhvc1u:4591_0: yadā tāvatsāmānyasyāprastutasyābhidhīyamānasya prākaraṇikena viśeṣeṇa pratīyamānena sambandhastadā viśeṣapratītau satyāmapi
GK16andhvc1u:4592: yadāpi viśeṣasya sāmānyaniṣṭhatvaṃ tadāpi sāmānyasya prādhānye sāmanye sarvaviśeṣāṇāmantarbhāvādviśeṣasyāpi prādhānyam /
GK16andhvc1u:4594: yathā--- etattasya mukhātkiyattakamalinīpattre kaṇaṃ pārthaso yanmuktāmaṇirityamaṃsta sa jaḍaḥ śṛṇvanyadasmādapi /
GK16andhvc1u:4595: aṅgulyagralaghukriyāpravilayinyādīyamāne śanai. statroṅḍīya gato hahetyanudinaṃ nidrāti nāntaḥ śucā //
GK16andhvc1u:4596: atrāsthān.e mahattvasambhavanaṃ sāmānyaṃ prastutam, prastutaṃ tu jalabindau maṇitvasambhāvanaṃ viśeṣarūpaṃ vācyam /
GK16andhvc1u:4598: evamekaḥ prakāro dvibhedo 'pi vicāritaḥ, yadā tāvadityādinā viśeṣasyāpi prādhānyamityantena /
GK16andhvc1u:4599: etameva nyāyaṃ nimittanaimittikabhāve 'tidiśaṃstasyāpi dviprakāratāṃ bālapriyā viśeṣaprādhānyanāntarīyakatvaṃ sāmānyaprādhānyasyeti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4601: yathā 'raktaṃ paṭaṃ vaye'tyādau dvayostrayāṇaṃ vā vidhirit bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4607: muktāmaṇirityamasta yat etattasya jaḍasya kiyat vakṣyamāṇāpekṣayā atyalpamevetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4618: ādīyamāne aṅgulyagrasya laghukriyayā alpacācalanena pravlayini aṅguloveva lagra ityarthastathā sati /
GK16andhvc1u:4621: tasyādarśinānmamāyaṃ muktāmaṇiḥ khamutpatya gata iti matvā antaḥśucā na nidrātītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4625: yathā----- ye yāntyabhyudaye prītiṃ nojjhanti vyasaneṣu ca /
GK16andhvc1u:4627_0: atrāprastuta.ṃ suhṛdbāndhavarūpatvaṃ nimitt sajjanāsaktyā varṇayati naimittikīṃ śraddheyavacanatāṃ prastutāmātmano 'bhivyaṅktum;
GK16andhvc1u:4627_1: yatra naimittikapratītāvapi nimittapratītireva pradhānībhavatyanuprāṇākatveneti vyaṅgyavyañjakayoḥ prādhānyam /
GK16andhvc1u:4628: kadācittu nemititakamaprastutaṃ varṇyamānaṃ satprastutaṃ nimittaṃ vyanakti /
GK16andhvc1u:4633: tatra nimittapratītāvapi nemittikaṃ vācyabhūtam; pratyuta tannimittānuprāṇitatvenoddhurakandharīkarotyātmānamiti samapradhānataiva vācyavyaṅgyayoḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4635: yathāsmadupādhyāyabhaṭṭendurājasya---- prāṇā yena samarpitāstava balādyena tvamutthāpitaḥ skandhe yasya ciraṃ sthito 'si vidadhe yaste saparyāmapi /
GK16andhvc1u:4636: tasyāsya smitamātrakeṇa janayan prāṇāpahārakriyāṃ bhrātaḥ pratyupakāriṇāṃ dhuri paraṃ vetāla līlāyate //
GK16andhvc1u:4647: na hi vaktustathāvidhabāndhavatvādipratītiṃ vinā śraddheyavacanatvaṃ pratītipathamavatarediti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4658: locanam atra yadyapi sārūpyavaśena kṛtadhnaḥ kaścidanyaḥ prastuta ākṣipyate, tathāpyaprastutasyaiva vetālavṛttāntasya camatkārakāritvam /
GK16andhvc1u:4659: na hyacetanopālambhavadasambhāvyamāno 'yamartho na ca na hṛdya iti vācyasyātra pradhānatā /
GK16andhvc1u:4660: yadi punaracetanādinātyantāsambhāvyamānatadarthaviśeṣaṇenāprastutena varṇitena prastutamākṣipyamāṇaṃ camatkārakāri tadā vastudhvanirasau /
GK16andhvc1u:4661: yathā mamaiva---- bhāvavrāta haṭhājjanasya hṛdayānyākramya yannartayan bhaṅgībhirvividhābhirātmahṛdayaṃ pracchādya saṃkrīḍase /
GK16andhvc1u:4662: sa tvāmāha jaḍaṃ tataḥ sahṛdayammanyatvaduḥśikṣito manye 'muṣya jaḍātmatā stutipadaṃ tvatsāmyasambhāvanāt //
GK16andhvc1u:4663_0: kaścinmahāpuruṣo vītarāgo 'pi sarāgavaditi nyāyena gāḍhavivekālokatiraskṛtatimirapratāno 'pi lokamadhye svātmānaṃ pracchādayalaṃlokaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:4663_1: ca vācālayannātmanyapratibhāsamevāṅgīkurvaṃstenaiva lokena mūrkho 'yamiti yadavajñāyate tadā tadīyaṃ lokottaraṃ caritaṃ prastutaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:4663_2: bālapriyā 'tvamutpādita' iti 'saparyāṃ pura' iti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4674: atyantamasambhāvyamānāni tadarthasya aprastutārthasya viśeṣaṇāni yatra tena /
GK16andhvc1u:4678: bhāvānāṃ candrodyānādipadārthanāṃ vrātaḥ sārthaḥ he bhāva vrāta /
GK16andhvc1u:4685: yā jaḍātmatā jaḍo 'sītyucyamānatā sā tvatsāmyasambhāvanāt tvatsāmyāpātāddhetoḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4691: gāḍho yo viveka evālokaḥ tena tiraskṛtaṃ timirapratānaṃ mohāndhakārasamūho yasya saḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4698_0: jaḍo 'yamiti hyudyānendūdayādirbhāvo lokenāvajñāyete, sa ca pratyuta kasyacidvirihiṇa autsukyacintādūyamānamānasatāmanyasya
GK16andhvc1u:4698_1: praharṣaparavaśatāṃ karotīti haṭhādeva lokaṃ yathecchaṃ vikārakāraṇābhirnartayati /
GK16andhvc1u:4699_0: na ca tasya hṛdayaṅkenāpi jñāyate kīdṛgayamiti, pratyuta mahāgambhīro 'tividagdhaḥ suṣṭugarvahīno 'tiśayena krīḍācaturaḥ
GK16andhvc1u:4699_1: sa yadi lokena jaḍa iti tata eva kāraṇātpratyuta vaidagdhyasambhāvananimittātsambhāvitaḥ, ātmā ca yata eva kāraṇātpratyuta
GK16andhvc1u:4699_2: jāḍyena sambhāvyastata eva sahṛdayaḥ sambhāvitastadasya lokasya jaḍo 'sīti yadyucyate tadā jaḍyamevaṃvidhasya bhāvavrātasyāvidagdhasya
GK16andhvc1u:4703: itarathaiva punaralaṅkārāntaratvamalaṅkāraviśeṣatvaṃ na vyaṅgyasya kathañcidapi prādhānya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4704: uddeśe yadādigrahaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ samāsoktītyatra dvandve tena vyājastutiprabhṛtiralaṅkāravargo 'pi sambhāvyamānavyaṅgyānuveśaḥ sambhāvitaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4733: tathā sati tattulyayogakṣematayā janasyāpyajaḍatvasambhavājjanaṃ pratijaḍo 'sītyuktirvāstavī stutireva paryavasyediti /
GK16andhvc1u:4739: tadayamatra saṅkṣepaḥ---- locanam tatra sarvatra sādhāraṇamuttaraṃ dātumupakramate---tadayamatreti /
GK16andhvc1u:4741: tatra vyājastutiryathā--- kiṃ vṛttāntaiḥ paragṛhagataiḥ kintu nāhaṃ samartha- stūṇīṃ sthātuṃ prakṛtimukharo dākṣiṇātyasvabhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4742: gehe gehe vipaṇiṣu tathā catvare pānagoṣṭhyā- munmatteva bhramati bhavato vallabhā hanta kīrtiḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:4744: yattūdāhṛtaṃ kenacit---- āsīnnātha pitāmahī tava mahī jātā tato 'nantaraṃ mātā samprati sāmburāśiraśanā jāyā kulodbhūtaye /
GK16andhvc1u:4745: pūrṇe varṣaśate bhaviṣyati punaḥ saivānavadyā snuṣā yuktaṃ nāma samagranītividuṣāṃ kiṃ bhūpatīnāṃ kule //
GK16andhvc1u:4747: kā cānena stutiḥ kṛtā? tvaṃ vaṃśakrameṇa rājeti hi kiyadidam? ityevaṃprāyā vyājastutiḥ sahṛdagoṣṭhīṣu ninditetyupekṣyaiva /
GK16andhvc1u:4752: yasya cittavṛttiviśeṣasya sambandhī vāgvyāpārādirvikāro 'pratibandho niyataḥ bālapriyā punariti /
GK16andhvc1u:4755: aprastutavarṇanasthale yatra vācyasya aprastutārthasya camatkārakāritvaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ, prastutaṃ tu tadaṅgaṃ tatraivāprastutapraśaṃsālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4756: yatra tu prastutasya vyaṅgyasya prādhānyaṃ tatra vastudhvanireva nālaṅkāra iti granthakārāśaya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4767: 'yasya vikārastu apratibandhaḥ prabhavan yena hetunā tamabhiprāyaṃ tatpratibandhaṃ ca gamayati asau bhāva ityanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4775: na dhvaniryatra vā tasya prādhānyaṃ na pratīyate //
GK16andhvc1u:4776: locanam prabhavaṃstaṃ cittavṛttiviśeṣarūpamabhiprāyaṃ yena hetunā gamayati sa heturyatheṣṭopabhogyatvādilakṣaṇo 'rtho bhāvālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4777: yathā--- ekākinī yadabalā taruṇī tathāhamasmingṛhe gṛhapatiśca gato videśam /
GK16andhvc1u:4778: kaṃ yācase tadiha vāsamiyaṃ varākī śvaśrūrmamāndhabadhirā nanu mūḍha pāntha //
GK16andhvc1u:4779: atra vyaṅgyamekaikatra padārthe upaskārakārīti vācyaṃ pradhānam /
GK16andhvc1u:4780: vyaṅgyaprādhānye tu na kācidalaṅkārateti nirūpitamityalaṃ bahunā /
GK16andhvc1u:4791: 'yena pratibaddhena' iti pāṭhe tu pratibaddhenetyasyokta evārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4793: kasyaciccittavṛttiviśeṣasya anubhāvo vyāpārādirvyaṅgyahetudvārā taccittavṛttiviśeṣasya gamakaḥ sa heturityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4795: ahaṃ tvayā yatheṣṭamupabhoktavyā na kiñcitpratibandhakamiti nāyikāmanogatādirarthaṃ ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4800: nanvasti khalu tava śvaśrūstāṃ yāca ityatrāha-iyamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4808: aprādhānye heturvācyamātrānuyāyitvaṃ, tatra heturvācyārthopaskārakatvaṃ, taccālaṅkṛtipadena darśitamityāha--alaṅkṛtitvādeveti /
GK16andhvc1u:4813: 'na pratīyata' tatparāveva śabdārthau yatra vyaṅgyaṃ prīta sthitau /
GK16andhvc1u:4814: dhvaneḥ sa eva viṣayo mantavyaḥ saṅkarojjhitaḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:4816: itaśca nāntarbhāvaḥ; yataḥ kāvyaviśeṣo 'ṅgī dhvaniriti kathitaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4819: locanam prādhānyaṃ na cakāsti, api tu balātkalpyate, tathāpi hṛdaye nānupraviśati /
GK16andhvc1u:4821: tena caturṣu prakāreṣu na dhvanivyavahāraḥ sadbhāve 'pi vyaṅgyasya aprādhānye mliṣṭapratītau vācyena samaprādhānye 'sphuṭe prādhānye ca /
GK16andhvc1u:4824: saṅkārālaṅkāreṇeti tvasat, anyālaṅkāropalakṣaṇatve hi kliṣṭaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:4830: atha pṛthagbhūtastathā mā bhūt, samudāyamadhyanipatitastarhyastu tathetyāśaṅkyāha--apṛthagbhāve tviti /
GK16andhvc1u:4831: tadāpi na sa bālapriyā ityasya vyakhyānam--sphuṭatayā na cakāstīti /
GK16andhvc1u:4847: vṛttāvitaścetyatra itaḥ vakṣyamāṇaddhetorityarthaṃ manasikṛtya vyācaṣṭe---na kevalamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4852: nanvavayavātiriktāvayavino 'nupalambhānna cāvayava evāvayavīti tanniṣedho 'nupapanna iti śaṅkāmavayava ityekavacanārthasya vivakṣitatvaṃ darśayan pariharati---ekaika iti /
GK16andhvc1u:4863: yatrāpi vā tattvaṃ tatrāpi dhvanermahāviṣayatvānna tanniṣṭhatvameva /
GK16andhvc1u:4864: 'sūribhiḥ kathita' iti vidvadupajñeyamuktiḥ, na tu yathākathañcitpravṛtteti pratipādyate /
GK16andhvc1u:4866: locanam eka eva samudāyaḥ, anyeṣāmapi samudāyināṃ tatra bhāvāt; tatsamudāyimadhye ca pratīyamānamapyasti, na ca tadalaṅkārarūpaṃ, pradhānatvādeva /
GK16andhvc1u:4869: nanvalaṅkāra eva kaścittvayā pradhānatābhiṣekaṃ dattvā dhvanirityātmeti cokta ityāśaṅkyāha---yatrāpi veti /
GK16andhvc1u:4870_0: na hi samāsoktyādīnāmanyatama evāsau tathāsmābhiḥ kṛtaḥ, tadviviktatve 'pi tasya bhāvāt samāsoktyādyalaṅkārasvarūpasya samastasyābhāve
GK16andhvc1u:4870_1: 'pi tasya darśitatvāt 'attā ettha' iti 'kassa vā ṇa' ityādi; tadāha-na tanniṣṭatvameveti /
GK16andhvc1u:4872: vidvadbhya upajñā prathama upakramo yatyā ukteriti bahuvrīhiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4879: eka eva na samudāyaḥ na samudāyarūpāvayavī /
GK16andhvc1u:4887: 'yatra' paryāyoktādau 'bhrama dhārmike'tyādau paryāyoktatvapakṣe, 'bhavati na guṇānurāga' ityādisaṅkarālaṅkāre ca /
GK16andhvc1u:4892: dhvanermahāviṣayatvānna tanniṣṭhatvameveti yaduktaṃ tadvivṛṇoti locane---na hītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4904: te ca śrūyamāṇeṣu varṇeṣu dhvaniriti vyavaharanti /
GK16andhvc1u:4907: śrotraśaṣkulīṃ santānenāgatā antyāḥ śabdāḥ śrūyanta iti prakriyāyāṃ śabdajāḥ śabdāḥ śrūyamāṇā ityuktam /
GK16andhvc1u:4908: teṣāṃ ghaṇṭānuraṇanarūpatvaṃ tāvadasti; te ca dhvaniśabdenoktāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4909: yathāha bhagavān bhartṛhariḥ--- yaḥ saṃyogaviyogābhyāṃ karaṇairupajanyate /
GK16andhvc1u:4913: tathā śrūyamāṇā ye varṇā nādaśabdavācyā antyabuddhinirgrāhyasphoṭābhivyañjakāste dhvaniśabdenoktāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4915_0: bālapriyā atha vyaṅgyārthāśabdatadarthavyañjanānāṃ caturṇāṃ dhvaniśabdavācyatvaṃ vidvatprasiddhivaśātsādhayiṣyannādau vyaṅgyārthasya
GK16andhvc1u:4928: saṃyogaviyogābhyāṃ karaṇānāṃ sthānaissaha yassaṃyogo viyogaśca tābhyām /
GK16andhvc1u:4932: saḥ sphoṭa iti prathamamutpadyamānaḥ śabdaḥ sphoṭa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4937: yathoktaṃ vṛttikṛtā-'anityapakṣe sthānakaraṇaprāptivibhāgapūrvakaṃ prathamamebhirnirvṛtto yaśśabdaḥ sa sphoṭa ucyata' ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4939: ghaṇṭādernirhnādaḥ anuraṇanaṃ tatsthānīyastattulya iti vyaṅgyasya thadhvanipadena vyavahāryatve hetuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4940: nanvevaṃvyaṅgyaviśeṣasyaiva dhvanivyavahāryatvaṃ bhavenna tu rasādestasyānuraṇanarūpatvavirahādityata āha--anuraṇaneti /
GK16andhvc1u:4942: atha vācakasya śabdasya vācyasyārthasya ca dhvanivyavahāryatvaṃ prasādhasati---tathetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4945: antyeti pūrvapūrvavarṇānubhavajanitasaṃskārasahakṛtā yā antyavarṇabuddhiḥ tayā nirgrāhyaḥ nitarāṃ vyaktarūpema grāhyo yaḥ sphoṭaḥ tasyābhivyañjakā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4956: yadi vā naiva gṛhṇāti varṇaṃ vā sakalaṃ sphuṭam  //
GK16andhvc1u:4958: teṣu tāvatsveva śrūyamāṇeṣu vakturyo 'nyo drutāvilambitādivṛttibhedātmā prasiddāduccāraṇavyāpārādabhyadhikaḥ sa dhvaniruktaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4959: yadāha sa eva--- śabdasyordhvamabhivyaktervṛttibhede tu vaikṛtāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4964: tadyogācca samastamapi kāvyaṃ bālapriyā dhvaniprakāśite śabde viṣaye utpannaiḥ antarālavartibhiḥ pratyayai sphoṭaviṣayakāvyaktapratyayaiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4966: yathoktaṃ bhāṣye 'vyaktarūpagrahamānuguṇā hyanupākhyeyākārā bahava upāyabhūtāḥ pratyayā dhvanibhiḥ prakāśyamāne śabde utpadyamānāśśabdasvarūpāvagrahe hetavo bhavanti' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:4973: varṇeṣu svarūpataḥ parimāṇaviśeṣavattayā sthiteṣu teṣu tathāvidheṣvevākhaṇḍatayā śrotrendriyaviṣayatāṃ gateṣu ca satsu ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4978: yadi vā, sakalaṃ varṇaṃ sphuṭaṃ gṛhṇāti vā; na tu kiñjitgrahaṇāgrahaṇe sambhavato varṇasya niravayavatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4983: śloko 'yaṃ mañjūṣāyāmitthaṃ vyākhyātaḥ-- śabdasya sphoṭasya abhivyakterūrdhvaṃ vaikṛtā dhvanayo jāyante iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4995: na caivaṃvidhasya dhvanervakṣyamāṇaprabhedatadbhedasaṅkalanayā mahāviṣayasya yatprakāśanaṃ tadaprasiddhālaṅkāraviśeṣamātrapratipādanena locanam dhvaniḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4996: tena vyatirekāvyatirekavyapadeśo 'pi na na yuktaḥ vācyavācakasaṃmiśra iti /
GK16andhvc1u:4999: tena vācyo 'pi dhvaniḥ vācako 'pi śabdo dhvaniḥ, dvayorapi vyañjakatvaṃ dhvanatīti kṛtvā /
GK16andhvc1u:5000: saṃmiśpyate vibhāvānubhāvasaṃvalanayeti vyaṅgyo 'pi dhvaniḥ, dhvanyata iti kṛtvā /
GK16andhvc1u:5001: śabdanaṃ śabdaḥ śabdavyāpāraḥ, na cāsāvabhidhādirūpaḥ, api tvātmabhūtaḥ, so 'pi dhvananaṃ dhvaniḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5002: kāvyamiti vyapadeśyaśca yo 'rthaḥ so 'pi dhvaniḥ, uktaprakāradvanicatuṣṭayamayatvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:5004: vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvaḥ sarvoṣu pakṣeṣu sāmānyarūpaḥ sādhāraṇa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5007: tadbhedā yathā-arthāntarasaṃkramitavācyaḥ, atyantatiraskṛtavācya ityavivakṣitavācyasya, asaṃlakṣyakramavyaṅgyaḥ saṃlakṣyakramavyaṅgya iti vivakṣitānyaparavācyasyeti /
GK16andhvc1u:5015: vyaṅgyādīnāṃ pañcānāṃ yaddhvanivyavahāryatvamukt, tadanuguṇatayā vācyatyādigrantaṃ vyācaṣṭe---vācyavācaketyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5019: tathā ca śabdātmā kāvyamiti vyapadeśyaścetyartha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5031: asminnarthe dhvaniriti bhāve pratyaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5033: yasmādbhaktānāṃ pañjānāmarthānāṃ dhvanitvamatra granthe 'bhidhitsitaṃ, tasmādeva sādhāraṇasya hetorabhidhānādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5041: tatra dhvanisvarūpe bhāvitaṃ praṇihitaṃ ceto yeṣāṃ tena vā camatkakārarūpeṇa bhāvitamadhivāsitamata eva mukulitalocanatvādivikārakāraṇaṃ ceto yeṣāmiti /
GK16andhvc1u:5045_0: udāharaṇapṛṣṭe bhāktatvaṃ suśaṅkaṃ supariharaṃ ca bhavatītyabhiprāyeṇodāharaṇadānāvakāśārthaṃ bhāktatvālakṣaṇīyatve prathamaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:5045_1: pariharaṇayogye 'pyapratisamādhāya bhaviṣyaduddyotānuvādānusāreṇa vṛttikṛdeva prabhedanirūpaṇaṃ karoti---sa ceti /
GK16andhvc1u:5046: pañcadhāpi dhvaniśabdārthe yena yatra yato yasya yasmai iti bahuvrīhyarthāśrayeṇa yathocitaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ suyojyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5047: vācye 'rthe tu dhvanau vācyaśabdena svātmā tenāvivakṣito 'pradhānīkṛtaḥ svātmā yenetyavivaśritavācyo vyañjako 'rthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5049: bālapriyā sāmānyarūpo vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvaḥ sādhāraṇassamāna iti yojanā /
GK16andhvc1u:5056: nanu kramaprāptaṃ bhāktatvādipakṣamapratisamādhāya vṛttikṛtā 'sa ce'tyādinā dhvanibhedapradarśanamanucitamityata āha---udāharaṇapṛṣṭa ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5057_0: avivakṣitavācyādidhvanerudāharaṇe pradarśite tatra lakṣaṇāyāssamunmeṣādbhaktireva dhvaniriti śaṅkā susaṃpādā, parasparabhedasaṃpādakasya
GK16andhvc1u:5059: atrānuktavavivakṣitavācyo va iti dvitīyodyotādāvanuvādo 'nupapannaḥ syādataḥ svayameva kārikākārasthāne sthitvetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5060: nanu pañjānāṃ dhvaniśabdārthānāṃ madhye kamarthamabhipretyāvivakṣitavācyo dhvanirityādisāmānādhikaraṇyanirdeśa ityata āha--pañcadhāpītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5062: tatra vācakaḥ śabdo dhvanipadārtha iti pakṣe āvivakṣitaḥ vācyo yena śabdena /
GK16andhvc1u:5066: yasya yatsambandhitvena sa tathokta iti bahuvrīhirbodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5068: vāyyo dhvaniśabdārtha iti pakṣe viśeṣamāha---vācye 'rtha iti /
GK16andhvc1u:5073: locana.m yadi vā karmadhārayeṇārthapakṣe avivakṣitaścāsau vācyaśceti /
GK16andhvc1u:5076: kadācidupapadyamāna iti kṛtvā vivakṣita eva, vyaṅgyaparyantāṃ tu pratītiṃ svasaubhāgyamahimnā karoti /
GK16andhvc1u:5077: ata evārtho 'tra prādhānyena vyañjakaḥ, pūrvatra śabdaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5078: nanu ca vivakṣā cānyaparatvaṃ ceti viruddham /
GK16andhvc1u:5080: vastvalaṅkārarasātmanā hi tribhedo 'pi dhvanirubhābhyāmevābhyāṃ saṅgṛhīta iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5081: nanu tannāmapṛṣṭe etannāmaniveśanasya kiṃ phalam? ucyate--
GK16andhvc1u:5082_0: anena hi nāmadvayena dhvananātmani vyāpāre pūrvaprasiddhābhidhātātparyalakṣaṇātmakavyāpāratritayāvagatārthapratīteḥ pratipattṛgatāyāḥ
GK16andhvc1u:5082_1: prayoktrabhiprāyarūpāyāśca vivikṣāyā) sahakāritvamuktamiti dhvanisvarūpameva nāmabhyāmeva projjīvitam /
GK16andhvc1u:5084: suvarṇāni puṣpyatīti suvarṇapuṣpā, etacca vākyamevāsambhavatsvārthamiti kṛtvāvivakṣitavācyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5102: asti dhvaniḥ sa cetyādiśca nirdeśaḥ kimartha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5105: tatra ca vyāpāre dvitīyasyāpi--- śikhariṇi kva nu nāma kiyacciraṃ kimabhidhānamasāvakarottapaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5106: taruṇi yena tavādharapāṭalaṃ daśati bimbaphalaṃ śukaśāvakaḥ //

GK16andhvc1u:5564: duṣṭatvaṃ hi vyākaraṇasaṃskārarāhityādirūpamiti śaṅkāyāṃ pratipipādayiṣitārthapratītyajanakatvena vaiyarthyam; tadatra vavikṣitamityāha---prayojanetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5575: atha prayojane dhvananavyāpāraṃ vyavasthāpayiṣyan uktamevārthaṃ śaṅkāparihārābhyā pradarśayannāha---upacāreṇetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5582: tasmin prayojane 'pi upacāre pūrvavadaṅgīkārye tatrāpyanyadevaṃ tatrāpyanyadityanavasthā mūlakṣayakāriṇī syādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5583: ataḥ skhaladgatitvābhyupagamo na yukta iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5584: nanu mā bhūtskhalidagatitvaṃ, tathāpi lakṣaṇāyā abhāvaḥ kuta ityata āha---athetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5589: tena yataḥ skhaladgateśśabdasya vyāpāro lakṣaṇā, tato hetoḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5593: vyañjakatvaika-mūlasya dhvaneḥ syāl lakṣaṇaṃ katham // DhvK_1.18 //
GK16andhvc1u:5599: na ca prayoge duṣṭatā kācit prayojanasyābidhnenaiva pratīteḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5600: tenābhidhaiva mukhye 'rthe bādhakena pravivitsurnirudhyamānā satī acaritārthatvādanyatra prasarati /
GK16andhvc1u:5604: yato 'bhidhāpucchabhūtaiva lakṣaṇā, tato hetorvācakatvamabhidhāvyāpāramāśritā tadbādhanenotthānāttatpucchabhūtatvāccha guṇavṛttiḥ gauṇalākṣaṇikakāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5605: sā kathaṃ dhvanervyañjanātmano lakṣaṇaṃ syāt? bhinnaviṣayatvāditi /
GK16andhvc1u:5608: evam 'ativyāpteratāvyāpterna cāsau lakṣyate tayā' iti kārikāgatātivyāptiṃ vyākhyāyāvyāptiṃ vyācaṣṭe---avyāptirapyasyeti /
GK16andhvc1u:5618: bādhakenetyanantaraṃ vidhurīkṛteti ca kvacit granthe pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5621: yathā pravāhādikamuddiśya gaṅgādiśabdasyāyaṃ mukhyārtha iti vyavahāraḥ, tathā tīrādikamuddiśyāyamamukhyārtha iti ca vyavahāro 'stītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5622: tathā ca dvayorarthatvaṃ tulyaṃ mukhyatvāmukhyatvakṛta eva bheda iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5626: na he śabdasya yaḥ kaścidevāṃmukhyo 'rthaḥ kintvayamartho 'sya śabdasyāmukhya iti niyata evetyatastathāvidhopadeśarūpasya /
GK16andhvc1u:5627: ayamartho 'smācchabdādboddhavya iti icchārūpasya vā saṅketasya grahamamapītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5631: tasmādityasiya kīrukayī sambandhaṃ darsayaṃstatpadaṃ vyācaṣṭe---yata ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5635: anye ca bahavaḥ prakārā bhaktyā vyāpyante; tasmādbhaktiralakṣaṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:5636: locanam yatra yatra dhvanistatra tatra yadi bhaktirbhavenna syādavyāptiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5640: kevalaṃ śabdastamarthaṃ lakṣayitvā tenaiva saha sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ bhajate-'siṃho baṭuḥ' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:5641: artho vārthāntaraṃ lakṣayitvā svavācakena tadvācakaṃ samānādhikaraṇaṃ karoti /
GK16andhvc1u:5642: śabdārthau vā yugapattaṃ lakṣayitvā anyābhyāmeva śabdārthābhyāṃ miśrībhavata ityevaṃ lākṣaṇikādgauṇasya bhedaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5643: yadāha-'gauṇe śabdaprayogaḥ, na lakṣaṇāyāma' iti, tatrāpi lakṣaṇāstyeveti sarvatra saiva vyāpikā /
GK16andhvc1u:5651_0: atha gauṇasthale 'pi lakṣaṇāyāḥ prasaradvivakṣitānyaparavācyodāharaṇatvena pradarśite 'śikhariṇī'tyādau sā pravartata eveti
GK16andhvc1u:5651_1: tatra tadabhāvābhidhānamasaṅgatamiti pūrvapakṣamabhyupetya tadanurodhenāpi vivakṣitānyaparavācyetyādigranthaṃ vyākhyāsyan
GK16andhvc1u:5655: nanvevaṃ gauṇasya lākṣaṇikādbhedaḥ kuta ityata āha--'kevalam' ityādinā 'bheda' ityantena /
GK16andhvc1u:5679_0: tadyathā--abhidheyena saṃyogāt; dvirephaśabdasya hi yo 'bhidheyo bhramaraśabdaḥ dvau rekau yasyeti kṛtvā tena bhramaraśabdena
GK16andhvc1u:5679_1: yasya saṃyogaḥ sambandhaḥ ṣaṭpadalakṣaṇasyārthasya so 'rtho dvirephaśabdena lakṣyate, abhidheyasambandhaṃ vyākhyātarūpaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:5682: vaiparītyāt yathā--śatrumuddiśya kaścidbravīti--'kimivopakṛtaṃ na tena mama' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:5697: atra saṃyogapadena vācyavācakabhāvarūpassambandhaḥ, samavāyapadena taditara ādhārādheyabhāvarūpassārūpyādiśca vivakṣitaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5718: nanvatrāṅgīkṛtaiva madhye lakṣaṇā, kathaṃ tarhyuktaṃ vivakṣitānyapareti? tadbhedo 'tra mukhyo 'saṃlakṣyakramātmā vivakṣitaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5719: tadbhedaśabdena ca rasabhāvatadābhāsatatpraśamabhedāstadavāntarabhedāśca, na ca teṣu lakṣaṇāyā upapattiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5720_0: tathāhi-vibhāvānubhāvapratipādeke kāvye mukhye 'rthe tāvadbādhakānu praveśo 'pyasambhāvya iti ko lakṣaṇāvakāśaḥ? nanu kiṃ
GK16andhvc1u:5721_0: iha cābhidheyānāṃ vibhāvānubhāvādīnāmavinābhūtā rasādaya iti lakṣyante, vibhāvānubhāvayoḥ kāraṇakāryarūpatvāt, vyabhicāriṇāṃ
GK16andhvc1u:5721_1: ca tatsahakāritvāditi cet---maivam; dhūmaśabdāddhūme pratapanne hyagrismṛtirapi lakṣaṇākṛtaiva syāt, tato 'gneḥ śītāpanodasmṛtirityādiraparyavasitaḥ
GK16andhvc1u:5722: dhūmaśabdasya svārthaviśrāntatvānna tāvati vyāpāra iti cet, āyātaṃ tarhi mukhyārthabādho lakṣaṇāyā jīvitamiti, sati tasminsvāthaviśrāntyabhāvat /
GK16andhvc1u:5730: vṛttau vivakṣitānyaparavācyaśabdena tadavāntarabhedo mukhyo 'saṃlakṣyakramo vivakṣita ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5735: atrāpi lakṣaṇā kinna syādata āha--na ceti /
GK16andhvc1u:5740: asti vā nāsti veti cintitayā mukhyārthabādhayā kiṃ phalamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5744: abhidheyenāvinābhūtasya kenāpi sambandhena sambaddhasya pratītirjñānaṃ taddheturvā /
GK16andhvc1u:5765: locanam nanvevaṃ dhūmāvagamanānantarāgnismaramavadvibhāvādipratipatyanantaraṃ ratyādicittavṛttipratipattarit śabdavyāpāra evātra nāsti /
GK16andhvc1u:5766_0: idaṃ tāvadayaṃ pratītisvarūpajño mīmāṃsakaḥ praṣṭavyaḥ--kimatra paracittavṛttimātre pratipattireva rasapratipattirabhimatā
GK16andhvc1u:5766_1: bhavataḥ? na caivaṃ bhramitavyam; evaṃ hi lokagatacittavṛttyanumānamātramiti kā rasatā? yastvalaukikacamatkārātmā rasāsvādaḥ
GK16andhvc1u:5767_0: kiṃ tu laukikena kāryakāraṇānumānādinā saṃskṛtahṛdayo vibhāvādikaṃ pratipadyamāna eva na tāṭasthyena pratipadyate, api tu
GK16andhvc1u:5773: 'gaṅgāyāṃ dhoṣa' ityatra gaṅgāśabdo netyatra mukhyārthabādha eva heturatasya eva lakṣaṇābījamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5774: tarhihāpi mukhyārthabādho lakṣaṇā ca syat netyāha - na ceti /
GK16andhvc1u:5776: vibhāvādipratītyanantarabhāvinī ratyādipratītirdhūmādipratītijanyāgnyādismṛtisamānaiveti sā śabdavyāpārajanyā na bhavati dūre tasyā vyañjanājanyatvamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5778_0: kimatra parakīyaratyādicittavṛttipratīteḥśabdavyāpārājanyatvaṃ siṣādhayiṣitaṃ? kiṃvā rasapratīteḥ? ādye siddhasādhanam; dvitīye
GK16andhvc1u:5778_1: rasapratīteritarapratītivailakṣṇyena dṛṣṭāntābhāvo doṣa ityāśayena sopahāsaṃ pṛcchannāha--idamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5799: kāraṇaṃ vahnyādi, ratyādi cakāryeṇa yat kāraṇasyānumānaṃ, ādipadenārthāpattessaṅgrahaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5800: tene saṃskṛtahṛdaya ityanena tatsaṃskāro 'pi pratipattuḥ rasapratītāvupayogīti darśitam /
GK16andhvc1u:5811: na cāsau carvaṇā pramāṇāntarato jātā pūrvaṃ, yenedānīṃ smṛtiḥ syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:5814: yadāha--'vibhāvo vijñānārthaḥ loke kāraṇamevābhidhīyate na vibhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5819: ata eva parakīyā na cittavṛttirgamyata ityabhiprāyeṇa 'vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogādrasaniṣpattiḥ' iti sūtre sthāyigrahaṇaṃ na kṛtam /
GK16andhvc1u:5821: sthāyinastu rasībhāva aucityāducyate, tadvi bālapriyā hṛdayasya saṃvādaḥ sammatiḥ, tadaparaparyāyaṃ yatsahṛdayatvaṃ tatparavaśīkṛtatayā tadbalādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5827: sahṛdayānāṃ yattattaccittavṛttitanmayībhavanaṃ tasyocitā yā carvaṇā arthādvibhāvādeḥ tatprāṇatayā tadupayogitvenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5837: viśiṣṭatayā bhāvyante jñāyante sthāyivyabhicāriṇo 'neneti vibhāvaḥ pramadodyānādiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5840: cittavṛttihetuṣu loke kāramamityeva vyavahāro na tu vibhāva itītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5848_0: na parakīyacittavṛtyavagamamātramihānubhavanaṃ, kintu tāsāṃ cittavṛttīnāṃ sthāyyādirūpāṇāṃ sambandhi yatsāmājikānāṃ tanmayībhavanaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:5850: ata eva yasmādanubhavanamuktarūpameva na parakīyacittavṛtyanumitimātraṃ tasmāddhetorevetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5856: vyabhicārī tu cittavṛttyātmatve 'pi mukhyacittavṛttiparavaśa eva carvyata iti vibhāvānubhāvamadhye gaṇitaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5857: ata eva rasyamānatāyā eṣaiva niṣpattiḥ, yatprabandhapravṛttabandhusamāgamādikāraṇoditaharṣādilaukikacittavṛttinyagbhāvena carvaṇārūpatvam /
GK16andhvc1u:5860: bālapriyā iti ṣaṣṭhyantasthāyigrahame kartavye 'pyanubhāvagrahaṇenaiva sthāyipratītirbhavatīti tanna kṛtamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5861: yadyatra sthāyigrahaṇaṃ kriyeta, tarhi tadvirūddhañja syādityāha---tadityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5865: nanvevaṃ 'sthāyī raso bhavatī'tyādi tatra tatra sūtrakārādivacanaṃ kathaṃ ghaṭetetyata āha--sthāyinastviti /
GK16andhvc1u:5868: tasya paragatasthāyinaḥ sambandhino ye vibhāvānubhāvāḥ taducitāyāścittavṛttessahṛdayātmani yassaṃskārastasyodbodhena sundaracarvaṇāyā udayādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5869: uktañca kāvyānuśāsanavyākhyāne 'aucityantu tatsthāyigatatvena kāraṇāditayā prasiddhānāmadhunā carvaṇopayogitayā vibhāvāditvālambanādi'ti /
GK16andhvc1u:5871: rasacarvaṇā hi hṛdayasaṃvādapurassarī hṛdayasaṃvāde ca nidānaṃ, lokacittavṛttiparijñānaṃ tadvirahitasya hṛdayasaṃvādānudayāt /
GK16andhvc1u:5872: tasyāñcāvasthāyāṃ pramadādibhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ pulakādibhiḥ kāryaiśca bhūyo bhūyo 'vadhṛtasvakāraṇavyāptikaiḥ sthāyino ratyāderavagamo bhavati, tasmāccetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5873: nanu cittavṛttitvāviśeṣātsyāyīva vyabhicāryapi sūtre grahaṇaṃ nārhatītyata āha---vyabhicārītviti /
GK16andhvc1u:5874: vyabhicāriṇaḥ sthāyicittavṛttiṃ prati guṇatvena vibhāvādiprāyatvāttanmadhye sa nirdiṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5879_0: yathoktamabhinavabhāratyāṃ 'kathantarhi sūtre niṣpattiriti neyaṃ rasasyāpi tu tadviṣayarasānāyāḥ tanniṣpattyā yadi tadekāyattajīvitasya
GK16andhvc1u:5879_1: rasasya niṣpattirucyate, tadā na kiñcidatra doṣa' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:5882: prabandhena pravṛttaṃ yadbandhusamāgamādikāraṇaṃ tenoditā yā harṣādilaukikacittavṛttiḥ tasyā nyagbhāvena adhaḥkaraṇena tadvyatirekeṇeti yāvat /
GK16andhvc1u:5887_0: yathā pramāṇānāmindriyādīnāṃ jñāpanaṃ vyāpāraḥ, yathā vā daṇḍavakrādīnāmutpādanaṃ vyāpārastathā locanam nanu yadi neyaṃ jñaptirna
GK16andhvc1u:5887_1: vā niṣpattiḥ, tarhi kimetat? na tvayamasāvalaukiko rasaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5888: nanu vibhāvādiratra kiṃ jñāpako hetuḥ, uta kārakaḥ? na jñāpako na kārakaḥ; api tu carvaṇopayogī /
GK16andhvc1u:5890: yata eva na dṛṣṭaṃ tata evālaukikamityuktam /
GK16andhvc1u:5891: nanvevaṃ raso 'pramāṇaṃ syāt; astu, kiṃ tataḥ? taccarvaṇāta eva prītivyutpattisiddheḥ kimanyadarśanīyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5895: yena lalitaparuṣānuprāsasyārthābhidhānānupayogino 'pi rasaṃ prati vyañjakatvam; kā tatra lakṣaṇāyāḥ śaṅkāpi? kāvyātmakaśabdaniṣpīḍanenaiva taccarvaṇā dṛśyate /
GK16andhvc1u:5896: hi tadeva kāvyaṃ punaḥ punaḥ bālapriyā vibhāvādīnāṃ na jñāpanaṃ na vā utpādanaṃ vyāpāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5898: pūrvoktena iyaṃ rasacarvaṇā na jñaptirūpā, nāpi niṣpattirūpetyāyātaṃ, tarhi kiṃsvarūpetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5903: nanu jñāpakatvasya kārakatvasya vā abhāve vibhāvādīnāṃ rasapratītyarthamupādānaṃ vyarthaṃ, tadbhāve ca rasasya nālaukikatvamiti codayati---nanvityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5904: hetoḥ kārakatvajñāpakatvānyataraniyamo hi laukikaḥ, vibhāvādestu tadabhāve 'pi carvaṇopayogitvānnānarthakayamityāśayena pariharati---na jñāpaka ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5914: prītiśca vyutpattiśca tayoḥ, yadvā--prītipūrvikā vyutpattiḥ tasyāḥ siddherityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5915: nanvevamalaukikatve rasasya tatsādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ nāstīti śaṅkate---nanviti /
GK16andhvc1u:5918: yathoktamabhinavabhāratyāṃ---'rasanāca bodharūpaiva, kintu bodhāntarebhyo vilakṣaṇaiva, upāyānāṃ vibhāvādīnāṃ laukikavailakṣaṇyādi'ti /
GK16andhvc1u:5920: vācakaśabdaikagamyatve hi rasasya vācyārthavallaukikatvaṃ kathañcicchakyaśaṅkamanuprāsādināpi vācakatvaśūnyena vyaṅgyatvamastyeva /
GK16andhvc1u:5921: na cānuprāsavyaṅgyaṃ vastu loke dṛṣṭacaramato 'pi rasasyālaukikatvaṃ siddhamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5926: abhidhāyā evābhāve tatpṛṣṭhavartinyā lakṣaṇāyāḥ prasaṅga eva nāstītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5928_0: kāvyātmako 'nuprasādiviśiṣṭo yaḥ locanam paṭhaṃścarvyamāṇaśca sahṛdayo lokaḥ, na tu kāvyasya; tatra 'upādāyāpi ye heyā' iti
GK16andhvc1u:5938: yadeva kāvyaṃ paṭhitañcarvitañca tadeva punaḥ punaḥ paṭyate carvyate cetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5947: so 'yaṃ nyāyo 'tra na pravartata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5951: yadyarthaṃpratītivyavadhānāpekṣayaiva śabdasya vyañjakatvaṃ bhavettadāvaśyaṃ kramo lakṣyeteti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5957: tattadarthe tattatpadasya yassamayaḥ saṅketaḥ tadbalena tattatsaṅketagrahaṇasahakāreṇetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5969: asyodāharaṇam---'śveto dhāvati, sarvado mādhavaḥ pāyā'dityādikaṃ bodhyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5972: vākyārtha ekaḥ syāt vākyārthe bhedo nāṅgīkriyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5976: viramya yo vyāpāraḥ śabdasya tadayogo yataḥ, tasmādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5981: locanam niyamābhāva iti tena 'agrihotraṃ juhuyātsvargakāmaḥ' iti śrutau khādecchvāmāṃsamityeṣa nārtha ityatra kā prameti prasajyate /
GK16andhvc1u:5982: tatrāpi na kācidiyattetyanāśvāsatā ityevaṃ vākyabhedo dūṣaṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:5983: iha tu vibhāvādyeva pratipādyamānaṃ carvaṇāviṣayatonmukhamiti samayādyupayogābhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5984: na ca niyukto 'hamatra karavāṇi, kṛtārtho 'hamiti śāstrīyapratītisaddaśamadaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5986: iha tu vibhāvādicarvaṇādbhutapuṣpavattatkālasāraivoditā na tu pūrvāparakālānubandhinīti laukikādāsvādādyogiviṣayāccānya evāyaṃ rasāsvādaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5987: ata eva 'śikhariṇa' ityādāvapi bālapriyā samayādiriti pāṭhe sa eva yena pūrvamartho buddhaḥ sa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6006: kāvyavyatariktaṃ laukikaṃ vaidikaṃ ca vākyaṃ samayaprakaraṇādisahakṛtaṃ yugapatkrameṇa vā ekamarthameva pratipādayatītyato 'nekārthabodhakatvena vākyabhedo naiva bhavati /
GK16andhvc1u:6007: samayaprakaraṇādyapekṣāṃ vinā vākyasyārthabodhakatvāṅgīkāre cāvyavasthitārthakatvenābodhakatvarūpāprāmāṇyaṃ syādityevaṃ vākyabhedo doṣa iti sārārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6017: kāvye vibhāvādyarthabodhe eva samayaprakaraṇāderupayogaḥ, vibhāvādibodhānantaraṃ ca vibhāvādereva niyāmakānniyatarasādivyaṅgyapratītiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6018: ataśca tāṃ prati samayāderanapekṣaṇe 'pi nāvyavasthitārthakatvena doṣa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6020: bodhāvasthāyāmatra karmaṇi niyukto 'hamiti, anuṣṭhānadaśāyāṃ karavāṇīti, taduttarakāle tu kṛtārtho 'smīti ca pratītiḥ śāstrato jāyate /
GK16andhvc1u:6030: tatkālaḥ vartamānakāla eva sāro yasyāḥ saiva /
GK16andhvc1u:6034: yato rasāsvādasya kasyaciddhvanibhedasya sā tu syādupalakṣaṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:6035_0: sā punarbhaktirvakṣyamāṇaprabhedamadhyādanyatamasya bhedasya yadi nāmopalakṣaṇatayā locanam mukhyārthabādhādikramamanapekṣyaiva
GK16andhvc1u:6036: ata eva grandhakāraḥ sāmānyena vivakṣitānyaparavācye dhvanau bhakterabhāvamabhyadhāt /
GK16andhvc1u:6037: asmābhistu durdurūṭaṃ pratyāyayitumuktam--bhavatvatra lakṣaṇā, alakṣyakrame tu kupito 'pi kiṃ kariṣyasīti /
GK16andhvc1u:6038: yadi tu na kupyate 'suvarṇapuṣpāṃ' ityādāvavivakṣitavācye 'pi mukhyārthabādhādilakṣaṇāsāmagrīmanapekṣyaiva vyaṅgyārthaviśrāntirityalaṃ bahunā /
GK16andhvc1u:6040: nanu mā bhūddhvaniriti bhaktiriti caikaṃ rūpam /
GK16andhvc1u:6042: upalakṣaṇaṃ tu bhaviṣyati; yatra dhvanirbhavati, tatra bhaktirapyastīti bhaktyupalakṣito dhvaniḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6043: na tāvadetatsarvatrāsti, iyatā ca kiṃ parasya siddhaṃ? kiṃ vā naḥ truṭitaṃ? iti tadāha---kasyacidityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6044: nanu bhaktistāvaccisntanairuktā, tadupalakṣaṇamukhena ca dhvanimapi bālapriyā uktavidhamanitarasādhāraṇaṃ saubhāgyaṃ tata evetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6049: tarhi kuto bhavataiva lakṣaṇāmabhyupetya vyākhyātamityata āha--asmābhistviti /
GK16andhvc1u:6053: nanu kasya nāma kopastattvaṃ kathyatāmityatrāha---yadi tviti /
GK16andhvc1u:6058: yathā kākādirgṛhāderna svarūpaṃ, nāpi lakṣaṇaṃ, kintu kadācitsambhavamātrādvyāvṛttipratipattihetustathā bhaktirapītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6063: upalakṣaṇaṃ vastu sarvatra na bhavatīti sampratipannamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6069: dhvanilakṣaṇakaraṇaṃ niṣphalaṃ lakṣaṇaphalasyetaravyāvṛttatayā dhvanijñānasyopalakṣaṇabhūtayā bhakatyaiva samabhavādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6074_0: abhidhāvṛtte sambhāvyeta; yadi ca guṇavṛttyaiva dhvanirlakṣyata ityucyate tadabhidhāvyāpāreṇa taditaro 'laṅkāravargaḥ samagra
GK16andhvc1u:6076: lakṣaṇe 'nyaiḥ kṛte cāsya pakṣa-saṃsiddhir eva naḥ // DhvK_1.19a //
GK16andhvc1u:6078: kṛte 'pi vā pūrvamevānyairdhvanilakṣaṇe pakṣasaṃsiddhireva naḥ; yasmāddhvanirastīti na pakṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6079: sa ca prāgeva saṃsiddha ityayatnasampannasamīhitārthāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ ramaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6080: ye 'pi sahṛdayahṛdayasaṃvedyamanākhyeyameva dhvanerātmānamāmnāsiṣuste 'pi na parikṣya vādinaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6083: abhidānābhidheyabhāvo hyalaṅkāgaṇāṃ vyāpakaḥ; tataścābhidhāvṛtte vaiyākaraṇamīmāṃsakairnirūpite kutredānīmalaṅkārakāraṇāṃ vyāpāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6084: tathā hetubalātkāryaṃ jāyata iti tārkikairukte kimidānīmiśvaraprabhṛtīnāṃ kartṝṇāṃ jñātṝṇāṃ vā kṛtyamapūrvaṃ syāditi sarvo nirārambhaḥ syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:6086: mā bhūdvāpūrvonmīlanaṃ pūrvonmīlitamevāsmābhiḥ samyaṅnirūpitaṃ, tathāpi ko doṣa ityabhiprāyeṇāha---kiṃ cetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6089: evaṃ triprakāramabhāvavādaṃ, bhaktyantarbhūtatāṃ ca nirākurvatā alakṣaṇīyatvamekatanmadhye nirākṛtameva /
GK16andhvc1u:6090: ata eva mūlakārikā sākṣāttannirākaraṇārthā na śrūyate /
GK16andhvc1u:6091: vṛttikṛttu nirākṛtamapi prameyaśayyāpūraṇāya kaṇṭhena bālapriyā abhidhāvyāpāre /
GK16andhvc1u:6095: abhidhānābhidheyabhāvasya samastālaṅkāravyāpakatvāttasya cābhidhāvayāpārajīvitatvāttannirūpaṇe kṛte satyalaṅkāranirūpaṇaṃ tadgranthakārāṇāṃ niṣphalameva bhavedityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6103: lakṣaṇaṃ ca karaṇaṃ ca lakṣaṇakaraṇe, tayoḥ tannirūpaṇayoḥ vaiyarthyasya prasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6106: nanu kārikākāreṇa itarapakṣa ivālakṣaṇīyatvapakṣaḥ kimiti na pratikṣipta iti śaṅkāṃ pariharan 'ye 'pī'tyādigranthamavatārayati---evamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6108: dhvanipradarśanamukhena hi pakṣāntaranirākaraṇamatra kṛtaṃ; na ca tasyālakṣaṇīyatve tatsambhavati iti tannirākaraṇanāntarīyakatvenālakṣaṇīyatvapakṣo 'pi nirākṛta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6109: nanu tarhi kimiti vṛttikṛtā tatpakṣo 'nūdya nirākṛta ityata āha---vṛttikṛditi /
GK16andhvc1u:6111: prameyasya śayyā sanniveśaviśeṣaḥ yata uktayā nītyā vakṣyamāṇayā ca dhvaneḥ sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇe pratipādite 'pi yadyanākhyeyatvaṃ tatsarveṣāmeva vastūnāṃ tatprasaktam /
GK16andhvc1u:6112: yadi punardhvanerātiśayoktyānayā kāvyāntarātiśāyi taiḥ locanam tatpakṣamanūdya nirākaroti---ye 'pītyādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:6113: uktayā nītyā 'yatrārthaḥ śabdo vā' iti sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ pratipāditam /
GK16andhvc1u:6114: vakṣyamāṇayā tu nītyā viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati 'arthāntare saṅkramitaṃ ityādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:6115: tatra prathamoddyote dhvaneḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇameva kārikākāreṇa kṛtam /
GK16andhvc1u:6116: dvitīyoddyote kārikākāro 'vāntaravibhāgaṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ ca vidadhadanuvādamukhena mūlavibhāgaṃ dvividhaḥ' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:6120: yathā 'tānyakṣarāṇi hṛdaye kimapi sphuranti' itivadatiśayoktyānākhyeyatoktā sārarūpatāṃ pratipādayitumiti darśitamiti śivam // 19 //
GK16andhvc1u:6122: anākhyeyatvapakṣasyāpi svayamanirākaraṇe tatpūraṇaṃ na bhavediti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6123: uktayā nītyetyādau yathāsaṃkhyena sambandha ityāśayenopapādayati---yatrārtha ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6126: vṛttau 'sa ca dvividha' ityādinā viśeṣalakṣaṇakathanaṃ kārikākārāśayānusāreṇetyāha--tatra prathamodyota ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6129: atha yadidaṃ dhvaneranākhyeyatvamuktaṃ tannāsatvānnāpyasādhutvāt, kintvatiśayittvāditi cettarhi tadabhidhānaṃ yuktamevetyāha vṛttau---'yadi punari'tyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6140: atra te 'pītyapiśabdena svasyāpi sarvatra yuktabhidhāyitvaṃ granthakṛtā sūcitamiti ca bodhyam /
GK16andhvc1u:6142: 'nidrārdhamīlitaddaśo madamantharāṇi nāpyarthavanti na ca yāni nirarthakāni adyāpi me mṛgaddaśo madhurāṇi tasyāḥ' ityādyapādatrayam /
GK16andhvc1u:6151: locana.m kiṃ locanaṃ vināloko bhāti candrikayāpi hi /
GK16andhvc1u:6164: candrikayā jyotsnayā, api kiṃ bhāti kiṃ sphurati na pratyakṣaviṣayo bhavatītyaprastutārthaḥ tatsāmyaṃ cātra dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc1u:6177: atha ca yasyāḥ pratibhāyāḥ unmīlanayuktyā prakāśayogena /
GK16andhvc1u:6178_0: viśvam kṣaṇādunmīlati navanavatayā bhāti svātmanyevāyatane viśrāntāṃ vāsanārūpeṇāvasthitām, śivāṃ rasāveśavaiśadyasubhagām,
GK16andhvc1u:6178_1: tāṃ pratibhāṃ kavīnāṃ prajñām, vande ityādyartho 'pi bodhya iti sarvaṃ śivam // 19 //
GK16andhvc1u:6179: prauḍhaṃ kva locanaṃ mandaḥ kvāhaṃ tena mayā kṛtā /
